  2885 00000804 50                      		push	ax
  2886                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2887                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:07A5h
  2888                                  		;mov	ax, 40h		; ROMDATASEG
  2889                                  		;mov	ds, ax

  2891                                  		;; 16/10/2022
  2892                                  		;mov	al, [KBFLAG]

  2894 00000807 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax

  2896 0000080C 240C                    		and	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2897 0000080E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2898 00000810 750A                    		jnz	short int15_2
  2899                                  		; 07/08/2023

  2901                                  		;pop	ds

  2993                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  2994                                  
  2995                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  2996                                  ;
  2997                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  2998                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  2999                                  
  3000 0000083B 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3001                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3002 0000083D 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3003 00000841 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3004 00000845 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3005 00000849 [4D08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3006 0000084B 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3007                                  
  3008                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3009                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3010                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3011                                  
  3012 0000084D 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3013 00000851 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3014 00000853 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3015 00000857 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3016 00000859 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3017 0000085B 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3018 0000085D 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3019                                  
  3020                                  NextStack:
  3021                                  
  3022                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3023                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3024                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3025                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3026                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3027                                  
  3028 0000085F 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3029 00000863 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3030 00000865 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3031 00000869 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3032 0000086B 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  3033                                  
  3034                                  					;SR;
  3035 0000086F 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  3036                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  3037                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3038                                  
  3039                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3040                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  3041                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  3042                                  
  3043                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  3044 00000870 57                      		push	di
  3045 00000871 06                      		push	es
  3046 00000872 53                      		push	bx
  3047 00000873 50                      		push	ax
  3048 00000874 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3049 00000876 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3050 00000878 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3051 0000087B B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3052 0000087E CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3053                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3054                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3055 00000880 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3056 00000882 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3057 00000884 740B                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3058                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3059 00000886 0E                      		push	cs
  3060                                  		;mov	ax, offset Skip
  3061 00000887 B8[9108]                		mov	ax, Skip
  3062 0000088A 50                      		push	ax
  3063 0000088B 06                      		push	es
  3064 0000088C 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3065 0000088D B80100                  		mov	ax, 1		; SetFocus function number
  3066 00000890 CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3067                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3068

  3348 0000127C 00                      		db 0
  3349                                  
  3350                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3351                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3352                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3353                                  
  3354                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3355                                  
  3356                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3357                                  ;
  3358                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3359                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3360                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3361                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3362                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3363                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3364                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3365                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3366                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3367                                  ;
  3368                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3369                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3370                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3371                                  ;
  3372                                  ;	uses:	
  3373                                  ;
  3374                                  ;
  3375                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3376                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3377                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3378                                  ;
  3379                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3380                                  
  3381                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3382                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3383                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3384                                  
  3385                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3386                                  
  3387                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3388                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3389                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3390                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3391                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3392                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3393                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3394                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3395                                  
  3396                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3397                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3398                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3399                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3400                                  
  3401                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3402                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3403                                  
  3404                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3405 0000127D 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3406 00001280 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3407 00001282 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3408 00001285 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3409 00001287 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3410 0000128A 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3411                                  atd1:
  3412 0000128C 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3413                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3414                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3415                                  
  3416                                  atd2:					
  3417 00001291 53                      		push	bx
  3418 00001292 51                      		push	cx
  3419 00001293 52                      		push	dx
  3420 00001294 57                      		push	di
  3421 00001295 1E                      		push	ds
  3422 00001296 06                      		push	es
  3423 00001297 50                      		push	ax
  3424 00001298 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3425                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3426 0000129B 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3427                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3428 0000129D C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3429                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3430                                  					; initially no error code.
  3431 000012A2 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3432 000012A5 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3433                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3434 000012A9 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3435                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3436 000012AB C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3437 000012B0 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3438                                  					; return
  3439                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3440                                  
  3441                                  atd3:					
  3442 000012B2 53                      		push	bx
  3443 000012B3 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3444 000012B5 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3445 000012B8 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3446 000012BA 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3447 000012BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  3448 000012BD 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3449 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
  3450 000012C1 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3451 000012C4 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3452 000012C6 58                      		pop	ax
  3453 000012C7 50                      		push	ax
  3454 000012C8 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3455 000012CB BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3456 000012CE EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3457 000012CF E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3458                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3459                                  
  3460                                  atd4:	
  3461                                  
  3462                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3463                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3464                                  				
  3465 000012D2 58                      		pop	ax
  3466                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3467 000012D3 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3468 000012D7 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3469 000012D9 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3470 000012DB F9                      		stc
  3471                                  atd5:					
  3472 000012DC 07                      		pop	es
  3473 000012DD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3474 000012DE 5F                      		pop	di
  3475 000012DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  3476 000012E0 59                      		pop	cx
  3477 000012E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3478 000012E2 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3479                                  
  3480                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3481                                  
  3482                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3483                                  ;
  3484                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3485                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3486                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3487                                  ;	
  3488                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3489                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3490                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3491                                  ;
  3492                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3493                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3494                                  ;
  3495                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3496                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3497                                  
  3498                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3499                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3500                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3501 000012E5 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3502                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3503 000012E8 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3504 000012ED 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3505 000012F0 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3506 000012F2 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3507                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3508                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3509                                  setc1:					
  3510 000012F7 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3511 000012F9 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3512                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3513                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3514 000012FB A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3515 000012FE 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3516 00001302 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3517 00001304 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3518                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3519 00001307 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3520 0000130A 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3521 0000130C C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3522 0000130F 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3523 00001312 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3524 00001314 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3525                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3526 00001316 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3527 00001319 06                      		push	es
  3528 0000131A 53                      		push	bx
  3529 0000131B 0E                      		push	cs
  3530 0000131C E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3531 0000131F 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3532                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3533 00001323 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3534                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3535 00001326 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3536                                  					; only use low part
  3537 00001329 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3538                                  					; control byte modifier
  3539 0000132D 5B                      		pop	bx
  3540 0000132E 07                      		pop	es
  3541                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3542 0000132F 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3543 00001333 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3544 00001336 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3545                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3546 00001338 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3547 0000133C C3                      		retn
  3548                                  
  3549                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3550                                  
  3551                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3552                                  ;
  3553                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3554                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3555                                  ;
  3556                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3557                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3558                                  ;
  3559                                  ;	
  3560                                  ;
  3561                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3562                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3563                                  ;
  3564                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3565                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3566                                  
  3567                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3568 0000133D 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3569 0000133F 0E                      		push	cs
  3570 00001340 E84000                  		call	command
  3571 00001343 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3572                                  doc1:					
  3573 00001345 0E                      		push	cs
  3574 00001346 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3575 00001349 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3576 0000134B B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3577 0000134E BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3578 00001351 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3579 00001352 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3580                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3581                                  
  3582                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3583                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3584                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3585                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3586                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3587                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3588                                  ;
  3589                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3590                                  
  3591                                  rsct_loop:				
  3592 00001353 6D                      		insw
  3593 00001354 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3594 00001356 FB                      		sti
  3595                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3596 00001357 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3597                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3598                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3599 0000135C 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3600 0000135E 0E                      		push	cs
  3601 0000135F E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3602 00001362 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3603 00001364 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3604 00001367 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3605 0000136A FA                      		cli
  3606 0000136B F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3607 0000136D FB                      		sti
  3608                                  doc2:					
  3609 0000136E 0E                      		push	cs
  3610 0000136F E82900                  		call	check_status
  3611 00001372 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3612                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3613 00001374 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3614 00001378 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3615                                  doc3:

  3617                                  
  3618                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3619                                  
  3620                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3621                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3622                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3623                                  
  3624                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3625                                  
  3626                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3627                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3628                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3629                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3630                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3631                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3632                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3633                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3634                                  
  3635                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3636                                  ;
  3637                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3638                                  ;
  3639                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3640                                  ;
  3641                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3642                                  ;
  3643                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3644                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3645                                  ;	
  3646                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3647                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3648                                  
  3649                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3650                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3651                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3652                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3653 0000137B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3654 0000137E EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3655                                  
  3656                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3657                                  
  3658                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3659                                  ;
  3660                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3661                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3662                                  ;
  3663                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3664                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3665                                  ;
  3666                                  ;
  3667                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3668                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3669                                  ;
  3670                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3671                                  
  3672                                  command:	; proc near		
  3673                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3674                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3675                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3676 00001383 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3677 00001386 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3678                                  
  3679                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3680                                  
  3681                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3682                                  ;
  3683                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3684                                  ;
  3685                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3686                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3687                                  ;
  3688                                  ;
  3689                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3690                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3691                                  ;		
  3692                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3693                                  
  3694                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3695                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3696                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3697                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3698 0000138B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3699 0000138E EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3700                                  
  3701                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3702                                  
  3703                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3704                                  ;
  3705                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3706                                  ;
  3707                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3708                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3709                                  ;
  3710                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3711                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3712                                  
  3713                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3714                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3715                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3716                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3717 00001393 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3718 00001396 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3719                                  
  3720                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3721                                  
  3722                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3723                                  ;
  3724                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3725                                  ;
  3726                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3727                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3728                                  ;
  3729                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3730                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3731                                  
  3732                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3733                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3734                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3735                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3736 0000139B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3737 0000139E EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3738                                  
  3739                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3740                                  
  3741                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3742                                  ;
  3743                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3744                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3745                                  ;
  3746                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3747                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3748                                  ;
  3749                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3750                                  
  3751                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3752                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3753                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3754                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3755 000013A3 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3756 000013A6 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3757                                  
  3758                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3759                                  
  3760                                  endatrom:
  3761                                  
  3762                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3763                                  
  3764                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3765                                  ;;
  3766                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3767                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3768                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3769                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3770                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3771                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3772                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3773                                  
  3774                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3775 000013AB 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3776                                  					;
  3777                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3778                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3779                                  					;
  3780                                  					; warning!!!
  3781                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3782 000013AE 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3783                                  no_hookit:				
  3784                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3785                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3786 000013B0 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3787                                  
  3788                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3789                                  
  3790                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3791 000013B5 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3792 000013B8 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3793 000013BA 1E                      		push	ds
  3794                                  		
  3795                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3796                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3797                                  		;push	ax
  3798                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3799                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3800                                  		;pop	ax
  3801 000013BB 6A40                    		push	40h
  3802 000013BD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3803                                  
  3804 000013BE 9C                      		pushf
  3805                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3806                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3807 000013BF 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3808 000013C4 1F                      		pop	ds
  3809 000013C5 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3810                                  
  3811                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3812                                  
  3813 000013C8 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3814                                  
  3815                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3816                                  
  3817                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3818                                  %if 0  
  3819                                  
  3820                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3821                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3822                                  
  3823                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3824                                  
  3825                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3826                                  ;
  3827                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3828                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3829                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3830                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3831                                  
  3832                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3833                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3834                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3835                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3836                                  		jnb	short century20
  3837                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3838                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3839                                  		jmp	short years
  3840                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3841                                  		
  3842                                  century20:				
  3843                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3844                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3845                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3846                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3847                                  years:					
  3848                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3849                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3850                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3851                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3852                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3853                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3854                                  		mov	bl, 4
  3855                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3856                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3857                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3858                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3859                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3860                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3861                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3862                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3863                                  regularyear:				
  3864                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3865                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3866                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3867                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3868                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  3869                                  					;
  3870                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3871                                  leapyear:				
  3872                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3873                                  					; change month table.
  3874                                  yeardone:				
  3875                                  		xor	bx, bx
  3876                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3877                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3878                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3879                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3880                                  		mov	cx, 12
  3881                                  months:					
  3882                                  		inc	bl
  3883                                  
  3884                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3885                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3886                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3887                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3888                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3889                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3890                                  		
  3891                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3892                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3893                                  					; dh=0
  3894                                  		jbe	short month_done
  3895                                  		inc	si		; next month
  3896                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3897                                  		loop	months		;
  3898                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3899                                  month_done:				
  3900                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3901                                  					; restore month table value
  3902                                  		mov	dl, bl
  3903                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3904                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3905                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3906                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3907                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3908                                  		xchg	dl, al
  3909                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3910                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3911                                  		xchg	dh, al
  3912                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3913                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3914                                  		xchg	cl, al
  3915                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3916                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3917                                  		mov	ch, al
  3918                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3919                                  		retf
  3920                                  
  3921                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3922                                  
  3923                                  %endif
  3924                                  
  3925                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3926                                  
  3927                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3928                                  %if 0  
  3929                                  
  3930                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3931                                  
  3932                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3933                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3934                                  		
  3935                                  		push	cx		
  3936                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  3937                                  		mov	cl, 4
  3938                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3939                                  		or	al, ah
  3940                                  		pop	cx
  3941                                  		retf
  3942                                  %endif
  3943                                  
  3944                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3945                                  
  3946                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3947                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3948                                  
  3949                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3950                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3951                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3952                                  
  3953                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3954                                  
  3955                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3956                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  3957                                  int_6Ch:
  3958 000013C9 0E                      		push	cs
  3959 000013CA 1F                      		pop	ds
  3960                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  3961 000013CB 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  3962 000013D0 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  3963 000013D2 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  3964 000013D5 FFD3                    		call    bx
  3965                                  int6c:					
  3966                                  		;push	cs
  3967                                  		;pop	ds
  3968 000013D7 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3969 000013DB 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3970 000013DF 9D                      		popf
  3971 000013E0 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3972 000013E3 FA                      		cli
  3973 000013E4 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3974 000013E8 FB                      		sti
  3975 000013E9 E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3976 000013EC FA                      		cli
  3977 000013ED B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3978 000013EF CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3979                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3980                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3981 000013F1 FB                      		sti
  3982                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3983                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3984 000013F2 FF2E[B306]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3985                                  
  3986                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3987                                  
  3988                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3989                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3990                                  
  3991                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3992 000013F6 50                      		push	ax
  3993 000013F7 51                      		push	cx
  3994 000013F8 52                      		push	dx
  3995 000013F9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3996 000013FB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3997                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3998                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3999                                  					; midnight
  4000                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4001 000013FD 5A                      		pop	dx
  4002 000013FE 59                      		pop	cx
  4003 000013FF 58                      		pop	ax
  4004 00001400 50                      		push	ax
  4005 00001401 53                      		push	bx
  4006 00001402 51                      		push	cx
  4007 00001403 52                      		push	dx
  4008                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4009                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4010                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  4011 00001404 C706[BB06]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  4012                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4013 0000140A B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4014 0000140C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4015                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4016                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4017                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4018                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4019 0000140E 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4020 00001410 E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4021                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4022                                  
  4023                                  read_ok:
  4024 00001413 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4025 00001417 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4026 0000141B 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4027 0000141F 8816[BA06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4028                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4029                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4030                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  4031 00001423 FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  4032 00001427 E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4033 0000142A 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  4034                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4035                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4036                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  4037 0000142C FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  4038 00001430 E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  4039 00001433 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4040                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4041                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4042 00001435 C606[BB06]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  4043 0000143A E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  4044 0000143D A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4045 00001440 98                      		cbw
  4046 00001441 803E[B706]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4047 00001446 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4048 00001448 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4049                                  century_19:				
  4050 0000144B 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4051 0000144E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4052 00001450 F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4053 00001452 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4054 00001454 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4055 00001455 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4056                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4057 00001458 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4058                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4059                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4060 0000145A A3[BB06]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax
  4061 0000145D 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4062 0000145F 98                      		cbw
  4063 00001460 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4064 00001462 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4065 00001464 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4066 00001467 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4067                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4068                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4069 00001469 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4070 0000146D EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4071                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4072                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4073                                  
  4074                                  leap_year:
  4075 0000146F 803E[B906]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4076 00001474 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4077                                  leap_adjustment:
  4078                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4079                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4080 00001476 FF06[BB06]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4081                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4082 0000147A 8A0E[BA06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4083 0000147E 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4084 00001480 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4085                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4086                                  		; 08/08/2023

  4088 00001485 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4089                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4090                                  		;xor	ch, ch
  4091 00001489 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4092

  4095                                  		;;mov	si, month_table

  4099                                  		;; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4100                                  		;; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4101                                  		;; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4102                                  		;mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4103                                  		;			; get #	days in	previous months
  4104                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax

  4107                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1907h
  4108 0000148A B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  4109 0000148C BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab
  4110                                  r_d_sum_loop:

  4113 00001494 E2F9                    		loop	r_d_sum_loop

  4119 0000149B 59                      		pop	cx
  4120 0000149C 5B                      		pop	bx
  4121 0000149D 58                      		pop	ax
  4122 0000149E C3                      		retn
  4123                                  
  4124                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4125                                  
  4126                                  r_t_retj:				
  4127 0000149F 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4128 000014A1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4129 000014A3 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4130                                  
  4131                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4132                                  
  4133                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4134                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4135                                  
  4136                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4137 000014A5 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4138 000014A7 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4139                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4140                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4141                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4142 000014A9 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4143 000014AB 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4144 000014AF 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4145 000014B3 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4146 000014B7 C606[BA06]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4147 000014BC E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4148 000014BF 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4149 000014C1 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4150 000014C4 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4151 000014C6 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4152 000014C9 8A2E[B706]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4153 000014CD 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4154 000014D1 8A36[B906]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4155 000014D5 8A16[BA06]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4156                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4157                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4158                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4159 000014D9 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4160                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4161                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4162                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4163                                  r_t_ret:				
  4164 000014DD C3                      		retn
  4165                                  
  4166                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4167                                  
  4168                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4169                                  
  4170                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4171 000014DE A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4172 000014E1 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4173 000014E4 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4174 000014E7 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4175 000014EA E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4176 000014ED A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4177 000014F0 A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4178 000014F3 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4179 000014F6 A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4180 000014F9 A0[BA06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4181 000014FC E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4182 000014FF A2[BA06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4183 00001502 C3                      		retn
  4184                                  
  4185                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4186                                  
  4187                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4188                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4189                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4190                                  
  4191                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4192 00001503 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4193 00001505 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4194 00001507 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4195 00001509 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4196 0000150B D50A                    		aad
  4197 0000150D C3                      		retn
  4198                                  
  4199                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4200                                  
  4201                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4202                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4203                                  
  4204                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4205 0000150E 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4206 00001513 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4207 00001515 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4208 00001517 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4209                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4210                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4211 0000151C 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4212 0000151E 803E[B806]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4213                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4214                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4215 00001523 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4216                                  century_20:
  4217 00001525 803E[B806]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4218 0000152A 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4219 0000152C 803E[B906]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4220 00001531 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4221 00001533 803E[B906]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4222                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4223 00001538 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4224 0000153A 803E[BA06]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4225 0000153F 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4226                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4227                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4228                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4229                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4230                                  		; cf=0
  4231                                  		;clc
  4232                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4233 00001541 803E[BA06]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4234 00001546 C3                      		retn
  4235                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4236                                  
  4237                                  date_error:
  4238 00001547 F9                      		stc
  4239                                  date_err2:
  4240 00001548 C3                      		retn
  4241                                  
  4242                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4243                                  
  4244                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4245                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4246                                  
  4247                                  time_verify:	; proc near
  4248 00001549 803E[B706]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4249 0000154E 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4250 00001550 803E[B806]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4251 00001555 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4252                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4253                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4254                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4255                                  		;clc
  4256                                  		;retn
  4257                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4258 00001557 803E[B906]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4259                                  time_error:
  4260                                  bv_error:
  4261 0000155C F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4262 0000155D C3                      		retn
  4263                                  
  4264                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4265                                  
  4266                                  ;time_error:				
  4267                                  		;stc
  4268                                  		;retn
  4269                                  
  4270                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4271                                  
  4272                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4273                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4274                                  
  4275                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4276 0000155E B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4277 00001561 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4278                                  bv_loop:
  4279 00001564 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4280 00001566 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4281 00001568 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4282                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4283 0000156B 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4284 0000156D 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4285 0000156F D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4286 00001571 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4287 00001573 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4288 00001575 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4289 00001577 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4290 0000157A 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4291 0000157D 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4292 0000157F 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4293 00001580 49                      		dec	cx
  4294 00001581 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4295 00001583 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4296 00001584 C3                      		retn
  4297                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4298                                  
  4299                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4300                                  ;bv_error:
  4301                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4302                                  		;retn
  4303                                  
  4304                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  4310                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4311                                  ;									:
  4312                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4313                                  ;									:
  4314                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4315                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4316                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4317                                  ;									:
  4318                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4319                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4320                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4321                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4322                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4323                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4324                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4325                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4326                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4327                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4328                                  ;		this program.						:
  4329                                  ;									:
  4330                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4331                                  
  4332                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4333                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4334

  4423                                  ;struc bpbx

  4425                                  ;   resb 1

  4428                                  ;   resw 1

  4437                                  ;.size:
