  7252 00001F87 F726[FD1E]              		mul	word [word3]
  7253 00001F8B F736[FB1E]              		div	word [word2]
  7254 00001F8F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7255 00001F91 F736[FF1E]              		div	word [word512]
  7256                                  		;
  7257                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7258                                  		;mul	word [cs:word3]	; * 3 ; mul word [cs:word3]
  7259                                  		;div	word [cs:word2]	; / 2 ; div word [cs:word2]
  7260                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  7261                                  		;div	word [cs:word512] ; / 512 ; div word [cs:word512]
  7262                                  		;
  7263 00001F95 40                      		inc	ax		; + 1
  7264                                  no_round_up:
  7265 00001F96 894532                  		mov	[di+32h], ax	; [di+BDS.rfatsecs]
  7266 00001F99 EB12                    		jmp	short go_to_next_bds
  7267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7268                                  
  7269                                  not_process_other:			
  7270 00001F9B D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1		; bx is	word index into	table of bpbs
  7271                                  		;mov	si, bpbtable
  7272                                  		;mov	si, [bpbtable+bx] ; 15/10/2022
  7273                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7274                                  		;mov	si, BPBTABLE
  7275                                  		;mov	si, [bx+si]	; get address of bpb
  7276                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7277                                  		;mov	si, [BPBTABLE+bx]
  7278                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7279                                  		;mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx] ; wrong ! 14/08/2023
  7280                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7281                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ (SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG<<4)
  7282                                  							; correct offset
  7283 00001F9D 8BB7[3C87]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  7284                                  		
  7285                                  		; 28/08/2023
  7286 00001FA1 81C6503D                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  7287                                  set_recbpb:					
  7288 00001FA5 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  7289                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  7290 00001FA8 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  7291 00001FAB F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  7292                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  7293 00001FAD 5F                      		pop	di
  7294 00001FAE 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  7295 00001FAF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7296 00001FB2 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7297 00001FB5 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7298 00001FB7 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7299                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7300                                  
  7301                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7302                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7303                                  		;retn
  7304

  7309                                  
  7310                                  ; al = device number
  7311                                  
  7312                                  print_init:	
  7313 00001FBA 98                      		cbw
  7314 00001FBB 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7315 00001FBD B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7316 00001FBF CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  7317                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7318                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7319                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022

  7330                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)

  7335                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7336                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)

  7341                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7342                                  
  7343                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7344                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7345                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7346                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7347                                  
  7348                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7349                                  ;
  7350                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7351                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7352                                  ;
  7353                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7354                                  ;
  7355                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7356                                  ;   initialize it.
  7357                                  ;
  7358                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7359                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7360                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7361                                  ;
  7362                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7363                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7364                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7365                                  ;
  7366                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7367                                  ;   save coding.
  7368                                  ;
  7369                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7370                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7371                                  ;
  7372                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7373                                  ;
  7374                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7375                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7376                                  ;
  7377                                  ; called modules:
  7378                                  ;		  getboot
  7379                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7380                                  ;
  7381                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7382                                  ;
  7383                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7384                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7385                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7386                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7387                                  ;
  7388                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7389                                  
  7390                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7391                                  domini:	
  7392 00001FCB 8A36[0D16]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7393                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7394 00001FCF 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7395                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7396 00001FD1 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7397 00001FD3 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7398                                  domini_loop:				
  7399 00001FD5 52                      		push	dx
  7400 00001FD6 8816[0C16]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7401 00001FDA B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7402 00001FDC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7403                                  					; DL = drive number
  7404                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7405                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7406                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7407                                  		
  7408                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7409                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7410                                  		;inc	dh
  7411                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7412                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7413 00001FDE 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7414 00001FE0 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7415 00001FE2 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7416 00001FE3 A3[1216]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7417                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7418                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7419                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7420 00001FE6 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7421 00001FE8 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7422 00001FEB A3[1416]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7423 00001FEE 06                      		push	es
  7424 00001FEF 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7425 00001FF3 E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7426                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7427 00001FF6 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7428 00001FF8 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7429                                  domininext:				
  7430 00001FFB 07                      		pop	es
  7431 00001FFC 5A                      		pop	dx
  7432 00001FFD FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7433 00001FFF FECE                    		dec	dh
  7434 00002001 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7435                                  dominiret:				
  7436 00002003 C3                      		retn
  7437                                  
  7438                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7439                                  
  7440                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7441                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7442                                  
  7443                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7444                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7445                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7446                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7447                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7448                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7449                                  ;
  7450                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7451                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7452                                  
  7453                                  
  7454                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7455 00002004 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7456                                  fmpnext:				
  7457 00002008 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7458 0000200C 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7459 0000200E 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7460 00002011 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7461 00002015 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7462                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7463                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7464                                  fmpnextfound:
  7465 00002017 C3                      		retn
  7466                                  
  7467                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7468                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7469                                  ;fmpret:
  7470                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7471                                  
  7472                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7473                                  
  7474                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7475                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7476 00002018 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7477 0000201B 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7478 0000201D 8B3E[1016]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7479 00002021 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7480                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7481 00002026 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7482                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7483                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7484 0000202A C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7485                                  					; ffHardFile
  7486 0000202E C606[8E15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7487 00002033 A1[1216]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7488 00002036 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7489 00002039 A1[1416]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7490 0000203C 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7491 0000203F A0[0C16]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7492 00002042 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7493                                  					; set physical number
  7494 00002045 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7495 00002048 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7496                                  					; set logical number
  7497 0000204B 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7498 00002050 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7499 00002052 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7500                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7501 00002057 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7502                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7503                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7504 00002059 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7505 0000205C 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7506 00002060 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7507 00002063 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7508 00002065 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7509 00002067 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7510 0000206B 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7511                                  					; set hidden trks
  7512 0000206E 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7513 00002072 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7514 00002076 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7515 0000207A BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7516 0000207D B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7517 00002080 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7518                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7519                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7520                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7521 00002082 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7522 00002084 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7523                                  
  7524                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7525                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7526 00002087 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7527 0000208D 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7528                                  
  7529                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7530                                  		;push	es
  7531 0000208F E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7532                                  					; bx value saved.
  7533                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7534 00002092 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7535 00002094 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7536                                  fmpnextchain:
  7537 00002097 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7538                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7539                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7540                                  
  7541                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7542                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7543                                  		;retn
  7544                                  
  7545                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7546                                  
  7547                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7548                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7549                                  
  7550                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7551                                  	
  7552 0000209A 57                      		push	di
  7553 0000209B 53                      		push	bx
  7554                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7555                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7556                                  		;push	ds
  7557 0000209C 06                      		push	es
  7558                                  setmini_1:				
  7559 0000209D 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7560 000020A1 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7561 000020A3 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7562 000020A7 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7563 000020A9 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7564 000020AD 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7565 000020AF 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7566 000020B2 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7567 000020B6 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7568 000020B8 F9                      		stc
  7569 000020B9 07                      		pop	es
  7570                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7571                                  		;pop	ds
  7572 000020BA 5B                      		pop	bx
  7573 000020BB 5F                      		pop	di
  7574 000020BC C3                      		retn
  7575                                  
  7576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7577                                  setmini_2:
  7578 000020BD E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7579                                  
  7580                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7581                                  
  7582                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7583                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7584                                  
  7585                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7586                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7587                                  ;
  7588                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7589                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7590                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7591                                  ;
  7592                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7593                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7594                                  ;			trash ax
  7595                                  
  7596                                  dmax_check:
  7597 000020C0 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7598 000020C5 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7599 000020C7 06                      		push	es
  7600                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7601 000020C8 B84504                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7602 000020CB 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7603                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7604 000020CD 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7605                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7606                                  					; set message flag
  7607                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7608 000020D3 07                      		pop	es
  7609                                  
  7610                                  		;;push	es
  7611                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7612                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7613                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7614                                  					; set message flag
  7615                                  		;;pop	es
  7616                                  		;
  7617                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7618                                  dmax_ok:
  7619 000020D4 C3                      		retn
  7620                                  
  7621                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7622                                  
  7623                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7624                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7625                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7626                                  ;								 
  7627                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7628                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7629                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7630                                  
  7631                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7632 000020D5 56                      		push	si
  7633 000020D6 53                      		push	bx
  7634 000020D7 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7635                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7636 000020DB 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7637 000020DE 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7638                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7639 000020E0 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7640 000020E2 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7641                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7642                                  
  7643                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7644                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7645 000020E4 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7646                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7647 000020E6 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7648                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7649 000020E9 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7650                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7651 000020ED 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7652                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7653                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7654 000020F0 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7655 000020F3 8B36[0E16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7656 000020F7 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7657 000020F9 8306[0E16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7658 000020FE FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7659 00002102 8306[1016]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7660 00002107 5B                      		pop	bx
  7661 00002108 5E                      		pop	si
  7662 00002109 C3                      		retn
  7663                                  
  7664                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7665                                  
  7666                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7667                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7668                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7669                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7670                                  
  7671                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7672 0000210A 50                      		push	ax
  7673 0000210B 51                      		push	cx
  7674 0000210C 52                      		push	dx
  7675 0000210D 55                      		push	bp
  7676 0000210E 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7677                                  loop_clock:				
  7678 00002110 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7679 00002112 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7680 00002114 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7681 00002116 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7682                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7683                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7684                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7685 00002118 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7686 0000211B 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7687 0000211D 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7688 00002120 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7689 00002122 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7690 00002125 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7691 00002127 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7692 00002128 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7693                                  delay:					
  7694 0000212B E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7695 0000212D EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7696                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7697                                  
  7698                                  clock_present:				
  7699 0000212F 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7700 00002135 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7701                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7702                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7703 00002138 56                      		push	si
  7704 00002139 E8BAF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7705 0000213C FA                      		cli
  7706                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7707 0000213D 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7708 00002141 FB                      		sti
  7709 00002142 5E                      		pop	si
  7710                                  
  7711                                  no_readdate:				
  7712 00002143 5D                      		pop	bp
  7713 00002144 5A                      		pop	dx
  7714 00002145 59                      		pop	cx
  7715 00002146 58                      		pop	ax
  7716 00002147 C3                      		retn
  7717                                  
  7718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7719                                  
  7720                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7721                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7722                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7723                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7724                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7725                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7726                                  ;
  7727                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7728                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7729                                  ;
  7730                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7731                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7732                                  ;
  7733                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7734                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7735                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7736                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7737                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7738                                  ;
  7739                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7740                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7741                                  
  7742                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7743                                  
  7744                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7745                                  
  7746                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7747                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7748                                  			
  7749 00002148 50                      		push	ax
  7750 00002149 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7751 0000214F 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7752 00002151 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7753                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7754 00002157 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7755 00002159 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7756                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7757 0000215F 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7758                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7759                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7760                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7761                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7762                                  cmosck4:				
  7763 00002161 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7764                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7765 00002163 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7766                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7767 00002165 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7768 00002168 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7769                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7770 0000216A E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7771 0000216D 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7772                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7773 0000216F 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7774 00002171 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7775                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7776 00002173 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7777                                  cmosck9:				
  7778 00002176 58                      		pop	ax
  7779 00002177 C3                      		retn
  7780                                  
  7781                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7782                                  
  7783                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7784                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7785                                  ;									       :
  7786                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7787                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7788                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7789                                  ;									       :
  7790                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7791                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7792                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7793                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7794                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7795                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7796                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7797                                  
  7798                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7799 00002178 9C                      		pushf
  7800 00002179 FA                      		cli
  7801 0000217A 53                      		push	bx
  7802 0000217B 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7803 0000217C 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7804 0000217E E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7805                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7806 00002180 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7807 00002181 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7808 00002183 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7809 00002185 58                      		pop	ax
  7810 00002186 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7811 00002188 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7812 0000218A E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7813                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7814 0000218C 90                      		nop
  7815 0000218D E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7816 0000218F 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7817 00002191 5B                      		pop	bx
  7818 00002192 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7819 00002193 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7820 00002196 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7821                                  
  7822                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7823                                  
  7824                                  cmos_popf:				
  7825 00002197 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7826                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7827                                  
  7828                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7829                                  
  7830                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7831                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7832                                  ;									       :
  7833                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7834                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7835                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7836                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7837                                  ;									       :
  7838                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7839                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7840                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7841                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7842                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7843                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7844                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7845                                  
  7846                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7847 00002198 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7848 00002199 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7849 0000219A FA                      		cli
  7850 0000219B 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7851 0000219C 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7852 0000219E E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7853                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7854 000021A0 90                      		nop
  7855 000021A1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7856 000021A3 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7857 000021A5 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7858 000021A6 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7859 000021A8 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7860 000021AA E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7861                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7862 000021AC 90                      		nop
  7863 000021AD E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7864 000021AF 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7865 000021B0 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7866 000021B1 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7867 000021B4 C3                      		retn
  7868                                  
  7869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7870                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7871                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7872                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7873                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7874                                  
  7875                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7876                                  ;
  7877                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7878                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7879                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7880                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7881                                  
  7882                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7883                                  
  7884                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7885                                  ;
  7886                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7887                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7888                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7889                                  
  7890                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7891                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7892                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7893                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7894                                  
  7895                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7896                                  getclus:				
  7897 000021B5 51                      		push	cx
  7898 000021B6 57                      		push	di
  7899 000021B7 2E890E[8C15]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7900 000021BC 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7901 000021BE 48                      		dec	ax
  7902 000021BF 48                      		dec	ax
  7903 000021C0 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7904                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7905                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7906 000021C2 2E0306[8815]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7907 000021C7 2E1316[8A15]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7908                                  unpack:					
  7909 000021CC 1E                      		push	ds
  7910 000021CD 50                      		push	ax
  7911 000021CE 53                      		push	bx
  7912 000021CF 2E8B36[8F15]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7913 000021D4 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7914 000021D6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7915 000021D8 2EF606[8E15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7916                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7917 000021DE 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7918 000021E0 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7919                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7920 000021E2 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7921                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7922 000021E4 52                      		push	dx
  7923 000021E5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7924 000021E7 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7925 000021EA 5A                      		pop	dx
  7926 000021EB 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7927 000021ED 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7928                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7929                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7930 000021EF 2EA2[9615]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7931 000021F3 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7932 000021F4 52                      		push	dx
  7933 000021F5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7934 000021F7 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7935 000021FA 5A                      		pop	dx
  7936                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7937 000021FB A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7938 000021FE 2EA2[9715]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7939 00002202 2EA1[9615]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7940                                  even_odd:				
  7941 00002206 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7942 00002207 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7943 00002208 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7944 0000220A 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7945 0000220C D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7946                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7947 0000220E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7948 00002210 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7949 00002212 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7950                                  havclus:				
  7951 00002214 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7952 00002216 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7953 0000221A EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7954                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7955                                  
  7956                                  unpack16:				
  7957 0000221C 52                      		push	dx
  7958 0000221D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7959 0000221F D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7960 00002221 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7961 00002224 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7962 00002227 5A                      		pop	dx
  7963 00002228 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7964                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7965                                  unpackx:				
  7966 0000222A 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7967 0000222B 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7968 0000222C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7969 0000222D 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7970 0000222F 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7971 00002232 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7972 00002234 2E010E[8C15]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7973 00002239 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7974                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7975                                  
  7976                                  getcl2:					
  7977 0000223B 53                      		push	bx
  7978 0000223C 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7979 0000223D 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7980 0000223E 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7981 00002242 2E8B0E[8C15]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7982 00002247 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7983 00002248 2E8F06[2305]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7984                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7985 0000224D 1E                      		push	ds
  7986 0000224E 0E                      		push	cs
  7987 0000224F 1F                      		pop	ds
  7988 00002250 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7989                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7990 00002251 BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7991                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7992                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7993 00002254 E8CAF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7994 00002257 1F                      		pop	ds
  7995 00002258 5B                      		pop	bx
  7996 00002259 5F                      		pop	di
  7997 0000225A 2EA1[8C15]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7998 0000225E 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7999 00002260 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  8000 00002262 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  8001 00002264 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  8002 00002265 C3                      		retn
  8003                                  
  8004                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8005                                  
  8006                                  
  8007                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  8008                                  ;
  8009                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  8010                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  8011                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  8012                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  8013                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  8014                                  ;
  8015                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  8016                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  8017                                  ;      other registera saved.
  8018                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  8019                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  8020                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  8021                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  8022                                  
  8023                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8024                                  get_fat_sector:	
  8025 00002266 50                      		push	ax
  8026 00002267 51                      		push	cx
  8027 00002268 57                      		push	di
  8028 00002269 56                      		push	si
  8029 0000226A 06                      		push	es
  8030 0000226B 1E                      		push	ds
  8031 0000226C 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8032 0000226E 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8033 00002273 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8034 00002275 90                      		nop
  8035                                  
  8036                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8037                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8038                                  
  8039 00002276 06                      		push	es
  8040 00002277 1E                      		push	ds
  8041 00002278 57                      		push	di
  8042 00002279 50                      		push	ax
  8043 0000227A 0E                      		push	cs
  8044 0000227B 1F                      		pop	ds
  8045                                  
  8046 0000227C 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8047 00002280 BD[7005]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8048                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8049                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8050 00002283 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8051 00002284 E89AF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8052 00002287 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8053 00002288 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8054                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8055 0000228C 5F                      		pop	di
  8056 0000228D 1F                      		pop	ds
  8057 0000228E 07                      		pop	es
  8058 0000228F 2E3B06[9815]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8059 00002294 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8060 00002296 2EA3[9815]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8061                                  					; sector number
  8062                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8063 0000229A 52                      		push	dx
  8064 0000229B 2EC706[2305]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8065                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8066                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8067 000022A2 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8068 000022A4 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8069 000022A7 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8070 000022AB 1E                      		push	ds
  8071 000022AC 07                      		pop	es
  8072 000022AD 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8073 000022AF 1E                      		push	ds
  8074 000022B0 0E                      		push	cs
  8075 000022B1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8076 000022B2 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8077 000022B3 BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8078                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8079                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8080 000022B6 E868F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8081 000022B9 1F                      		pop	ds
  8082 000022BA 5A                      		pop	dx
  8083 000022BB 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8084                                  
  8085                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8086 000022C0 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8087 000022C1 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8088                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8089                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8090 000022C3 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8091 000022C5 1F                      		pop	ds
  8092 000022C6 07                      		pop	es
  8093 000022C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8094 000022C8 5F                      		pop	di
  8095 000022C9 59                      		pop	cx
  8096 000022CA 58                      		pop	ax
  8097 000022CB C3                      		retn
  8098                                  
  8099                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8100                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8101                                  
  8102                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8103                                  
  8104                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8105                                  		;db 0
  8106                                  
  8107                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8108                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8109                                  
  8110                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  8111 000022CC 00<rep 4h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8112                                  %endif
  8113                                  
  8114                                  ;align 16
  8115                                  
  8116                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8117                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8118                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8119                                  
  8120                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8121                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8122                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  8123                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8124                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  8125                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8126                                  
  8127                                  ;============================================================================
  8128                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8129                                  ;============================================================================
  8130                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8131                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8132                                  
  8133                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8134                                  
  8135                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8136                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8137                                  
  8138                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8139                                   
  8140                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8141                                  
  8142                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8143                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8144                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8145                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8146                                  
  8147                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8148 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8149 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8150                                  
  8151                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8152                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8153                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8154                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8155                                  
  8156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8157                                  
  8158                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8159                                  
  8160                                  ;************************************************************************
  8161                                  ;*									*
  8162                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8163                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8164                                  ;*									*
  8165                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8166                                  ;*									*
  8167                                  ;************************************************************************
  8168                                  
  8169                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8170                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8171                                  
  8172                                  _seg_reinit:
  8173 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8174                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8175                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8176 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8177                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8178                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8179 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8180                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8181 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8182 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8183 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8184 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8185                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8186                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8187                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8188 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8189 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8190                                  
  8191                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8192                                  
  8193                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8194                                  
  8195                                  ;************************************************************************
  8196                                  ;*									*
  8197                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8198                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8199                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8200                                  ;*									*
  8201                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8202                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8203                                  ;*									*
  8204                                  ;************************************************************************
  8205                                  
  8206                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8207 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8208 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8209 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8210 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8211 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8212 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8213 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8214 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8215 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8216 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8217 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8218                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8219                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8220 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8221 0000005A 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8222 0000005D A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8223 00000060 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8224 00000064 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8225 00000066 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8226 0000006A 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8227 0000006E 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8228 00000072 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8229 00000076 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8230                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8231 0000007A 81FE[3B05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8232                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8233                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8234 0000007E 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8235                                  
  8236                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8237                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8238                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8239                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8240                                  ;
  8241                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8242                                  ;
  8243                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8244                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8245                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8246                                  ;
  8247                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8248                                  
  8249                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8250 00000080 C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8251 00000086 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8252 00000089 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8253 0000008B 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8254                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8255                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8256 0000008F 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8257 00000093 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8258                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8259                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8260 00000097 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8261 00000098 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8262 0000009C 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8263 0000009F 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8264 000000A1 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8265 000000A2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8266 000000A4 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8267 000000A6 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8268 000000A7 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8269 000000AB FC                      		cld
  8270                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8271 000000AC 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8272                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8273 000000B0 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8274 000000B2 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8275                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8276                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8277                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8278                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8279 000000B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8280                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8281 000000B9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8282 000000BD 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8283                                  					; mark operation complete
  8284 000000C0 5B                      		pop	bx
  8285 000000C1 07                      		pop	es
  8286 000000C2 1F                      		pop	ds
  8287 000000C3 5D                      		pop	bp
  8288 000000C4 5F                      		pop	di
  8289 000000C5 5A                      		pop	dx
  8290 000000C6 59                      		pop	cx
  8291 000000C7 58                      		pop	ax
  8292 000000C8 5E                      		pop	si
  8293 000000C9 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8294                                  	
  8295                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8296                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8297                                  bc_retf:
  8298 000000CC CB                      		retf
  8299                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8300                                  
  8301                                  command_error:				
  8302 000000CD E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8303 000000D0 EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8304                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8305                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8306                                  
  8307                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8308                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8309                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8310                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8311                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8312                                  ; high.
  8313                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8314                                  
  8315                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8316                                  
  8317                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8318                                  
  8319 000000D2 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8320                                  
  8321 000000D4 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8322                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8323                                  		
  8324                                  
  8325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8326                                  
  8327                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8328                                  
  8329                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8330 000000D9 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8331                                  					; unknown command error
  8332                                  
  8333                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8334                                  
  8335                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8336                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8337                                  
  8338                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8339                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8340                                  
  8341                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8342                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8343                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8344 000000DB C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8345 000000DF 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8346                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8347 000000E3 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8348 000000E5 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8349 000000E6 C3                      		retn
  8350                                  
  8351                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8352                                  
  8353                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8354                                  
  8355                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8356                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8358                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8359                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8360                                  
  8361                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8362                                  
  8363                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8364                                  
  8365                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8366                                  
  8367                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8368                                  
  8369                                  ;************************************************************************
  8370                                  ;*									*
  8371                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8372                                  ;*									*
  8373                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8374                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8375                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8376                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8377                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8378                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8379                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8380                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8381                                  ;*									*
  8382                                  ;************************************************************************
  8383                                  
  8384                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8385                                  		;db 0
  8386                                  
  8387                                  		; 13/12/202
  8388 000000E7 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8389                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8390 000000E8 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8391                                  					; 00 init
  8392 000000EA [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8393 000000EC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8394 000000EE [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8395                                  					; 03
  8396 000000F0 [5F01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8397                                  					; 04
  8398 000000F2 [A201]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8399                                  					; 05
  8400 000000F4 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8401 000000F6 [0B02]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8402                                  					; 07
  8403 000000F8 [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8404                                  					; 08
  8405 000000FA [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8406 000000FC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8407                                  con_table_end:
  8408 000000FE 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8409                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8410 000000FF [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8411 00000101 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8412 00000103 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8413 00000105 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8414 00000107 [1C02]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
