  8415                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8416 00000109 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8417                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8418 0000010B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8419 0000010D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8420 0000010F [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8421 00000111 [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8422 00000113 [5202]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8423 00000115 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8424 00000117 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8425 00000119 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8426 0000011B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8427 0000011D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8428 0000011F [8C02]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8429 00000121 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8430 00000123 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8431 00000125 [BA02]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8432 00000127 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8433 00000129 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8434 0000012B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8435 0000012D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8436 0000012F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8437 00000131 [EF02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8438                                  prn_table_end:
  8439 00000133 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8440                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8441 00000134 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8442 00000136 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8443 00000138 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8444 0000013A [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8445 0000013C [0A03]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8446 0000013E [2F03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8447 00000140 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8448 00000142 [6503]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8449 00000144 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8450 00000146 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8451 00000148 [4F03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8452                                  aux_table_end:
  8453 0000014A 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8454                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8455 0000014B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8456 0000014D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8457 0000014F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8458 00000151 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8459 00000153 [D104]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8460 00000155 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8461 00000157 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8462 00000159 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8463 0000015B [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8464 0000015D [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8465                                  tim_table_end:
  8466                                  
  8467                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8468                                  
  8469                                  ;************************************************************************
  8470                                  ;*									*
  8471                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8472                                  ;*									*
  8473                                  ;************************************************************************
  8474                                  
  8475                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8476                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8477 0000015F E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8478                                  con_loop:				
  8479 00000161 E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8480 00000164 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8481 00000165 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8482                                  con_exit:				
  8483 00000167 F8                      		clc
  8484 00000168 C3                      		retn
  8485                                  
  8486                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8487                                  
  8488                                  ;************************************************************************
  8489                                  ;*									*
  8490                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8491                                  ;*									*
  8492                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8493                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8494                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8495                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8496                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8497                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8498                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8499                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8500                                  ;*									*
  8501                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8502                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8503                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8504                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8505                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8506                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8507                                  ;*									*
  8508                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8509                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8510                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8511                                  ;*									*
  8512                                  ;************************************************************************
  8513                                  
  8514                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8515                                  chrin:		
  8516 00000169 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8517 0000016D 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8518 0000016F 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8519 00000173 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8520 00000175 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8521 00000177 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8522 00000179 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8523 0000017B 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8524 0000017D 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8525 00000180 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8526 00000182 B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8527 00000184 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8528                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8529                                  
  8530                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8531                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8532                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8533                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8534                                  ;      else
  8535                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8536                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8537                                  ;      endif
  8538                                  ;    endif
  8539                                  ;  endif
  8540                                  
  8541                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8542 00000186 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8543 0000018B 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8544 0000018D 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8545 0000018F 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8546 00000191 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8547 00000193 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8548 00000195 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8549 00000197 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8550                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8551                                  
  8552                                  not_ext:				
  8553 00000199 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8554 0000019B 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8555                                  alt_save:				
  8556 0000019D 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8557                                  keyret:					
  8558 000001A1 C3                      		retn
  8559                                  
  8560                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8561                                  
  8562                                  ;************************************************************************
  8563                                  ;*									*
  8564                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8565                                  ;*									*
  8566                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8567                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8568                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8569                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8570                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8571                                  ;*									*
  8572                                  ;************************************************************************
  8573                                  
  8574                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8575                                  con_rdnd:				
  8576 000001A2 A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8577 000001A5 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8578 000001A7 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8579 000001A9 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8580 000001AD CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8581 000001AF 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8582 000001B1 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8583 000001B6 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8584 000001B8 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8585                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8586 000001BC 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8587                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8588 000001C1 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8589 000001C3 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8590 000001C6 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8591 000001C8 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8592                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8593                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8594                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8595                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8596 000001CA F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8597 000001CB B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8598 000001CD C3                      		retn
  8599                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8600                                  
  8601                                  gotchr:					
  8602 000001CE 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8603 000001D0 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8604 000001D2 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8605 000001D6 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8606 000001D8 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8607                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8608                                  
  8609                                  notbrk:					
  8610 000001DA 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8611 000001DD 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8612 000001DF B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8613 000001E1 EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8615                                  
  8616                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8617 000001E3 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8618 000001E8 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8619 000001EA 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8620 000001EC 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8621 000001EE 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8622 000001F1 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8623 000001F3 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8624                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8625                                  rdexit:					
  8626 000001F5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8627 000001F9 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8628                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8629                                  bc_exvec:				
  8630 000001FD F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8631                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8632 000001FE C3                      		retn
  8633                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8634                                  
  8635                                  ;************************************************************************
  8636                                  ;*									*
  8637                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8638                                  ;*									*
  8639                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8640                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8641                                  ;*									*
  8642                                  ;************************************************************************
  8643                                  
  8644                                  con_writ:
  8645                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8646 000001FF E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8647                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8648                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8649                                  con_lp:					
  8650 00000201 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8651 00000204 47                      		inc	di
  8652 00000205 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8653                                  					; AL = character to display
  8654 00000207 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8655                                  cc_ret:					
  8656 00000209 F8                      		clc
  8657 0000020A C3                      		retn
  8658                                  
  8659                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8660                                  
  8661                                  ;************************************************************************
  8662                                  ;*									*
  8663                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8664                                  ;*									*
  8665                                  ;************************************************************************
  8666                                  
  8667                                  con_flush:
  8668 0000020B C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8669                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8670 00000210 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8671 00000212 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8672                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8673                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8674                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8675 00000214 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8676 00000216 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8677 00000218 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8678                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8679 0000021A EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8680                                  
  8681                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8682                                  
  8683                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8684                                  
  8685                                  ;************************************************************************
  8686                                  ;*									*
  8687                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8688                                  ;*									*
  8689                                  ;************************************************************************
  8690                                  
  8691                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8692                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8693                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8694                                  
  8695                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8696                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8697                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8698                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8699                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8700                                  ;
  8701                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8702                                  
  8703                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8704                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8705                                  
  8706                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8707                                  
  8708                                  ;************************************************************************
  8709                                  ;*									*
  8710                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8711                                  ;*									*
  8712                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8713                                  ;*									*
  8714                                  ;************************************************************************
  8715                                  
  8716                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8717 0000021C E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8718                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8719                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8720                                  prn_done:
  8721 0000021F F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8722 00000220 C3                      		retn
  8723                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8724                                  
  8725                                  ;************************************************************************
  8726                                  ;*									*
  8727                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8728                                  ;*									*
  8729                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8730                                  ;*									*
  8731                                  ;************************************************************************
  8732                                  
  8733                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8734                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8735 00000221 E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8736                                  prn_loop:				
  8737 00000223 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8738                                  prn_out:				
  8739 00000226 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8740 00000229 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8741 0000022B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8742 0000022E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8743 00000230 E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8744 00000233 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8745 00000235 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8746 00000238 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8747 0000023A B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8748 0000023C C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8749 00000241 EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8750                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8751                                  
  8752                                  _prnwf:					
  8753 00000243 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8754 00000246 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8755                                  TestPrnError:				
  8756 00000248 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8757 00000249 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8758                                  pmessg:					
  8759 0000024B E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8761                                  
  8762                                  prn_con:				
  8763 0000024E 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8764 0000024F E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8765                                  ;prn_done:				
  8766                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8767                                  prn_done2:
  8768                                  		;clc
  8769                                  		; cf=0
  8770 00000251 C3                      		retn
  8771                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8772                                  
  8773                                  ;************************************************************************
  8774                                  ;*									*
  8775                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8776                                  ;*									*
  8777                                  ;************************************************************************
  8778                                  
  8779                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8780 00000252 E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8781 00000255 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8782 00000257 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8783                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8784                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8785 0000025A 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8786 0000025C E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8788                                  
  8789                                  ;************************************************************************
  8790                                  ;*									*
  8791                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8792                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8793                                  ;*									*
  8794                                  ;************************************************************************
  8795                                  
  8796                                  prnstat:				
  8797 0000025F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8798                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8799                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8800                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8801                                  
  8802                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8803                                  
  8804                                  ;************************************************************************
  8805                                  ;*									*
  8806                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8807                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8808                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8809                                  ;*									*
  8810                                  ;************************************************************************
  8811                                  
  8812                                  prnop:	
  8813 00000261 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8814 00000265 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8815                                  
  8816                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8817                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8818                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8819                                  
  8820 00000267 50                      		push	ax
  8821 00000268 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8822 0000026B 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8823 0000026E 58                      		pop	ax
  8824 0000026F 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8825 00000271 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8826 00000274 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8827                                  
  8828                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8829                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8830                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8831                                  
  8832                                  NextTest:				
  8833 00000277 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8834                                  					; i/o error?
  8835 0000027A 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8836                                  
  8837                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8838                                  
  8839 0000027C B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8840                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8841 0000027E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8842 00000281 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8843 00000283 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8844                                  ret1:					
  8845 00000285 C3                      		retn
  8846                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8847                                  
  8848                                  checknotready:				
  8849 00000286 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8850 00000288 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8851 0000028B C3                      		retn
  8852                                  
  8853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8854                                  
  8855                                  ;************************************************************************
  8856                                  ;*									*
  8857                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8858                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8859                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8860                                  ;*									*
  8861                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8862                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8863                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8864                                  ;*									*
  8865                                  ;************************************************************************
  8866                                  
  8867                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8868                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8869 0000028C 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8870                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8871 0000028E 51                      		push	cx
  8872 0000028F 53                      		push	bx
  8873 00000290 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8874 00000292 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8875 00000296 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8876                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8877 00000298 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8878 0000029C 5B                      		pop	bx
  8879                                  prn_getstat:				
  8880 0000029D E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8881 000002A0 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8882 000002A2 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8883 000002A5 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8884 000002A7 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8885 000002A8 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8886 000002AA 26                      		es
  8887 000002AB AC                      		lodsb
  8888                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8889                                  					; lodsb
  8890 000002AC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8891 000002AE E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8892 000002B1 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8893 000002B3 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8894                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8895                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8896                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8897 000002B5 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8898                                  
  8899                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8900                                  
  8901                                  prn_bperr:				
  8902 000002B6 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8903                                  prn_berr:				
  8904 000002B7 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8905                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8906                                  
  8907                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8908

  8935                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8936 000002BA C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8937 000002BE 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8938                                  					; ioc_pc
  8939 000002C3 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8940                                  
  8941                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8942 000002C5 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

  8944                                  
  8945                                  prnfunc_ok:

  8947 000002CC 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8948 000002D0 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8949                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8950 000002D2 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8951 000002D6 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8952                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8953 000002D8 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8954 000002DC 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8955 000002DE 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8956 000002E0 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count

  8962 000002EB 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8963                                  					; return current retry count
  8964                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8965                                  		; cf=0
  8966                                  		;clc

  8999                                  
  9000                                  ;************************************************************************
  9001                                  ;*									*
  9002                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9003                                  ;*									*
  9004                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9005                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9006                                  ;*									*
  9007                                  ;************************************************************************
  9008                                  
  9009                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9010                                  
  9011                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9012                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9013                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9014                                  
  9015                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9016                                  
  9017                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9018                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9019                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9020                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9021                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9022                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9023                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9024                                  
  9025                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9026                                  
  9027                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9028                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9029                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9030                                  
  9031                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9032                                  
  9033                                  ;************************************************************************
  9034                                  ;*									*
  9035                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9036                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9037                                  ;*									*
  9038                                  ;************************************************************************
  9039                                  
  9040                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9041                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9042 0000030A E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9043 0000030C E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9044 0000030F 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9045 00000311 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9046 00000313 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9047 00000315 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9048                                  aux1:					
  9049 00000317 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9050                                  					; won't return if error
  9051                                  aux2:					
  9052 0000031A AA                      		stosb
  9053 0000031B E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9054                                  exvec2:					
  9055 0000031D F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9056                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9057 0000031E C3                      		retn
  9058                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9059                                  
  9060                                  ;************************************************************************
  9061                                  ;*									*
  9062                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9063                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9064                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9065                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9066                                  ;*									*
  9067                                  ;************************************************************************
  9068                                  
  9069                                  auxin:					
  9070 0000031F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9071 00000321 E83A00                  		call	auxop
  9072 00000324 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9073                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9074                                  		;retn
  9075                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9076 00000327 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9077                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9078                                  
  9079                                  arbad:					
  9080 00000329 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9081                                  		;xor	al, al
  9082                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9083                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9084 0000032A B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9085 0000032C E9ACFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9086                                  
  9087                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9088                                  
  9089                                  ;************************************************************************
  9090                                  ;*									*
  9091                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9092                                  ;*									*
  9093                                  ;************************************************************************
  9094                                  
  9095                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9096 0000032F E85200                  		call	getbx

  9098 00000334 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9099 00000336 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9100 00000338 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9101 0000033B F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9102 0000033E 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9103 00000340 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9104 00000342 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9105 00000344 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9106 00000347 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9107                                  auxdrx:					
  9108 00000349 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9109                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9110                                  
  9111                                  auxbus:					
  9112 0000034C E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9113                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9114                                  
  9115                                  ;************************************************************************
  9116                                  ;*									*
  9117                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  9118                                  ;*									*
  9119                                  ;************************************************************************
  9120                                  
  9121                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
  9122 0000034F E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
  9123 00000352 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9124 00000354 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9125 00000356 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9126 00000359 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9127                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9128                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9129                                  		;clc
  9130 0000035B C3                      		retn
  9131                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9132                                  
  9133                                  ;************************************************************************
  9134                                  ;*									*
  9135                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9136                                  ;*									*
  9137                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9138                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9139                                  ;*									*
  9140                                  ;************************************************************************
  9141                                  
  9142                                  auxstat:				
  9143 0000035C B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9144                                  
  9145                                  		; fall into auxop
  9146                                  
  9147                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9148                                  
  9149                                  ;************************************************************************
  9150                                  ;*									*
  9151                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9152                                  ;*									*
  9153                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9154                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9155                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9156                                  ;*									*
  9157                                  ;************************************************************************
  9158                                  
  9159                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9160 0000035E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9161                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9162                                  					; get port number
  9163 00000362 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9164                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9165                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9166 00000364 C3                      		retn
  9167                                  
  9168                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9169                                  
  9170                                  ;************************************************************************
  9171                                  ;*									*
  9172                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9173                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9174                                  ;*									*
  9175                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9176                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9177                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9178                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9179                                  ;*									*
  9180                                  ;************************************************************************
  9181                                  
  9182                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9183 00000365 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9184 00000368 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9185                                  					; zero out buffer
  9186                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9187                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9188                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9189 0000036B C3                      		retn
  9190                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9191                                  
  9192                                  ;************************************************************************
  9193                                  ;*									*
  9194                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9195                                  ;*									*
  9196                                  ;************************************************************************
  9197                                  
  9198                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9199                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9200 0000036C E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9201                                  aux_loop:				
  9202 0000036E 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9203                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9204 00000371 47                      		inc	di
  9205 00000372 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9206 00000374 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9207 00000377 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9208 0000037A 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9209 0000037C B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9210 0000037E E95AFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9211                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9212                                  
  9213                                  awok:					
  9214 00000381 E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9215                                  					; still	more character to print
  9216                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9217                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9218                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9219 00000383 C3                      		retn
  9220                                  
  9221                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9222                                  
  9223                                  ;************************************************************************
  9224                                  ;*									*
  9225                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9226                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9227                                  ;*									*
  9228                                  ;************************************************************************
  9229                                  
  9230                                  getbx:	
  9231 00000384 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9232                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9233                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9234 00000388 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9235                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9236                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  9237 0000038C C3                      		retn
  9238                                  
  9239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9240                                  
  9241                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9242                                  
  9243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9244                                  ;								:
  9245                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9246                                  ;								:
  9247                                  ;								:
  9248                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9249                                  ;								:
  9250                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9251                                  ;								:
  9252                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9253                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9254                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9255                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9256                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9257                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9258                                  ;								:
  9259                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9260                                  ;								:
  9261                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9262                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9263                                  ;								:
  9264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9265                                  
  9266                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9267                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9268                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9269                                  
  9270                                  ;19/07/2019
  9271                                  ;09/03/2019
  9272                                  
  9273                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9274                                  
  9275                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9276                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9277                                  
  9278 0000038D B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9279 0000038F F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9280 00000391 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9281 00000393 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9282 00000395 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9283 00000398 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9284 0000039A F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9285 0000039C 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9286 0000039E B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9287 000003A0 F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9288 000003A2 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9289 000003A4 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9290 000003A7 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9291 000003A9 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9292 000003AB 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9293                                  
  9294                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9295                                  
  9296 000003AE 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9297 000003AF 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9298 000003B0 BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9299 000003B3 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9300 000003B5 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9301 000003B7 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9302 000003B8 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9303 000003BA 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9304 000003BC 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9305 000003BF 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9306 000003C0 BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9307 000003C3 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9308 000003C5 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9309 000003C7 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9310 000003C9 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9311 000003CB 98                      		cbw
  9312 000003CC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9313 000003CD F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9314 000003CF 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9315 000003D1 CB                      		retf			; far return
  9316                                  
  9317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9318                                  
  9319                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9320                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9321                                  
  9322                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9323                                  ;
  9324                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9325                                  ;
  9326                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9327                                  ;
  9328                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9329                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9330                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9331                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9332                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9333                                  ;
  9334                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9335                                  ;
  9336                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9337                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9338                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9339                                  ;
  9340                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9341                                  
  9342                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9343                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
  9344                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9345 000003D2 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9346 000003D5 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9347                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9348 000003D6 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9349                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9350 000003DB 7423                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9351 000003DD 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9352                                  					; get binary hours
  9353                                  					; convert to bcd
  9354                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9355                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9356                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9357 000003E1 E8E800                  		call	bintobcd
  9358 000003E4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9359 000003E6 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9360                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9361                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9362 000003EA E8DF00                  		call	bintobcd
  9363 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9364 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9365                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9366                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd
  9367 000003F3 E8D600                  		call	bintobcd
  9368                                  
  9369 000003F6 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9370 000003F8 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9371 000003FA FA                      		cli
  9372 000003FB B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9373 000003FD CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9374                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9375                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9376                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set

  9378                                  no_cmos_1:

  9426                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
  9427                                  
  9428                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  9429                                  ;
  9430                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  9431                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  9432                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  9433                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  9434                                  
  9435                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
  9436                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
  9437 00000427 FF36[F004]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
  9438 0000042B 813E[F004]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9439                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  9440 00000431 7308                    		jnb	short century20
  9441                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
  9442                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
  9443                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9444 00000433 C706[F404]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
  9445 00000439 EB0C                    		jmp	short years
  9446                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9447                                  		
  9448                                  century20:				
  9449                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 20
  9450                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 0
  9451                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9452 0000043B C706[F404]1400          		mov	word [base_century], 20
  9453 00000441 812E[F004]891C          		sub	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9454                                  					; adjust daycnt
  9455                                  years:					
  9456 00000447 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9457 00000449 A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9458 0000044C BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  9459                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  9460 0000044F F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  9461 00000451 8916[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  9462 00000455 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  9463 00000457 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  9464 00000459 0006[F504]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  9465 0000045D FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  9466                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9467 00000461 BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
  9468 00000464 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
  9469                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
  9470 00000467 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
  9471 0000046B 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  9472 0000046D FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  9473                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  9474 00000471 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
  9475                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  9476                                  regularyear:	
  9477                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9478 00000475 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365			
  9479                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
  9480 00000476 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9481 0000047A 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  9482 0000047C FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
  9483                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
  9484 00000480 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023 
  9485 00000484 E2EF                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  9486                                  					;
  9487                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9488                                  leapyear:	
  9489 00000486 C606[F704]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
  9490                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  9491                                  					; change month table.
  9492                                  yeardone:				
  9493 0000048B 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  9494 0000048D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9495 0000048F A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9496                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  9497 00000492 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  9498                                  		;mov	cx, 12
  9499                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9500 00000495 B10C                    		mov	cl, 12
  9501                                  months:					
  9502 00000497 FEC3                    		inc	bl
  9503                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9504 00000499 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:04B7h
  9505 0000049B 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  9506                                  					; dh=0
  9507 0000049D 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  9508 0000049F 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  9509 000004A0 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  9510 000004A2 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  9511                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9512                                  month_done:	
  9513 000004A4 C606[F704]1C            		mov	byte [february], 28 ; 08/08/2023
  9514                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 28
  9515                                  					; restore month table value
  9516 000004A9 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  9517 000004AB 8A36[F504]              		mov	dh, [base_year]
  9518 000004AF 8A0E[F404]              		mov	cl, [base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  9519 000004B3 E81600                  		call	bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  9520                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  9521 000004B6 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  9522 000004B8 E81100                  		call	bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  9523 000004BB 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  9524 000004BD E80C00                  		call	bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  9525 000004C0 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  9526 000004C2 E80700                  		call	bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  9527 000004C5 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  9528 000004C7 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt] ; restore original value
  9529 000004CB C3                      		retn

  9532                                  
  9533                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
  9534                                  
  9535                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  9536                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  9537                                  		
  9538 000004CC D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
  9539 000004CE D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
  9540                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0
  9541 000004D0 C3                      		retn
