 11510                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11511                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11512                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11513                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11514                                  
 11515                                  dskerr:					
 11516 00000BDD 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11517 00000BE2 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11518 00000BE4 E80B0D                  		call	checkio
 11519                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11520 00000BE7 803E[2E05]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11521 00000BEC 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11522 00000BEE BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11523 00000BF1 C606[2E05]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11524                                  dochkagain:				
 11525 00000BF6 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11526                                  dskerr0:				
 11527 00000BF9 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11528 00000BFB 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11529                                  					; fnon_removable
 11530 00000C00 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11531 00000C02 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11532 00000C05 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11533                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11534 00000C07 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11535 00000C0A 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11536 00000C0C C706[2C05]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11537                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11538                                  dskerr1:				
 11539 00000C12 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11540                                  		;jmp	retry
 11541                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11542 00000C13 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11543                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11544                                  
 11545                                  write_fault_err:			
 11546 00000C16 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11547                                  					; for write fault error.
 11548 00000C19 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11549                                  
 11550                                  		; fall into harderr
 11551                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11552                                  
 11553                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11554                                  
 11555                                  harderr:				
 11556 00000C1B E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11557                                  harderr2:				
 11558 00000C1E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11559                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11560 00000C23 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11561 00000C27 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11562                                  
 11563                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11564                                  
 11565                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11566                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11567 00000C2B E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11568                                  
 11569                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11570                                  
 11571                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11572                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11573                                  
 11574                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11575                                  normspeed:
 11576 00000C2E 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11577 00000C33 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11578 00000C35 06                      		push	es
 11579 00000C36 50                      		push	ax
 11580 00000C37 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11581 00000C3A C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11582 00000C3E 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11583 00000C42 58                      		pop	ax
 11584 00000C43 07                      		pop	es
 11585 00000C44 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11586 00000C47 06                      		push	es
 11587 00000C48 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11588 00000C4C 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11589                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11590 00000C51 07                      		pop	es
 11591 00000C52 C3                      		retn
 11592                                  
 11593                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11594                                  
 11595                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11596                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11597                                  
 11598                                  fastspeed:		
 11599 00000C53 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11600                                  					; ftoobig
 11601 00000C58 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11602 00000C5A 06                      		push	es
 11603 00000C5B 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11604 00000C5F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11605 00000C61 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11606 00000C65 07                      		pop	es
 11607 00000C66 C3                      		retn
 11608                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11609                                  
 11610                                  notready:				
 11611 00000C67 F9                      		stc
 11612 00000C68 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11613 00000C6A C3                      		retn
 11614                                  
 11615                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11616                                  
 11617                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11618                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11619                                  
 11620                                  maperror:	
 11621 00000C6B 51                      		push	cx
 11622 00000C6C 06                      		push	es
 11623 00000C6D 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11624 00000C6E 07                      		pop	es
 11625 00000C6F 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11626 00000C71 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11627                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11628 00000C74 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11629                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11630 00000C77 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11631 00000C7A F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11632                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11633                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11634                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11635 00000C7C 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11636                                  					; get translation
 11637                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11638                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11639 00000C7F 07                      		pop	es
 11640 00000C80 59                      		pop	cx
 11641 00000C81 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11642 00000C82 C3                      		retn
 11643                                  
 11644                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11645                                  
 11646                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11647                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11648                                  
 11649                                  set_tim:		
 11650 00000C83 50                      		push	ax
 11651 00000C84 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11652                                  
 11653                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11654                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11655                                  
 11656 00000C87 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11657 00000C8B 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11658 00000C8D 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11659                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11660                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11661 00000C91 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11662                                  setaccess:				
 11663 00000C93 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11664 00000C98 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11665 00000C9C 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11666                                  done_set:				
 11667 00000CA0 F8                      		clc
 11668                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11669 00000CA1 58                      		pop	ax
 11670 00000CA2 C3                      		retn
 11671                                  
 11672                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11673                                  
 11674                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11675                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11676                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11677                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11678                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11679                                  
 11680                                  again:	
 11681 00000CA3 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11682 00000CA6 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11683 00000CA9 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11684                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11685 00000CAB 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11686 00000CAC C3                      		retn
 11687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11688                                  
 11689                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11690 00000CAD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11691 00000CAF C3                      		retn

 11705                                  ;
 11706                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11707                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11708                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11709                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11710                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11711                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11712                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11713                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11797                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11798                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11799                                  ;
 11800                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11801                                  ;
 11802                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11803                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11804                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11805                                  ;
 11806                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11807                                  
 11808                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11809                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11810                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11811 00000CE0 E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11812 00000CE3 06                      		push	es
 11813 00000CE4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11814 00000CE8 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11815                                  					; RAWIO
 11816 00000CED 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11817 00000CF1 07                      		pop	es
 11818 00000CF2 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11819                                  
 11820                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11821                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11822                                  
 11823                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11824 00000CF4 BE[B10C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11825                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11826                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11827 00000CF7 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11828 00000CF9 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11829                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11830 00000CFB BE[C40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11831                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11832                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11833                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11834 00000CFE 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11835 00000D00 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11836 00000D02 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11837 00000D05 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11838 00000D07 98                      		cbw
 11839 00000D08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11840 00000D0A 46                      		inc	si
 11841 00000D0B 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11842 00000D0D 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11843                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11844 00000D10 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11845                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11846                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11847 00000D15 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11848 00000D17 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11849                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11850                                  
 11851                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11852                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11853                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11854 00000D18 5A                      		pop	dx
 11855                                  
 11856                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11857 00000D19 E9BDF3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11859

 11862                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11863                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11864                                  ;
 11865                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11866                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11867                                  ;
 11868                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11869                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11870                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11871                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11872                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11873                                  
 11874                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11875                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11876                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11877                                  
 11878 00000D1C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11879 00000D20 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11880                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11881 00000D23 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11882 00000D27 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11883 00000D2A 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11884 00000D2E 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11885                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11886 00000D31 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11887 00000D34 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11888 00000D38 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11889 00000D3B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11890 00000D3D 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11891                                  					
 11892                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11893 00000D40 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11894 00000D43 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11895                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11896 00000D46 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11897 00000D48 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11898 00000D49 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11899                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11900                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11901                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11902 00000D4E E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11903 00000D51 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11904 00000D54 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11905 00000D55 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11906 00000D57 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11907                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11908                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11909 00000D5A 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11910                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11911 00000D5D B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11912                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11913 00000D60 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11914 00000D61 06                      		push	es
 11915 00000D62 1F                      		pop	ds
 11916 00000D63 07                      		pop	es
 11917 00000D64 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11918                                  		
 11919                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11920                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11921                                  		;clc
 11922                                  GetParmRet:				
 11923 00000D66 C3                      		retn
 11924                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11925                                  
 11926                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11927                                  ; 16/10/2022

 11930                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11931                                  ;
 11932                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive

 11936                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 11937 00000D67 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header

 12095                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12096                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12097                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12098                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12099                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12100                                  ;
 12101                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12102                                  ;
 12103                                  ; output:
 12104                                  ;	for status call:
 12105                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12106                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12107                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12108                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12109                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12110                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12111                                  ;
 12112                                  ;	for format track:
 12113                                  ;		carry set if error
 12114                                  ;
 12115                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12116                                  
 12117                                  ; 16/03/2019

 12271                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12272                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is

 12354                                  ;
 12355                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12356                                  
 12357                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 12358                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 12359                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 12360                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 12361                                  		
 12362                                  		; 19/10/2022	
 12363 00000F6A 06                      		push	es
 12364 00000F6B C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header
 12365 00000F6F 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12366 00000F73 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 12367 00000F77 A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax
 12368 00000F7A 268B4701                		mov	ax, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_HEAD]
 12369 00000F7E A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; Assume heads < 256!!!
 12370 00000F81 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 12371 00000F85 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 12372 00000F89 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 12373                                  					; Get transfer address
 12374                                  
 12375                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 12376

 12378 00000F91 07                      		pop	es
 12379                                  
 12380                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 12381                                  
 12382                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12385                                  
 12386                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12387                                  ;
 12388                                  ; TrackIo:
 12389                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12390                                  ;
 12391                                  ;   input:
 12392                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12393                                  ;		  3 = write
 12394                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12395                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12396                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12397                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12398                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12399                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12400                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12401                                  ;
 12402                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12403                                  
 12404                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12405                                  		
 12406                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12407                                  TrackIo:	
 12408                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12409 00000F92 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12410 00000F96 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12411 00000F99 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12412                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12413 00000F9E 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12414 00000FA0 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12415 00000FA1 51                      		push	cx
 12416 00000FA2 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12417 00000FA5 59                      		pop	cx
 12418 00000FA6 58                      		pop	ax
 12419                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12420 00000FA7 BE[3305]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12421 00000FAA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12422 00000FAC D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12423 00000FAE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12424                                  
 12425                                  		; WE WANT:
 12426                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12427                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12428                                  		
 12429 00000FB0 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12430                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12431 00000FB3 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12432                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12433                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12434 00000FB8 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12435                                  		
 12436 00000FBA 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12437                                  ionextsector:				
 12438 00000FBC 51                      		push	cx
 12439 00000FBD 52                      		push	dx
 12440 00000FBE 46                      		inc	si
 12441 00000FBF 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12442                                  					; the track table
 12443 00000FC0 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12444 00000FC1 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12445                                  
 12446                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12447                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12448                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12449                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12450                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12451                                  		
 12452                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12453 00000FC4 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12454                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12455                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12456 00000FC9 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12457                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12459                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12460                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12461 00000FD0 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12462 00000FD2 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12463 00000FD6 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12464 00000FD8 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12465 00000FDB 5A                      		pop	dx
 12466 00000FDC 59                      		pop	cx
 12467 00000FDD F8                      		clc
 12468 00000FDE C3                      		retn
 12469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12470                                  
 12471                                  IoRemovable:				
 12472 00000FDF AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12473                                  					; table	and save it
 12474 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 12475 00000FE1 56                      		push	si
 12476 00000FE2 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12477 00000FE3 50                      		push	ax
 12478 00000FE4 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 12479                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12480 00000FE8 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]

 12482 00000FEF 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12483 00000FF2 58                      		pop	ax
 12484 00000FF3 1F                      		pop	ds

 12486 00000FF6 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12487 00000FF9 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk
 12488 00000FFC 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 12489                                  					; sector size
 12490 00000FFD 58                      		pop	ax
 12491

 12493                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 12494 00000FFE 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12495 00001000 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12496 00001003 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12497

 12499 00001007 5A                      		pop	dx
 12500 00001008 59                      		pop	cx

 12502 0000100B 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12504                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12507                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12508                                  NoNeedDone:

 12515                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12516                                  ;
 12517                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12518                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12519                                  ; are permissible.
 12520                                  ;

 12522                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12523                                  ; All other registers preserved

 12554                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12555                                  ;
 12556                                  ; SetDASD
 12557                                  ;
 12558                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12559                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12560                                  ;
 12561                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12562                                  ;
 12563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12564                                  
 12565                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12566                                  SetDasd:
 12567 00001017 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12568                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12569 0000101C 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12570                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12571 0000101E 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12572                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12573                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12574 00001023 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12575                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12576 00001025 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12577                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12578                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12579                                  DoSetDasd:
 12580 0000102A C606[3106]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12581 0000102F C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12582 00001034 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12583                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12584 00001036 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12585 0000103A 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12586                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12587                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12588 0000103D 7415                    		jz	short DoSet
 12589 0000103F 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12590                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12591                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12592                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12593 00001042 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12594                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12595                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12596 00001044 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12597                                  
 12598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12599                                  
 12600                                  GotBig:
 12601                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12602                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12603 00001046 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12604 00001047 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12605 0000104C 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12606                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12607                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12608                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12609                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12620

 12623                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12624

 12626                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12627 00001062 5E                      		pop	si
 12628 00001063 1F                      		pop	ds
 12629 00001064 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12630 00001066 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12631 0000106A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12632                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12633                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12634 0000106C 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12635 00001070 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12636 00001074 C3                      		retn
 12637                                  
 12638                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12639                                  
 12640                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12641                                  
 12642                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12643                                  ;
 12644                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12645                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12646                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12647                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12648                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12649                                  ;
 12650                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12651                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12652                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12653                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12654                                  ;
 12655                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12656                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12657                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12658                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12659                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12660                                  ;
 12661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12662                                  
 12663                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12664                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12665 00001075 51                      		push	cx
 12666 00001076 52                      		push	dx
 12667                                  
 12668                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12669                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12670                                  
 12671 00001077 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12672 0000107C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12673 0000107E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12674 00001080 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12675 00001085 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12676 00001087 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12677                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12678                                  
 12679                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12680 00001089 06                      		push	es
 12681 0000108A 56                      		push	si
 12682                                  
 12683                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12684                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12685 0000108B 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12686 0000108D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12687                                  
 12688 0000108F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12689                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12690                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12691 00001094 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12692 00001098 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12693                                  
 12694                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12695                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12696                                  
 12697 0000109C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12698 000010A1 5E                      		pop	si
 12699 000010A2 07                      		pop	es
 12700                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12701 000010A3 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12702 000010A7 49                      		dec	cx
 12703 000010A8 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12704 000010AB D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12705 000010AD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12706 000010AF 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12707 000010B1 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12708 000010B5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12709 000010B9 06                      		push	es
 12710 000010BA 1E                      		push	ds
 12711 000010BB 56                      		push	si
 12712 000010BC 57                      		push	di
 12713 000010BD B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12714 000010BF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12715                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12716 000010C1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12717 000010C3 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12718 000010C8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12719 000010CA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12720                                  
 12721                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12722                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12723 000010CB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12724 000010CD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12725 000010CF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12726                                  
 12727 000010D0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12728                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12729                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12730 000010D5 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12731 000010D9 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12732                                  
 12733                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12734                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12735                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12736                                  		;mov	es, si
 12737 000010DD 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12738                                  
 12739                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12740 000010DE 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12741                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12742 000010E3 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12743 000010E8 C606[3006]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12744                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12745 000010ED 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code

 12748 000010F2 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet

 12754

 12756                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12757 000010F9 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12758 000010FB 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR

 12775                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12776                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12777                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12778                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 12782                                  		; 10/12/2022

 12791                                  SetMediaRet:

 12795                                  
 12796                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12797                                  
 12798                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12799                                  
 12800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12801                                  ;
 12802                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12803                                  ;
 12804                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12805                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12806                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12807                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12808                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12809                                  ;
 12810                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12811                                  
 12812                                  ResetDisk:
 12813 00001109 50                      		push	ax
 12814                                  
 12815                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12838                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12839                                  ;
 12840                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12841                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12842                                  ;
 12843                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12844                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12845                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12846                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12847                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12848                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12849                                  ;
 12850                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12851                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12852                                  ;
 12853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12854                                  
 12855                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12856                                  ToRom:	
 12857 0000111F 53                      		push	bx
 12858 00001120 56                      		push	si
 12859                                  
 12860                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12861                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12862                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12863                                  
 12864 00001121 F606[3006]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12865 00001126 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt

 12869                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?

 12873 00001134 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12875                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12876 00001139 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si

 12888 00001155 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK

 12890                                  MotorStrtOK:

 12892 0000115D 58                      		pop	ax

 12902 00001174 5E                      		pop	si
 12903 00001175 5B                      		pop	bx

 12912                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12913                                  ;
 12914                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12915                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12916                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12917                                  ;
 12918                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12920                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12921                                  ioctl_getown:
 12922 00001177 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12923 0000117A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12924                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12925 0000117E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12926                                  ownloop:				
 12927 00001182 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12928 00001186 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12929                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12930 00001188 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12931                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12932                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12933 0000118D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12934                                  getnextBDS:				
 12935 0000118F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12936 00001192 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12937                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12938                                  
 12939                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12940                                  ;
 12941                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12942                                  ; in al to al.
 12943                                  ;
 12944                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12945                                  
 12946                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12951 0000119C E839F7                  		call	checksingle

 12953 0000119F FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12954                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12955                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12956                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12957

 12961                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.

 12982                                  		;clc

 13037                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13038                                  ;	get media id
 13039                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13040                                  ;
 13041                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13042                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13043                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13044                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13045                                  ;
 13046                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13047                                  ;
 13048                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13049                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13050                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13051                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13052                                  ;
 13053                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13054                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13055                                  ;
 13056                                  ; LOGIC:
 13057                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13058                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13059                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13060                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13061                                  ;
 13062                                  ; {
 13063                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13064                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13065                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13066                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13067                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13068                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13069                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13070                                  ;		};
 13071                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13072                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13073                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13074                                  ;		};
 13075                                  ;	else
 13076                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13077                                  ;
 13078                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13079                                  
 13080                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13081                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13082                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13083                                  
 13084                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13085                                  GetMediaId:
 13086 000011E8 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13087 000011EB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13088 000011EF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13089 000011F4 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13090 000011F7 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13091                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13092 000011F9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13093                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13094 000011FE 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13095                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13096 00001200 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13097 00001203 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13098                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13099                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13100 00001206 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13101 00001208 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13102 0000120C 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13103                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13104 00001210 46                      		inc	si
 13105                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13106                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13107 00001211 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13108 00001214 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13109                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13110                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13111 00001217 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13112                                  	
 13113                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13114                                  		; cf = 0
 13115                                  		;clc
 13116                                  
 13117 00001219 C3                      		retn
 13118                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13119                                  
 13120                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 13121 0000121A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13122 0000121C F9                      		stc
 13123                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 13124 0000121D C3                      		retn
 13125                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13126                                  
 13127                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13128                                  
 13129                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13130                                  ;  set media id
 13131                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13132                                  
 13133                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13134                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13135                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13136                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13137                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13138                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13139                                  ;
 13140                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13141                                  ;
 13142                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13143                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13144                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13145                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13146                                  ;
 13147                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13148                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13149                                  ;
 13150                                  ; logic:
 13151                                  ;
 13152                                  ; {
 13153                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13154                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13155                                  ;	BootIo;
 13156                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13157                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13158                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13159                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13160                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13161                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13162                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13163                                  ;		};
 13164                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13165                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13166                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13167                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13168                                  ;		};
 13169                                  ;	else
 13170                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13171                                  ;
 13172                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13173                                  
 13174                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13175                                  SetMediaId:
 13176 0000121E E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13177 00001221 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13178                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13179 00001225 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13180 00001227 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13181 0000122C 52                      		push	dx
 13182 0000122D E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13183 00001230 5A                      		pop	dx
 13184 00001231 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13185                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13186 00001233 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13187                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13188 00001238 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13189 0000123A 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13190                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13191 0000123F 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13192 00001241 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13193 00001242 57                      		push	di
 13194 00001243 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13195 00001244 07                      		pop	es
 13196 00001245 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13197 00001248 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13198 0000124C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13199 0000124F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13200 00001252 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13201                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13202                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13203 00001255 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13204 00001257 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13205 00001258 1F                      		pop	ds
 13206 00001259 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13207 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 13208 0000125B E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13209 0000125E 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13210 00001260 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13211 00001265 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13212 00001268 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13213                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13214                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13215 0000126D C3                      		retn
 13216                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13217                                  
 13218                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13219 0000126E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13220 00001270 F9                      		stc
 13221                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13222 00001271 C3                      		retn
 13223                                  
 13224                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13225                                  
 13226                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13227                                  
 13228                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13229                                  ;	BootIo
 13230                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13231                                  ;
 13232                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13233                                  ;
 13234                                  ; input :
 13235                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13236                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13237                                  ;
 13238                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13239                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13240                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13241                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13242                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13243                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13244                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13245                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13246                                  ;
 13247                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13248                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13249                                  ;
 13250                                  ; logic:
 13251                                  ;
 13252                                  ; {
 13253                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13254                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13255                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13256                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13257                                  ; }
 13258                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13259                                  
 13260                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13261                                  BootIo:	
 13262 00001272 06                      		push	es
 13263 00001273 57                      		push	di
 13264 00001274 53                      		push	bx
 13265 00001275 1E                      		push	ds
 13266 00001276 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13267                                  
 13268                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13269                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13270                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13271                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13272                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13273                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13274                                  
 13275 00001277 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13276 0000127A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13277 0000127C 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13278 00001280 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13279 00001283 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13280 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 13281 00001287 5F                      		pop	di
 13282 00001288 07                      		pop	es
 13283 00001289 C3                      		retn
 13284
