 14198 0000154A 80D700                  		adc	bh, 0		; find entry for this drive
 14199 0000154D 26C60793                		mov	byte [es:bx], 93h ; establish drive type as:
 14200                                  					; (360k	disk in	360k drive,
 14201                                  					; no double-stepping, 250 kbs transfer rate)
 14202 00001551 07                      		pop	es
 14203 00001552 5B                      		pop	bx
 14204 00001553 EB2E                    		jmp	short ec35_special_stuff_done
 14205                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14206                                  
 14207                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14208                                  
 14209                                  ; ps2_30 machine has some problem with ah=8h (read drive parm), int 13h.
 14210                                  ; this function does not reset the common buses after the execution.
 14211                                  ; to solve this problem, when we detect ah=8h, then we will save the result and
 14212                                  ; will issue ah=1 (read status) call to reset the buses.
 14213                                  
 14214                                  ps2_special_stuff:			
 14215 00001555 803E[1E00]08            		cmp	byte [prevoper], 8 ; (ps2_30)
 14216                                  					; read driver parm ?
 14217 0000155A 7407                    		jz	short ps2_30_problem
 14218 0000155C 803E[1E00]15            		cmp	byte [prevoper], 15h
 14219                                  					; apparently function 15h fails, too
 14220 00001561 752D                    		jnz	short ps2_special_stuff_done
 14221                                  ps2_30_problem:				
 14222 00001563 50                      		push	ax
 14223 00001564 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 14224                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1543h
 14225                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14226 00001566 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14227                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far 70:797h
 14228                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14229 0000156B 58                      		pop	ax
 14230 0000156C EB22                    		jmp	short ps2_special_stuff_done
 14231                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14232                                  
 14233                                  ; 17/10/2022
 14234                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14235                                  
 14236                                  ; here is the actual int13 handler
 14237                                  
 14238                                  i13z:					; 0070h:3ABBh =	02C7h:154Bh
 14239                                  
 14240                                  ; cas -- inefficient! could push ds and load ds-> Bios_Data before
 14241                                  ; vectoring up here from Bios_Data
 14242                                  
 14243                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14244 0000156E 1E                      		push	ds		; save caller's ds register first thing
 14245                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
 14246                                  					; and set up our own ds -> Bios_Data
 14247 0000156F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14248                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 14249                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 14250                                  
 14251                                  ; let the operation proceed. if there is a dma violation, then we do things
 14252                                  
 14253 00001574 A3[1E00]                		mov	[prevoper], ax	; save request
 14254 00001577 80FC05                  		cmp	ah, 5		; romformat
 14255 0000157A 74A0                    		jz	short format_special_stuff
 14256                                  					; go do special stuff for format
 14257                                   format_special_stuff_done:		
 14258 0000157C 803E[2905]00            		cmp	byte [ec35flag], 0 ; any electrically compat 3.5 inchers?
 14259 00001581 75AA                    		jnz	short ec35_special_stuff
 14260                                  					; go handle it out of line if so
 14261                                  ec35_special_stuff_done:
 14262                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1560h		
 14263 00001583 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14264                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14265                                  		
 14266 00001588 9C                      		pushf			; save result flags
 14267                                  		
 14268 00001589 803E[3606]FA            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0FAh ; is this a ps2/30?
 14269                                  					; mdl_ps2_30
 14270 0000158E 74C5                    		jz	short ps2_special_stuff
 14271                                  					; exit mainline to address special
 14272                                  ps2_special_stuff_done:			; ps2/30 problem if so		
 14273 00001590 9D                      		popf
 14274 00001591 7221                    		jb	short goterr13	; error	on original orig13 call-thru?
 14275                                  ret_from_i13:				
 14276 00001593 1F                      		pop	ds
 14277 00001594 CA0200                  		retf	2		; restore ds &	iret w/flags
 14278                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14279                                  
 14280                                  ; most of our code exits through here. If carry isn't set, then
 14281                                  ; just do a simple exit. Else doublecheck that we aren't getting
 14282                                  ; a changeline error.
 14283                                  
 14284                                  i13ret_ck_chglinerr:			
 14285 00001597 73FA                    		jnb	short ret_from_i13 ; done if not an error termination
 14286                                  i13_ret_error:				
 14287 00001599 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6		; did i	see a change event?
 14288 0000159C 7513                    		jnz	short int13b	; skip if wrong	error
 14289 0000159E 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; is this for the hard disk?
 14290 000015A0 780F                    		js	short int13b	; yes, ignore
 14291 000015A2 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 14292 000015A7 7408                    		jz	short int13b	; just in case ROM returned this
 14293                                  					; error	even though it told us it
 14294                                  					; never	would
 14295 000015A9 53                      		push	bx
 14296 000015AA BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 14297 000015AD E8B703                  		call	set_changed_dl
 14298 000015B0 5B                      		pop	bx
 14299                                  int13b:					
 14300 000015B1 F9                      		stc			; now return the error
 14301 000015B2 EBDF                    		jmp	short ret_from_i13
 14302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14303                                  
 14304                                  ; some kind of error occurred. see if it is dma violation
 14305                                  
 14306                                  goterr13:				
 14307 000015B4 80FC09                  		cmp	ah, 9		; dma error?
 14308 000015B7 747C                    		jz	short gotdmaerr
 14309                                  goterr13_xxxx:				
 14310 000015B9 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; ecc error?
 14311 000015BC 75DB                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error ; other error. just	return back.
 14312 000015BE 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1 ; formatting?
 14313 000015C3 74D4                    		jz	short i13_ret_error
 14314                                  
 14315 000015C5 803E[1F00]02            		cmp	byte [prevoper+1], 2
 14316                                  		;cmp	byte ptr ds:prevoper+1,	2 ; ecc-corrected error
 14317                                  					; (2 = romread)
 14318                                  					; ECC correction only applies to reads
 14319 000015CA 75CD                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error
 14320                                  
 14321 000015CC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 14322                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15ABh
 14323                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14324 000015CE 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14325                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14326                                  					; call far 70:797h
 14327 000015D3 A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]
 14328 000015D6 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; return code =	no error
 14329 000015D8 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		; if request for one sector, assume ok
 14330 000015DA 74B7                    		jz	short ret_from_i13 ; return with carry clear
 14331 000015DC 53                      		push	bx
 14332 000015DD 51                      		push	cx
 14333 000015DE 52                      		push	dx
 14334 000015DF A2[2000]                		mov	[number_of_sec], al
 14335                                  loop_ecc:				
 14336 000015E2 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 14337                                  
 14338                                  ; we do reads one sector at a time. this ensures that we will eventually
 14339                                  ; finish the request since ecc errors on one sector do read in that sector.
 14340                                  ;
 14341                                  ; we need to put in some "intelligence" into the ecc handler to handle reads
 14342                                  ; that attempt to read more sectors than are available on a particular
 14343                                  ; track.
 14344                                  ;
 14345                                  ; we call check_wrap to set up the sector #, head # and cylinder # for
 14346                                  ; this request.
 14347                                  ;
 14348                                  ; at this point, all registers are set up for the call to orig13, except
 14349                                  ; that there may be a starting sector number that is bigger than the number
 14350                                  ; of sectors on a track.
 14351                                  ;
 14352 000015E5 E88FFE                  		call	check_wrap	; get correct parameters for int 13
 14353                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15C5h
 14354                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14355 000015E8 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14356                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14357 000015ED 730C                    		jnb	short ok11_op
 14358 000015EF 80FC09                  		cmp	ah, 9		; DMA error during ECC read?
 14359 000015F2 741B                    		jz	short handle_dma_during_ecc
 14360 000015F4 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; only allow ecc errors
 14361 000015F7 7510                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err
 14362                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14363                                  		; xor ax ax -> ah = 0
 14364                                  		;mov	ah, 0		; ecc error. reset the system again.
 14365 000015F9 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; clear	the error code so that if this
 14366                                  					; was the last sector, no error	code
 14367                                  					; will be returned for the corrected
 14368                                  					; read.	(clear carry too.)
 14369                                  ok11_op:				
 14370 000015FB FE0E[2000]              		dec	byte [number_of_sec]
 14371 000015FF 7409                    		jz	short ok11_exit	; all done?
 14372 00001601 FEC1                    		inc	cl		; advance sector number
 14373                                  					; add 200h to address
 14374 00001603 FEC7                    		inc	bh
 14375 00001605 FEC7                    		inc	bh
 14376 00001607 EBD9                    		jmp	short loop_ecc
 14377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14378                                  
 14379                                  ; locate error returns centrally
 14380                                  
 14381                                  ok11_exit_err:				
 14382 00001609 F9                      		stc			; set carry bit again.
 14383                                  ok11_exit:				
 14384 0000160A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14385 0000160B 59                      		pop	cx
 14386 0000160C 5B                      		pop	bx
 14387 0000160D EB88                    		jmp	short i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 14388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14389                                  
 14390                                  ; do the single sector read again, this time into our temporary
 14391                                  ; buffer, which is guaranteed not to have a DMA error, then
 14392                                  ; move the data to its proper location and proceed
 14393                                  
 14394                                  handle_dma_during_ecc:			
 14395 0000160F 06                      		push	es
 14396 00001610 53                      		push	bx
 14397 00001611 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14398 00001614 1E                      		push	ds
 14399 00001615 07                      		pop	es		; point es:bx to buffer
 14400 00001616 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 14401                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15F8h
 14402                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14403 00001619 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14404                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14405 0000161E 5B                      		pop	bx
 14406 0000161F 07                      		pop	es
 14407 00001620 7305                    		jnb	short handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr
 14408 00001622 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h
 14409 00001625 75E2                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err ; if anything but ecc error, bomb out
 14410                                  
 14411                                  ; now we're kosher. Copy the data to where it belongs and resume
 14412                                  ; the ECC looping code.
 14413                                  
 14414                                  handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr:		
 14415 00001627 56                      		push	si
 14416 00001628 57                      		push	di
 14417 00001629 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 14418 0000162B BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 14419 0000162E E82BFE                  		call	move_sector
 14420 00001631 5F                      		pop	di
 14421 00001632 5E                      		pop	si
 14422 00001633 EBC6                    		jmp	short ok11_op
 14423                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14424                                  
 14425                                  ; we truly have a dma violation. restore register ax and retry the
 14426                                  ; operation as best we can.
 14427                                  
 14428                                  gotdmaerr:				
 14429 00001635 A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]	; 19/10/2022
 14430 00001638 FB                      		sti
 14431 00001639 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 14432 0000163C 723B                    		jb	short i13_done_dmaerr
 14433                                  					; just pass dma error thru for
 14434                                  					; functions we don't handle
 14435 0000163E 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 14436 00001641 743C                    		jz	short intverify
 14437 00001643 80FC05                  		cmp	ah, 5		; romformat
 14438 00001646 7448                    		jz	short intformat
 14439 00001648 772F                    		ja	short i13_done_dmaerr
 14440                                  
 14441                                  ; we are doing a read/write call. check for dma problems
 14442                                  
 14443                                  ;	******** set up stack frame here!!! ********
 14444                                  
 14445 0000164A 52                      		push	dx
 14446 0000164B 51                      		push	cx
 14447 0000164C 53                      		push	bx
 14448 0000164D 50                      		push	ax
 14449 0000164E 55                      		push	bp
 14450 0000164F 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 14451 00001651 8CC2                    		mov	dx, es		; check	for 64k	boundary error
 14452 00001653 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14453 00001655 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14454 00001657 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14455 00001659 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1		; segment converted to absolute	address
 14456 0000165B 01DA                    		add	dx, bx		; combine with offset
 14457 0000165D 81C2FF01                		add	dx, 511		; simulate a transfer
 14458                                  
 14459                                  ; if carry is set, then we are within 512 bytes of the end of the segment.
 14460                                  ; we skip the first transfer and perform the remaining buffering and transfer
 14461                                  
 14462 00001661 7303                    		jnb	short no_skip_first
 14463 00001663 E98300                  		jmp	bufferx		; restore dh=head & do buffer
 14464                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14465                                  
 14466                                  no_skip_first:				
 14467 00001666 D0EE                    		shr	dh, 1		; dh = number of sectors before	address
 14468 00001668 B480                    		mov	ah, 128		; ah = max number of sectors in	segment
 14469 0000166A 28F4                    		sub	ah, dh
 14470                                  
 14471                                  ; ah is now the number of sectors that we can successfully write in this
 14472                                  ; segment. if this number is above or equal to the requested number, then we
 14473                                  ; continue the operation as normal. otherwise, we break it into pieces.
 14474                                  ;
 14475                                  ; wait a sec. this is goofy. the whole reason we got here in the
 14476                                  ; first place is because we got a dma error. so it's impossible
 14477                                  ; for the whole block to fit, unless the dma error was returned
 14478                                  ; in error.
 14479                                  
 14480 0000166C 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; can we fit it	in?
 14481 0000166E 7236                    		jb	short doblock	; no, perform blocking.
 14482                                  
 14483                                  ; yes, the request fits. let it happen.
 14484                                  
 14485 00001670 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 14486                                  					; set up head number
 14487 00001673 E888FE                  		call	doint
 14488 00001676 E9D900                  		jmp	bad13		; and return from this place
 14489                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14490                                  
 14491                                  i13_done_dmaerr:			
 14492 00001679 B409                    		mov	ah, 9		; pass dma error thru to caller
 14493 0000167B F9                      		stc
 14494 0000167C E914FF                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; return with error,
 14495                                  					; we know it's not a changeline error
 14496                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14497                                  
 14498                                  ; verify the given sectors. place the buffer pointer into our space.
 14499                                  
 14500                                  intverify:				
 14501 0000167F 06                      		push	es		; save caller's dma address
 14502 00001680 53                      		push	bx
 14503 00001681 1E                      		push	ds		; es:bx	-> Bios_Data:disksector
 14504 00001682 07                      		pop	es
 14505                                  dosimple:				
 14506 00001683 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14507                                  					; do the i/o from Bios_Data:disksector
 14508                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1665h
 14509                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14510 00001686 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14511                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14512 0000168B 5B                      		pop	bx
 14513 0000168C 07                      		pop	es
 14514 0000168D E907FF                  		jmp	i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 14515                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14516                                  
 14517                                  ; format operation. copy the parameter table into Bios_Data:disksector
 14518                                  
 14519                                  intformat:				
 14520 00001690 06                      		push	es
 14521 00001691 53                      		push	bx
 14522 00001692 56                      		push	si
 14523 00001693 57                      		push	di
 14524 00001694 1E                      		push	ds
 14525                                  
 14526                                  ; point ds to the caller's dma buffer, es to Bios_Data
 14527                                  ; in other words, swap (ds, es)
 14528                                  
 14529 00001695 06                      		push	es
 14530 00001696 1E                      		push	ds
 14531 00001697 07                      		pop	es
 14532 00001698 1F                      		pop	ds
 14533 00001699 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
 14534 0000169B BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector
 14535 0000169E E8BBFD                  		call	move_sector	; user's data into Bios_Data:disksector
 14536 000016A1 1F                      		pop	ds
 14537 000016A2 5F                      		pop	di
 14538 000016A3 5E                      		pop	si		; do the i/o from
 14539 000016A4 EBDD                    		jmp	short dosimple	; Bios_Data:disksector
 14540                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14541                                  
 14542                                  ; we can't fit the request into the entire block. perform the operation on
 14543                                  ; the first block.
 14544                                  ;
 14545                                  ; doblock is modified to correctly handle multi-sector disk i/o.
 14546                                  ; old doblock had added the number of sectors i/oed (ah in old doblock) after
 14547                                  ; the doint call to cl. observing only the lower 6 bits of cl(=max. 64) can
 14548                                  ; represent a starting sector, if ah was big, then cl would be clobbered.
 14549                                  ; by the way, we still are going to use cl for this purpose since checkwrap
 14550                                  ; routine will use it as an input. to prevent cl from being clobbered, a
 14551                                  ; safe number of sectors should be calculated like "63 - # of sectors/track".
 14552                                  ; doblock will handle the first block of requested sectors within the
 14553                                  ; boundary of this safe value.
 14554                                  
 14555                                  doblock:
 14556                                  
 14557                                  ; try to get the # of sectors/track from bds via rom drive number.
 14558                                  ; for any mini disks installed, here we have to pray that they have the
 14559                                  ; same # of sector/track as the main dos partition disk drive.
 14560                                  				
 14561 000016A6 8B5608                  		mov	dx, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14562                                  					; get head #, drive #
 14563 000016A9 51                      		push	cx
 14564 000016AA 06                      		push	es
 14565 000016AB 57                      		push	di		; ah - # of sectors before dma boundary
 14566                                  					; al - requested # of sectors for i/o.
 14567 000016AC E83BFE                  		call	find_bds
 14568 000016AF 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14569                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14570 000016B3 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 14571                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags],fnon_removable
 14572 000016B8 5F                      		pop	di
 14573 000016B9 07                      		pop	es
 14574 000016BA 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; set al=ah for	floppies
 14575 000016BC 7404                    		jz	short doblockflop ; they are track by track operation
 14576 000016BE B43F                    		mov	ah, 63		; ah = 63-secpt	(# safe	sectors??)
 14577 000016C0 28CC                    		sub	ah, cl		; al - # of sectors before dma boundary
 14578                                  doblockflop:				
 14579 000016C2 59                      		pop	cx
 14580                                  doblockcontinue:			
 14581 000016C3 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; if safe_# >= #_of_sectors_to_go_before dma,
 14582 000016C5 7305                    		jnb	short doblocklast ; then #_of_sectors_to_go as it is for doint.
 14583 000016C7 50                      		push	ax
 14584 000016C8 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; otherwise, set al to ah to operate.
 14585 000016CA EB03                    		jmp	short doblockdoint
 14586                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14587                                  
 14588                                  doblocklast:				
 14589 000016CC 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 14590 000016CE 50                      		push	ax
 14591                                  doblockdoint:				; let ah = al =	# of sectors for this shot	
 14592 000016CF E82CFE                  		call	doint
 14593 000016D2 727E                    		jb	short bad13	; something happened, bye!
 14594 000016D4 58                      		pop	ax
 14595 000016D5 286602                  		sub	[bp+2],	ah	; sub [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax], ah
 14596                                  					; decrement by the successful operation
 14597 000016D8 00E1                    		add	cl, ah		; advance sector #. safety gauranteed.
 14598 000016DA 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; advance dma addres
 14599 000016DC 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; twice	for 512	byte sectors
 14600 000016DE 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; check	the previous value
 14601 000016E0 740A                    		jz	short buffer	; if #_of_sectors_to_go	< safe_#,
 14602                                  					; then we are done already.
 14603 000016E2 28E0                    		sub	al, ah		; otherwise,
 14604                                  					; #_sector_to_go = #_of_sector_to_go - safe_#
 14605 000016E4 E890FD                  		call	check_wrap	; get new cx, dh for the next operation.
 14606 000016E7 EBDA                    		jmp	short doblockcontinue ;	handles	next sectors left.
 14607                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14608                                  
 14609                                  bufferx:				
 14610 000016E9 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 14611                                  					; set up head number
 14612                                  buffer:					
 14613 000016EC 53                      		push	bx
 14614 000016ED 8A6603                  		mov	ah, [bp+3]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax+1]
 14615 000016F0 80FC03                  		cmp	ah, 3		; romwrite
 14616 000016F3 7525                    		jnz	short doread	;
 14617                                  					
 14618                                  ; copy the offending sector into local buffer
 14619                                  
 14620 000016F5 06                      		push	es
 14621 000016F6 1E                      		push	ds
 14622 000016F7 56                      		push	si
 14623 000016F8 57                      		push	di
 14624 000016F9 1E                      		push	ds		; exchange segment registers
 14625 000016FA 06                      		push	es
 14626 000016FB 1F                      		pop	ds
 14627 000016FC 07                      		pop	es
 14628 000016FD BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; where to move
 14629 00001700 57                      		push	di		; save it
 14630 00001701 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; source
 14631 00001703 E856FD                  		call	move_sector	; move sector into local buffer
 14632 00001706 5B                      		pop	bx		; new transfer address
 14633                                  					; (es:bx = Bios_Data:diskbuffer)
 14634 00001707 5F                      		pop	di		; restore caller's di & si
 14635 00001708 5E                      		pop	si
 14636 00001709 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore Bios_Data
 14637                                  
 14638                                  ; see if we are wrapping around a track or head
 14639                                  
 14640 0000170A B001                    		mov	al, 1		; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14641                                  					; get drive number
 14642 0000170C 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]
 14643 0000170F E865FD                  		call	check_wrap	; sets up registers if wrap-around
 14644                                  					;
 14645                                  					; ah is	function
 14646                                  					; al is	1 for single sector transfer
 14647                                  					; es:bx	is local transfer addres
 14648                                  					; cx is	track/sector number
 14649                                  					; dx is	head/drive number
 14650                                  					; si,di	unchanged
 14651 00001712 E8E9FD                  		call	doint
 14652 00001715 07                      		pop	es		; restore caller's dma segment
 14653 00001716 723A                    		jb	short bad13	; go clean up
 14654 00001718 EB22                    		jmp	short dotail
 14655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14656                                  
 14657                                  ; reading a sector. do int first, then move things around
 14658                                  
 14659                                  doread:					
 14660 0000171A 06                      		push	es
 14661 0000171B 53                      		push	bx
 14662 0000171C 1E                      		push	ds		; es = Bios_Code
 14663 0000171D 07                      		pop	es
 14664 0000171E BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14665 00001721 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 14666 00001723 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14667                                  					; get drive number
 14668 00001726 E84EFD                  		call	check_wrap	;
 14669                                  					; ah = function
 14670                                  					; al = 1 for single sector
 14671                                  					; es:bx	points to local	buffer
 14672                                  					; cx, dx are track/sector, head/drive
 14673 00001729 E8D2FD                  		call	doint
 14674 0000172C 5B                      		pop	bx
 14675 0000172D 07                      		pop	es
 14676 0000172E 7222                    		jb	short bad13
 14677 00001730 56                      		push	si
 14678 00001731 57                      		push	di
 14679 00001732 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 14680 00001734 BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 14681 00001737 E822FD                  		call	move_sector
 14682 0000173A 5F                      		pop	di
 14683 0000173B 5E                      		pop	si
 14684                                  
 14685                                  ; note the fact that we've done 1 more sector
 14686                                  
 14687                                  dotail:					
 14688 0000173C 5B                      		pop	bx		; retrieve new dma area
 14689 0000173D 80C702                  		add	bh, 2		; advance over sector
 14690 00001740 41                      		inc	cx
 14691 00001741 8A4602                  		mov	al, [bp+2]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax]
 14692 00001744 F8                      		clc
 14693 00001745 FEC8                    		dec	al
 14694 00001747 7409                    		jz	short bad13	; no more i/o
 14695                                  
 14696                                  ; see if we wrap around a track or head boundary with starting sector
 14697                                  ; we already have the correct head number to pass to check_wrap
 14698                                  
 14699 00001749 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14700 0000174C E828FD                  		call	check_wrap
 14701 0000174F E8ACFD                  		call	doint
 14702                                  
 14703                                  ; we are done. ax has the final code; we throw away what we got before
 14704                                  
 14705                                  ; M046  -- okay gang. Now we've either terminated our DMA loop,
 14706                                  ;	   or we've finished. If carry is set now, our only
 14707                                  ;	   hope for salvation is that it was a read operation
 14708                                  ;	   and the error code is ECC error. In that case, we'll
 14709                                  ;	   just pop the registers and go do the old ECC thing.
 14710                                  ;	   When the DMA error that got us here in the first
 14711                                  ;	   place occurs, it'll handle it.
 14712                                  
 14713                                  bad13:					
 14714 00001752 89EC                    		mov	sp, bp
 14715 00001754 5D                      		pop	bp
 14716 00001755 5B                      		pop	bx
 14717 00001756 5B                      		pop	bx
 14718 00001757 59                      		pop	cx
 14719 00001758 5A                      		pop	dx
 14720 00001759 7203                    		jb	short xgoterr13_xxxx ; go handle ECC errors
 14721 0000175B E935FE                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; non-error exit
 14722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14723                                  
 14724                                  xgoterr13_xxxx:				
 14725 0000175E E958FE                  		jmp	goterr13_xxxx
 14726                                  
 14727                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14728                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14729                                  		;db 	0
 14730                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14731                                  
 14732                                  ;Bios_Code ends

 14750                                  
 14751                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14752                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14753                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14754                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14755                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14756                                  
 14757                                  install_bds:
 14758 0000176D 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14759 0000176E BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14760                                  
 14761                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14762                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14763                                  loop_next_bds:
 14764 00001771 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14765                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14766 00001773 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14767 00001777 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14768                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14769 0000177A 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14770 0000177C B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14771 0000177E 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14772                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14773 00001782 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14774 00001785 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14775                                  					; we don't own it
 14776 0000178A 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14777                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14778 0000178D 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14779 00001790 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14780                                  next_bds:
 14781                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14782 00001794 B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14783 00001797 3904                    		cmp	[si], ax	; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14784                                  		;cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14785                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14786 00001799 75D6                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14787 0000179B 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14788                                  					; install bds
 14789 0000179E 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14790 000017A0 268905                  		mov	[es:di], ax	; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14791                                  		;mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14792                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14793 000017A3 1F                      		pop	ds
 14794
