 14899                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14900                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14901                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14902                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14903                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14904                                  
 14905                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14906 000017F4 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14907 000017F6 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14907 000017FF 736B6574746520666F-
 14907 00001808 7220647269766520   
 14908                                  
 14909                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14910 00001810 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14910 00001819 65737320616E79206B-
 14910 00001822 6579207768656E2072-
 14910 0000182B 656164790D0A       
 14911 00001831 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14912                                  
 14913                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14914                                  
 14915                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14916                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14917                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14918                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14919                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14920                                  
 14921                                  chkopcnt:		
 14922 00001833 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14923 00001838 C3                      		retn
 14924                                  
 14925                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14926                                  
 14927                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14928                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14929                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14930                                  ;
 14931                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14932                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14933                                  
 14934                                  mediacheck:	
 14935 00001839 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14936 0000183C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14937 0000183E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14938 00001841 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14939 00001843 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14940 00001846 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14941 00001848 50                      		push	ax
 14942 00001849 52                      		push	dx
 14943 0000184A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14944                                  					; set logical drive number
 14945 0000184E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14946 00001850 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14947                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14948                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14949 00001852 5A                      		pop	dx
 14950 00001853 58                      		pop	ax
 14951 00001854 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14952 00001856 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14955                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14956                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14957                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14958                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14959                                  ; status.
 14960                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14961 00001859 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14962 0000185D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14963                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14964                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14965                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14966                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14967 00001861 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14968                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14969                                  
 14970                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14971                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14972                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14973                                  
 14974 00001863 50                      		push	ax
 14975 00001864 51                      		push	cx
 14976 00001865 52                      		push	dx
 14977 00001866 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14978 00001869 5A                      		pop	dx
 14979 0000186A 59                      		pop	cx
 14980 0000186B 58                      		pop	ax
 14981 0000186C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14982 0000186E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14983                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14984 00001870 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14985                                  mediaret:				
 14986 00001872 C3                      		retn
 14987                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14988                                  
 14989                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14990                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14991                                  ; or write.
 14992                                  
 14993                                  mediadovolid:				
 14994 00001873 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14995 00001876 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14996 00001878 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14997 0000187B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14998 0000187D E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14999                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15000                                  
 15001                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15002                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15003                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15004                                  ; dos.
 15005                                  ;
 15006                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15007                                  
 15008                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15009                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15010                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15011                                  
 15012                                  checklatchio:	
 15013                                  
 15014                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15015                                  			
 15016 00001880 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15017 00001883 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15018                                  
 15019                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15020                                  
 15021 00001885 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15022 00001888 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15023                                  
 15024                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15025                                  ; expensive verification.
 15026                                  
 15027 0000188A E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15028 0000188D 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15029 0000188F E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15030 00001892 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15031 00001894 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15032 00001896 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15033 00001898 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15034                                  checklatchret:				
 15035 0000189B E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15036                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15037 0000189E F9                      		stc
 15038 0000189F 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15039                                  checkret:				
 15040 000018A0 C3                      		retn
 15041                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15042                                  
 15043                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15044                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15045                                  ;
 15046                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15047                                  
 15048                                  checkfatvid:				
 15049 000018A1 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15050 000018A4 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15051 000018A6 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15052                                  
 15053                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15054                                  
 15055                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15056                                  
 15057                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15058                                  
 15059                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15060                                  ;
 15061                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15062                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15063                                  ;
 15064                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15065                                  ;
 15066                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15067                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15068                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15069                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15070                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15071                                  ;
 15072                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15073                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15074                                  ; routine.)
 15075                                  ;
 15076                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15077                                  
 15078                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15079                                  check_vid:
 15080                                  
 15081                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15082                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15083                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15084                                  
 15085 000018A8 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15086                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15087                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15088 000018AD 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15089 000018AF E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15090 000018B2 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15091 000018B4 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15092 000018B6 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15093                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15094 000018BB 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15095                                  					; if not fat system
 15096 000018BD E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15097 000018C0 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15098 000018C2 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15099 000018C5 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15100                                  					; definitely changed
 15101 000018C8 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15102                                  
 15103 000018CA 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15104                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15105 000018CB E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15106                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15107                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15108                                  		;clc
 15109                                  checkfatret:				
 15110 000018CE C3                      		retn
 15111                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15112                                  
 15113                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15114                                  changed_drv:
 15115 000018CF F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15116 000018D0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15117                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15118 000018D5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15119                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15120                                  
 15121                                  ; extended id check
 15122                                  
 15123                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15124                                  
 15125                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15126                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15127                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15128                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15129                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15130                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15131                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15132                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15133                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15134                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15135                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15136                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15137                                  ;
 15138                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15139                                  
 15140                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15141                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15142 000018D6 50                      		push	ax
 15143                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15144                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15145 000018D7 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15146                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15147 000018DA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15148 000018DC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15149 000018E0 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15150 000018E2 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15151 000018E5 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15152 000018E9 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15153                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15154                                  					; don't know
 15155 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15156 000018EC EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15157                                  					; reset the flag
 15158                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15159                                  
 15160                                  ext_changed:
 15161 000018EE 58                      		pop	ax
 15162                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15163 000018EF 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15164                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15165                                  					; disk changed!
 15166                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15167                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15168                                  		;clc
 15169 000018F0 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15170                                  
 15171                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15172                                  
 15173                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15174                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15175                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15176                                  ;
 15177                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15178                                  
 15179                                  checkio:				
 15180 000018F2 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15181 000018F5 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15182 000018F7 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15183 000018FA 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15184 000018FC E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15185 000018FF 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15186 00001901 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15187 00001904 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15188 00001906 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15189 00001908 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15190 0000190A 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15191 0000190B C3                      		retn
 15192                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15193                                  
 15194                                  checkioerr:				
 15195 0000190C E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15196                                  
 15197                                  checkioret:				
 15198 0000190F F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15199 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15201                                  
 15202                                  no_error_map:				
 15203 00001913 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15204                                  
 15205                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15206                                  
 15207                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15208                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15209                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15210                                  
 15211                                  returnvid:		
 15212 00001916 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15213                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15214 00001919 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15215 0000191C B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15216 0000191E F9                      		stc
 15217 0000191F C3                      		retn
 15218                                  
 15219                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15220                                  
 15221                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15222                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15223                                  ;
 15224                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15225                                  ; **trashes si**
 15226                                  
 15227                                  media_set_vid:				
 15228 00001920 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15229                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15230                                  
 15231                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15232                                  
 15233                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15234                                  
 15235                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15236                                  
 15237                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15238                                  vid_into_packet:
 15239 00001923 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15240 00001924 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15241 00001928 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15242 0000192B 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15243 0000192D 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15244 00001930 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15245 00001933 1F                      		pop	ds
 15246                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15247 00001934 C3                      		retn
 15248                                  
 15249                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15250                                  
 15251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15252                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15253                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15254                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15255                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15256                                  ;
 15257                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15258                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15259                                  ;
 15260                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15261                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15262                                  ;		carry set
 15263                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15264                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15265                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15266                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15267                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15268                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15269                                  ;
 15270                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15271                                  
 15272                                  hidensity:
 15273                                  
 15274                                  ; check for correct drive
 15275                                  		
 15276                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15277 00001935 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15278                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15279                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15280 0000193A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15281                                  
 15282                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15283                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15284                                  
 15285 0000193C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15286 00001941 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15287                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15288                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15289 00001943 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15290 00001946 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15291                                  
 15292                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15293                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15294                                  
 15295                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15296 00001948 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15297 0000194C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15298                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15299                                  					; ffOther
 15300 0000194E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15301 00001950 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15302                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15303                                  					; ff288
 15304 00001952 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15305 00001954 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15306 00001956 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15307                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15308                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15309 00001959 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15310                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15311                                  					; 2 sides
 15312                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15313 0000195C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15314 0000195D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15315                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15316                                  					; & head max
 15317                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15318 00001960 E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15320                                  
 15321                                  Is720K:
 15322                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15323 00001963 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15324                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15325 00001964 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15326                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15327                                  
 15328                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15329                                  ;dofloppy:
 15330                                  		;retn
 15331                                  
 15332                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15333                                  
 15334                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15335                                  
 15336                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15337                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15338                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15339                                  ;
 15340                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15341                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15342                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15343                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15344                                  ;
 15345                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15346                                  ;
 15347                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15348                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15349                                  
 15350                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15351 00001967 06                      		push	es
 15352 00001968 57                      		push	di
 15353                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15354                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15355 00001969 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15356                                  
 15357                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15358                                  
 15359                                  scan_bds:				
 15360 0000196D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15361 00001971 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15362                                  
 15363                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15364                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15365                                  
 15366 00001973 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15367                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15368                                  get_next_bds:				
 15369 00001977 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15370                                  					; go to	next bds
 15371 0000197A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15372 0000197D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15373 0000197F 5F                      		pop	di
 15374 00001980 07                      		pop	es
 15375 00001981 C3                      		retn
 15376                                  
 15377                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15378                                  
 15379                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15380                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15381                                  ;
 15382                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15383                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15384                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15385                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15386                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15387                                  
 15388                                  checkromchange:	
 15389                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15390                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15391 00001982 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15392                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15393                                  					; fchanged
 15394 00001987 C3                      		retn
 15395                                  
 15396                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15397                                  
 15398                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15399                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15400                                  ;
 15401                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15402                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15403                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15404                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15405                                  
 15406                                  resetchanged:	
 15407                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15408                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15409 00001988 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15410                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15411                                  					; ~fchanged
 15412 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15413                                  
 15414                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15415                                  
 15416                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15417                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15418                                  ;
 15419                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15420                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15421                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15422                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15423                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15424                                  
 15425                                  haschange:
 15426                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15427                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15428 0000198E 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15429                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15430                                  					; fchangeline
 15431 00001993 C3                      		retn
 15432                                  
 15433                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15434                                  
 15435                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15436                                  
 15437                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15438                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15439                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15440                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15441                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15442                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15443                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15444                                  
 15445                                  ; set_volume_id
 15446                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15447                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15448                                  ;
 15449                                  ;   on entry:
 15450                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15451                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15452                                  ;
 15453                                  ;   on exit:
 15454                                  ;	carry clear:
 15455                                  ;	   successful call
 15456                                  ;	carry set
 15457                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15458                                  
 15459                                  set_volume_id:				
 15460 00001994 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15461 00001995 50                      		push	ax
 15462 00001996 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15463 00001999 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15464 0000199B E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15465 0000199E 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15466 000019A0 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15467 000019A3 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15468                                  setvret:				
 15469                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15470                                  		; cf = 0
 15471                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15472 000019A6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15473 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 15474 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15475                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15476                                  
 15477                                  seterr:					
 15478 000019A9 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15479 000019AA 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15480 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15482 000019AC 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15483                                  
 15484                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15485                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15486                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15487                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15488                                  
 15489                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15490                                  
 15491                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15492                                  
 15493                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15494                                  ;
 15495                                  ;   on entry:
 15496                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15497                                  ;
 15498                                  ;   on exit:
 15499                                  ;	carry clear
 15500                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15501                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15502                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15503                                  ;
 15504                                  ;	carry set:
 15505                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15506                                  
 15507                                  read_volume_id:
 15508 000019AE 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15509 000019AF 51                      		push	cx
 15510 000019B0 53                      		push	bx
 15511 000019B1 50                      		push	ax
 15512 000019B2 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15513 000019B3 57                      		push	di
 15514 000019B4 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15515 000019B5 07                      		pop	es
 15516 000019B6 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15517 000019B9 BE[9F08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15518                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15519 000019BC B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15520 000019BF F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15521 000019C1 5F                      		pop	di
 15522 000019C2 07                      		pop	es
 15523 000019C3 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15524                                  					; # of fats
 15525 000019C7 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15526                                  					; sectors / fat
 15527 000019CB F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15528 000019CD 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15529                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15530                                  					;
 15531                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15532                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15533 000019D1 2EA3[AC19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15534                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15535                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15536 000019D5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15537                                  					; # root dir entries
 15538 000019D9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15539 000019DB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15540                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15541                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15542 000019DD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15543                                  next_sec:
 15544 000019DE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15545 000019DF 2EA1[AC19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15546                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15547                                  					; get sector #
 15548 000019E3 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15549                                  					; sectors / track
 15550 000019E7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15551 000019E9 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15552                                  
 15553                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15554                                  
 15555 000019EB 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15556                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15557 000019EC 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15558 000019EE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15559 000019F0 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15560                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15561 000019F4 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15562 000019F6 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15563 000019F8 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15564                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15565 000019FB 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15566 000019FD B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15567 00001A00 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15568                                  fvid_loop:
 15569                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15570 00001A02 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15571                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15572 00001A04 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15573 00001A06 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15574 00001A09 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15575 00001A0B 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15576 00001A0E 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15577                                  ent_loop:
 15578 00001A10 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15579 00001A13 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15580 00001A15 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15581 00001A16 2EFF06[AC19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15582                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15583                                  					; next sector
 15584 00001A1B E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15585                                  notfound:
 15586                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15587                                  		;xor	si, si
 15588 00001A1D EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15589                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15590                                  
 15591                                  found_vid:
 15592                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15593                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15594 00001A1F 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15595 00001A20 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15596 00001A22 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15597 00001A23 57                      		push	di
 15598 00001A24 1E                      		push	ds
 15599 00001A25 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15600 00001A26 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15601 00001A29 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15602                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15603 00001A2C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15604                                  		;xor	al, al
 15605                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15606 00001A2E 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15607 00001A2F AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15608                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15609                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15610                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15611 00001A30 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15612 00001A31 07                      		pop	es
 15613                                  fvid_ret:
 15614                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15615 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15616                                  				
 15617 00001A34 58                      		pop	ax
 15618                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15619                                  		; cf = 0
 15620                                  		;clc
 15621                                  rvidret:
 15622 00001A35 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15623 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx
 15624 00001A37 5A                      		pop	dx
 15625 00001A38 C3                      		retn
 15626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15627                                  
 15628                                  no_vid:
 15629 00001A39 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15630                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15631                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15632 00001A3A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15633                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15634                                  
 15635                                  readviderr:
 15636 00001A3C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15637 00001A3D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15638 00001A3E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15639                                  
 15640                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15641                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15642                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15643                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15644 00001A40 BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15645                                  		;
 15646                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15647                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15648                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15649                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15650 00001A43 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15651 00001A46 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15652                                  		;
 15653 00001A49 FC                      		cld
 15654 00001A4A C3                      		retn
 15655                                  
 15656                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15657                                  
 15658                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15659                                  ;
 15660                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15661                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15662                                  
 15663                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15664 00001A4B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15665 00001A4C 56                      		push	si
 15666 00001A4D 51                      		push	cx
 15667                                  		
 15668                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15669                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15670                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15671                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15672                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15673                                  		;cld
 15674                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15675 00001A4E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15676                                  
 15677 00001A51 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15678 00001A53 59                      		pop	cx
 15679 00001A54 5E                      		pop	si
 15680 00001A55 5F                      		pop	di
 15681 00001A56 C3                      		retn
 15682                                  
 15683                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15684                                  
 15685                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15686                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15687                                  ;
 15688                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15689                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15690                                  
 15691                                  check_volume_id:
 15692 00001A57 57                      		push	di
 15693 00001A58 51                      		push	cx
 15694                                  		
 15695                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15696                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15697                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15698                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15699                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15700                                  		;cld
 15701                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15702 00001A59 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15703                                  
 15704 00001A5C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15705 00001A5E 59                      		pop	cx
 15706 00001A5F 5F                      		pop	di
 15707 00001A60 C3                      		retn
 15708                                  
 15709                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15710                                  
 15711                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15712                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15713                                  ;
 15714                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15715                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15716                                  ;
 15717                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15718                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15719                                  ;
 15720                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15721                                  
 15722                                  fat_check:		
 15723 00001A61 50                      		push	ax
 15724 00001A62 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15725 00001A64 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15726 00001A67 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15727                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15728 00001A6B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15729 00001A6D 4E                      		dec	si
 15730                                  okret1:					
 15731 00001A6E 58                      		pop	ax
 15732 00001A6F C3                      		retn
 15733                                  
 15734                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15735                                  
 15736                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15737                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15738                                  
 15739                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15740                                  
 15741                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15742                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15743                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15744                                  
 15745                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15746                                  
 15747                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15748                                  		;db 0
 15749                                  
 15750                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15751                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15752                                  
 15753                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15754 00001A70 00<rep 10h>             		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15755                                  %endif
 15756                                  
 15757                                  ;align 16
 15758                                  
 15759                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15760                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15761                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15762                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15763                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15764                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15765                                  
 15766                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 15767                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 15768

 15774                                  ; end of BIOSCODE
