 31637                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31638                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 31639                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31640                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 31641                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 31642                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 31643                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31644                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 31645                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31646                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 31647                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 31648                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 31649                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 31650                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31651                                  
 31652                                  loadLow:
 31653                                  	;push	ds
 31654                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 31655                                  	;pop	ds	
 31656                                  
 31657                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 31658                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 31659                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 31660                                  	jne	short ll10
 31661                                  
 31662                                  	stc
 31663                                  ll15:
 31664                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 31665                                  	;stc
 31666                                  	;jmp	short llX
 31667                                  	retn
 31668                                  ll10:	
 31669                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 31670                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 31671                                  
 31672                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31673                                  	retn
 31674                                  
 31675                                  	;mov	al,1
 31676                                  	;clc
 31677                                  ;llX:
 31678                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 31679                                  	;retn
 31680                                  
 31681                                  %endif

 32145                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32146                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32147                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32148                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32149                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32150                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32151                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32152                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32153                                  
 32154                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32155                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32156                                  findUMB:
 32157                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32158                                  	;push	ax
 32159                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32160 00002D61 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32161                                  	;push	dx
 32162                                  
 32163 00002D62 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32164                                  
 32165 00002D64 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32166                                  
 32167 00002D66 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32168                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32169                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32170 00002D69 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32171                                  
 32172                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32173                                  fu10:
 32174 00002D6B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32175                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32176                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32177                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32178                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32180                                  
 32181                                  ;fu10:	
 32182 00002D6D 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32183 00002D6F 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32184                                  
 32185 00002D71 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32186 00002D74 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32187                                  
 32188 00002D76 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32189                                  fu20:	
 32190                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32191                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32192                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32193 00002D77 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32194 00002D7D 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32195                                  
 32196                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32197                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32198                                  	; ax = es
 32199                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32200                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32201 00002D7F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32202 00002D84 40                      	inc	ax
 32203                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32204                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32205 00002D85 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32206                                  fuE:	
 32207 00002D87 F9                      	stc
 32208                                  fuX:
 32209                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32210                                  	;pop	dx
 32211                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32212 00002D88 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32213                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32214 00002D89 C3                      	retn
 32215                                  
 32216                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32217                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32218                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32219                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32220                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32221                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32222                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32223                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32224                                  
 32225                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32226                                  BigFree:
 32227                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32228                                  	;push	bx
 32229 00002D8A 51                      	push	cx
 32230                                  
 32231 00002D8B E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32232 00002D8E 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 32233                                  
 32234 00002D90 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32235 00002D92 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32236                                  
 32237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32238                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32239                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32240                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32241                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32242                                  
 32243                                  bf10:	
 32244 00002D94 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32245 00002D97 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32246                                  
 32247                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32248 00002D99 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32249 00002D9F 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32250                                  
 32251 00002DA1 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32252                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32253 00002DA5 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32254                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32255                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32256 00002DA7 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32257                                  
 32258 00002DA9 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32259                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32260 00002DAB 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32261                                  
 32262                                  bf20:	
 32263                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32264                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32265                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32266                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32267 00002DAD 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32268 00002DB3 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32269                                  
 32270                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32271 00002DB5 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32272                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32273 00002DB7 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32274 00002DBC 40                      	inc     ax
 32275 00002DBD 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32276                                  
 32277 00002DBF EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32278                                  
 32279 00002DC1 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32280 00002DC3 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32281 00002DC5 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32282 00002DC7 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32283                                  bfE:	
 32284 00002DC9 F9                      	stc
 32285                                  bfX:
 32286 00002DCA 59                      	pop	cx
 32287                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32288                                  	;pop	bx
 32289 00002DCB C3                      	retn
 32290                                  
 32291                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32292                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32293                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32294                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32295                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32296                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32297                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32298                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32299                                  
 32300                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32301                                  
 32302                                  isSpecified:
 32303                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32304                                  	;push	ax
 32305                                  
 32306 00002DCC 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 32307 00002DCE 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 32308                                  
 32309                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 32310                                  	;
 32311                                  	;push	ds
 32312                                  	;push	cs
 32313                                  	;pop	ds
 32314                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32315                                  	;pop	ds
 32316                                  	
 32317                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 32318                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32319                                  	; ds = cs
 32320 00002DD0 8A87[361F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32321                                  
 32322 00002DD4 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32323                                  
 32324                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32325                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32326                                  	;pop	ax
 32327                                  
 32328 00002DD6 C3                      	retn
 32329                                  
 32330                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32331                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32332                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32333                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32334                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32335                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32336                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32337                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32338                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32339                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32340                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32341                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32342                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32343                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32344                                  
 32345                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 32346                                  
 32347                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32348                                  
 32349                                  shrinkMCB:
 32350                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32351                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32352                                  	;push	bx
 32353 00002DD7 51                      	push	cx
 32354 00002DD8 06                      	push	es
 32355                                  
 32356 00002DD9 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32357                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32358                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32359                                  
 32360 00002DDB 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32361                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32362 00002DE0 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32363                                  
 32364 00002DE2 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32365                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32366                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32367                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32368                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32369                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32370                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32371 00002DE5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32372 00002DE7 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32373                                  
 32374 00002DE9 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32375                                  	
 32376                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32377                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32378 00002DEE 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32379                                  
 32380 00002DF0 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32381 00002DF5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32382                                  
 32383 00002DFB 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32384 00002DFD 40                      	inc	ax
 32385 00002DFE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32386                                  
 32387 00002E00 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32388 00002E02 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32389                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32390                                  	; ax > 0
 32391 00002E04 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32392                                  
 32393                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32394 00002E05 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32395                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32396 00002E0A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32397                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32398                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32399                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32400                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32401                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32402                                  
 32403                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32404 00002E0E E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32405                                  
 32406                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32407                                  	; cf=0
 32408                                  	;clc
 32409                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32410                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32411                                  smE:	
 32412                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32413                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32414                                  	;stc
 32415                                  smX:	
 32416                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32417 00002E11 07                      	pop	es
 32418 00002E12 59                      	pop	cx
 32419                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32420                                  	;pop	bx
 32421 00002E13 C3                      	retn
 32422                                  
 32423                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32424                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32425                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32426                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32427                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32428                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32429                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32430                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32431                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32432                                  ;
 32433                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32434                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32435                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32436                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32437                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32438                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32439                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32440                                  ;       Endif
 32441                                  ;    Endif
 32442                                  ; Endif
 32443                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32444                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32445                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32446                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32447                                  ;    ENDIF
 32448                                  ; ENDIF
 32449                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32450                                  
 32451                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32452                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32453                                  _hideUMB_:
 32454                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32455                                  	; ds = cs
 32456                                  
 32457                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32458                                  	;push	bx
 32459                                  	;push	dx
 32460 00002E14 06                      	push	es
 32461                                  
 32462 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32463 00002E17 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32464 00002E1A 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32465                                  
 32466 00002E1C 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32467 00002E1E E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32468 00002E21 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32469                                  
 32470 00002E23 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32471 00002E24 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32472 00002E26 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32473 00002E29 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32474                                  
 32475 00002E2A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32476 00002E2C 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32477                                  
 32478 00002E2E 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32479 00002E30 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32480                                  
 32481 00002E32 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32482 00002E34 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32483 00002E37 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32484                                  hu_10:	
 32485                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32486                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32487                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32488                                  ;isTiny:
 32489                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32490                                  	;or	al,al
 32491 00002E39 800E[321F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32492 00002E3E 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32493                                  
 32494 00002E40 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32495 00002E43 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32496                                  
 32497 00002E45 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32498 00002E47 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32499                                  
 32500 00002E49 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32501 00002E4B E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32502 00002E4E 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32503                                  
 32504 00002E50 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32505                                  hu_30:	
 32506 00002E52 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32507                                  
 32508 00002E54 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32509                                  
 32510 00002E57 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32511 00002E59 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32512                                  
 32513 00002E5B 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32514 00002E5D E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32515                                  hu_X:	
 32516 00002E60 07                      	pop	es
 32517                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32518                                  	;pop	dx
 32519                                  	;pop	bx
 32520 00002E61 C3                      	retn
 32521                                  
 32522                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32523                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32524                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32525                                  ; Entry:  None
 32526                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32527                                  ; Error:  None
 32528                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32529                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32530                                  
 32531                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32532                                  UnFreeze:
 32533                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32534                                  	;push	ax
 32535 00002E62 06                      	push	es
 32536                                  
 32537 00002E63 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32538 00002E66 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 32539                                  
 32540                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32541                                  uf10:
 32542 00002E68 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32543                                  
 32544                                  ; ------------------------------
 32545                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32546                                  ; ------------------------------
 32547                                  
 32548                                  ;uf10:	
 32549 00002E6A E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32550 00002E6D 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 32551 00002E6F E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 32552                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32553                                  	; ax <> es
 32554 00002E72 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 32555                                  uf20:	
 32556                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32557                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32558                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32559 00002E74 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32560 00002E7A 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32561                                  
 32562                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32563                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32564                                  	; ax = es
 32565                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 32566                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32567 00002E7C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32568 00002E81 40                      	inc	ax
 32569                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32570                                  	;mov	es,ax
 32571 00002E82 EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 32572                                  ufX:	
 32573 00002E84 07                      	pop	es
 32574                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32575                                  	;pop	ax
 32576 00002E85 C3                      	retn
 32577                                  
 32578                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32579                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 32580                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32581                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32582                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32583                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32584                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32585                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32586                                  
 32587                                  isFrozMCB:
 32588                                  	;push	ax
 32589                                  
 32590                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32591                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32592 00002E86 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32593 00002E8C 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 32594                                  
 32595                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32596                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32597 00002E8E 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32598 00002E95 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 32599                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32600                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32601 00002E97 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32602 00002E9E 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 32603                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32604                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32605 00002EA0 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32606 00002EA7 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 32607                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32608                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32609 00002EA9 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32610                                  ifmX:	
 32611                                  	;pop	ax
 32612 00002EB0 C3                      	retn
 32613                                  
 32614                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32615                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32616                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32617                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32618                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 32619                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32620                                  ; USES:     None
 32621                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32622                                  
 32623                                  frezMCB:
 32624 00002EB1 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 32625 00002EB8 26C70608004652          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32626 00002EBF 26C7060A004F5A          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32627 00002EC6 26C7060C00454E          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32628 00002ECD 26C7060E002020          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32629 00002ED4 C3                      	retn
 32630                                  
 32631                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32716                                  ; ERROR:    None

 33123                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33124                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 33125                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33126                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33127                                  
 33128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33129                                  ;
 33130                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33131                                  ;
 33132                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33133                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33134                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33135                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33136                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33137                                  ;
 33138                                  ;	Output : none
 33139                                  ;
 33140                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33141                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33142                                  ;
 33143                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33144                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33145                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33146                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33147                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33149                                  
 33150                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33151                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33152                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33153                                  InitDevLoad:
 33154                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33155                                  	;push	es ; *
 33156                                  
 33157                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33158                                  	; ds = cs
 33159 00002FF3 803E[871F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33160                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33161                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33162 00002FF8 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33163                                  
 33164                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33165                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33166                                  ; %if 0
 33167                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33168 00002FFA 803E[771F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33169                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33170 00002FFF 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33171                                  
 33172                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33173                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33174                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33175                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33176                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33177                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33178                                  
 33179 00003001 E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33180                                  
 33181 00003004 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33182 00003007 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33183 0000300A E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33184 0000300D 9C                      	pushf
 33185 0000300E E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33186 00003011 9D                      	popf
 33187                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33188                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33189                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33190 00003012 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33191                                  
 33192                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33193                                  
 33194                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33195                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33196                                  InitForConv:
 33197                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33198                                  	; ds = cs
 33199 00003014 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33200                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33201 00003017 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33202 00003019 E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33203 0000301C E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33204                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33205 0000301F 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33206                                  					;  in low memory
 33207                                  InitForHi:
 33208                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33209                                  	; ds = cs
 33210                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33211                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33212                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33213 00003021 A1[7D1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33214 00003024 8B16[791F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33215 00003028 0316[7B1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33216 0000302C EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33217                                  
 33218                                  InitForLo:
 33219                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33220                                  	; ds = cs
 33221                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33222 0000302E C606[871F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33223                                  initforlo_x:
 33224                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33225                                  	; ds = cs
 33226                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33227                                  					;  we are loading low
 33228                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 33229                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33230 00003033 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33231 00003036 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33232                                  idl1:
 33233 0000303A E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33234                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33235                                  	; ds = cs
 33236                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33237                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33238                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33239                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33240 0000303D A3[6B1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33241 00003040 8916[6D1F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33242 00003044 C706[6F1F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33243 0000304A A3[711F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33244                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33245                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33246 0000304D C3                      	retn
 33247                                  
 33248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33249                                  ;
 33250                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33251                                  ;
 33252                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33253                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33254                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33255                                  ;		   current UMB
 33256                                  ;
 33257                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33258                                  
 33259                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33260                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33261                                  	; ds = cs
 33262                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33263                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33264                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33265 0000304E A1[7B1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33266 00003051 0306[791F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33267 00003055 2B06[7D1F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33268                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33269                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33270                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33271                                  	;stc
 33272                                  	;retn
 33273                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33274 00003059 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33275 0000305C 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33276                                  spcinumb1:
 33277 0000305E 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33278                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33279                                  	; ds = cs
 33280 0000305F 3B06[691F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33281                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33282                                  spcinumb2:
 33283 00003063 C3                      	retn
 33284                                  
 33285                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33286                                  ;
 33287                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33288                                  ;
 33289                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33290                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33291                                  ;
 33292                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33293                                  
 33294                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33295                                  ;
 33296                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33297                                  ;	push	ds
 33298                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33299                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33300                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33301                                  ;	pop	ds
 33302                                  ;
 33303                                  ;	inc	ax
 33304                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33305                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33306                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33307                                  ;	retn

 33309                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33310                                  ;
 33311                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33312                                  ;
 33313                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33314                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33315                                  ;		 the device.
 33316                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33317                                  ;
 33318                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33319                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33320                                  ;	UMB.
 33321                                  ;
 33322                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33323                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33324                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33325                                  ;
 33326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33327                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33328                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33329                                  
 33330                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33331                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33332                                  	; ds = cs
 33333 00003064 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33334 00003067 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33335 0000306A CD21                    	int	21h
 33336                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33337                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33338                                  
 33339 0000306C 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33340                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33341                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33342 0000306E 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33343                                  
 33344 00003070 4B                      	dec	bx
 33345                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33346                                  	; ds = cs
 33347 00003071 391E[691F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33348                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33349 00003075 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33350                                  
 33351 00003077 43                      	inc	bx
 33352                                  
 33353 00003078 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33354 0000307B CD21                    	int	21h
 33355 0000307D 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33356                                  
 33357                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33358                                  	;dec	ax
 33359                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33360                                  	;
 33361                                  PrepareMark:
 33362 0000307F 1E                      	push	ds
 33363 00003080 48                      	dec	ax
 33364 00003081 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33365 00003083 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33366 00003089 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33367 0000308F 40                      	inc	ax
 33368 00003090 1F                      	pop	ds
 33369                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33370                                  	; ds = cs
 33371                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33372                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33373                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33374                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33375 00003091 891E[7B1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33376 00003095 A3[791F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33377 00003098 A3[7D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33378                                  	;
 33379                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33380                                  	; cf=0
 33381                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33382 0000309B C3                      	retn
 33383                                  
 33384                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33385                                  %if 1
 33386                                  gufd_err:
 33387 0000309C 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33388                                  gufd_error:
 33389 0000309E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33390 000030A0 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33391 000030A1 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33392                                  %endif
 33393                                  
 33394                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33395                                  %if 0
 33396                                  gufd_err:
 33397                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33398                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33399                                  	; ds = cs
 33400                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33401                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33402                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33403                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33404                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33405                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33406                                  	stc
 33407                                  	retn
 33408                                  %endif

 33410                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33411                                  ;
 33412                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33413                                  ;
 33414                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33415                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33416                                  ;
 33417                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33418                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33419                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33420                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33421                                  ;
 33422                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33423                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33424                                  ;
 33425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33426                                  
 33427                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33428                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33429                                  
 33430                                  DevSetMark:
 33431 000030A3 06                      	push	es
 33432                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33433                                  	;push	di
 33434 000030A4 1E                      	push	ds
 33435 000030A5 56                      	push	si
 33436 000030A6 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33437 000030A8 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33438 000030AE 40                      	inc	ax
 33439 000030AF 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33440                                  
 33441                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33442                                  
 33443 000030B3 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 33444                                  
 33445                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33446                                  	; ds = cs
 33447                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33448 000030B4 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33449                                  
 33450 000030B8 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33451 000030BA FC                      	cld
 33452                                  dsm_again:
 33453 000030BB AC                      	lodsb
 33454 000030BC 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33455 000030BE 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33456 000030C0 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33457 000030C2 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33458                                  isit_slash:
 33459 000030C4 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 33460 000030C6 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33461 000030C8 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33462 000030CA EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33463                                  isit_null:
 33464 000030CC 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33465 000030CE 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33466 000030D0 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33467                                  
 33468 000030D2 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33469 000030D5 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33470                                  dsm_next_char:
 33471 000030D8 AC                      	lodsb
 33472 000030D9 08C0                    	or	al, al
 33473 000030DB 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33474 000030DD 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 33475 000030DF 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33476 000030E1 AA                      	stosb
 33477 000030E2 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33478                                  blankout:
 33479 000030E4 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33480 000030E6 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 33481 000030E8 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33482                                  dsm_exit:
 33483 000030EA 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 33484 000030EB 5E                      	pop	si
 33485 000030EC 1F                      	pop	ds
 33486                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33487                                  	;pop	di
 33488 000030ED 07                      	pop	es
 33489 000030EE C3                      	retn
 33490                                  
 33491                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33492                                  ;
 33493                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33494                                  ;
 33495                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33496                                  ;
 33497                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33498                                  ;
 33499                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33500                                  ;	in DevSize
 33501                                  ;
 33502                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33503

 33515

 33523 0000310B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0

 33525                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no

 33529                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 33530 0000311B EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 33531                                  sd_ctp:	
 33532                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33533                                  ;szdev1:

 33535 0000311F D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl

 33537 00003123 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl

 33541                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h

 33548                                  ;szdev2:

 33550                                  	; 22/07/2023

 33552                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 33553

 33555                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33556                                  	; cf=0
 33557                                  	;clc
 33558                                  sd_close:

 33572                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 33573                                  ;

 33575                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 33576                                  ;

 33578                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error

 33941                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33942                                  ;
 33943                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33944                                  ;
 33945                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33946                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33947                                  ;
 33948                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33949                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33950                                  ;
 33951                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33952                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33953                                  ;
 33954                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33955                                  
 33956                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33957                                  
 33958                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33959                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33960                                  
 33961                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33962                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33963                                  GetHexNum:
 33964 00003227 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33965 00003229 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33966                                  ghn_next:
 33967 0000322B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33968 0000322E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33969 00003231 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33970 00003233 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33971 00003236 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33972 00003238 50                      	push	ax
 33973 00003239 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33974 0000323B E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 33975 0000323E 58                      	pop	ax
 33976                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33977 0000323F B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33978 00003242 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33979 00003244 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33980                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33981                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33982 00003247 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33983                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33984                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33985                                  ghn_shift1:
 33986 00003249 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33987 0000324B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33988 0000324D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33989 0000324F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33990 00003251 46                      	inc	si
 33991 00003252 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33992                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33993 00003254 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33994 00003257 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33995 0000325A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33996 0000325E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33997                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33998                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33999                                  ghn_shift2:
 34000 00003260 F8                      	clc
 34001 00003261 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34002 00003263 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34003 00003265 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34004 00003267 F8                      	clc
 34005 00003268 C3                      	retn
 34006                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34007                                  ghn_err:
 34008                                  gnib_err:
 34009 00003269 F9                      	stc
 34010                                  ghn_ret:
 34011                                  gnib_ret:
 34012 0000326A C3                      	retn

 34016                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34017                                  ;
 34018                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34019                                  ;
 34020                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34021                                  ;
 34022                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34023                                  ;
 34024                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34028                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 34032 00003273 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34033 00003275 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc

 34035                                  is_it_hex:

 34040 0000327E 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34041 00003281 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34042 00003283 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34043 00003286 C3                      	retn

 34064                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34065                                  ;
 34066                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34067                                  ;
 34068                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34069                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34070                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34071                                  ;			; DS = data
 34072                                  ;
 34073                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34074                                  ;
 34075                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34076                                  ;
 34077                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34078                                  
 34079                                  umb_insert:
 34080 00003287 1E                      	push	ds
 34081                                  
 34082                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34083                                  	; ds = cs
 34084                                  
 34085                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34086 00003288 8E1E[961F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34087                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34088 0000328C 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34089 00003290 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34090 00003292 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34091                                  ui_next:
 34092 00003294 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34093                                  					;    new block
 34094 00003296 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34095                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34096                                  					;    last
 34097 00003298 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34098 0000329E 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34099                                  					; N: get next block
 34100 000032A0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34101                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34102 000032A2 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34103 000032A5 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34104                                  
 34105                                  ui_insert:
 34106 000032A7 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34107 000032A9 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34108                                  
 34109 000032AA 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34110 000032AC F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34111                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34112 000032AE C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34113                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34114 000032B3 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34115                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34116 000032B9 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34117                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34118 000032BD C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34119                                  
 34120                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34121                                  
 34122 000032C3 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34123 000032C5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34124 000032CB 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34125                                  					; mark as free
 34126 000032D2 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34127                                  					; start & end of new block
 34128 000032D5 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34129                                  
 34130                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34131                                  	
 34132 000032DA 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34133 000032DC 43                      	inc	bx
 34134 000032DD 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34135 000032DF 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34136                                  
 34137                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34138                                  					; this block
 34139 000032E0 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34140                                  	
 34141 000032E2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34142 000032E8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34143 000032EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34144 000032F3 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34145                                  
 34146 000032FA EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34147                                  
 34148                                  ui_append:
 34149                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34150 000032FC 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34151 00003301 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34152                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34153                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34154                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34155 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34156                                  
 34157 0000330D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34158 0000330F 40                      	inc	ax
 34159 00003310 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34160                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34161 00003312 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34162                                  
 34163 00003314 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34164                                  
 34165 00003316 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34166 0000331C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34167 00003323 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34168 00003327 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34169                                  
 34170                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34171 0000332E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34172 00003330 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34173 00003336 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34174                                  					; mark as free
 34175 0000333D 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34176 0000333E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34177                                  ui_done:
 34178                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34179 00003343 1F                      	pop	ds
 34180                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34181                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34182                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34183 00003344 C3                      	retn
