 34209                                  ;	retn
 34210                                  
 34211                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34212                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34213                                  
 34214                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34215                                  
 34216                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34217                                  
 34218                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34219                                  ;
 34220                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34221                                  ;
 34222                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34223                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34224                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34225                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34226                                  ;
 34227                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34228                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34229                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34230                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34231                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34232                                  ;
 34233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34234                                  
 34235                                  umb_coalesce:
 34236                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34237                                  	; ds = cs
 34238 00003354 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34239                                  
 34240 00003355 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34241                                  
 34242                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34243                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34244 00003357 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34245 0000335B 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34246                                  uc_nextfree:
 34247 00003360 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34248 00003362 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34249                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34250 00003364 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34251 00003369 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34252                                  					; N: get next arena
 34253 0000336B E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34254 0000336E 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34255 00003370 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34256                                  uc_again:
 34257 00003372 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34258 00003375 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34259                                  uc_check:
 34260 00003377 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34261 0000337C 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34262                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34263 0000337E 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34264 00003383 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34265                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34266 00003384 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34267 00003388 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34268 0000338B 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34269 0000338D EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34270                                  
 34271                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34272                                  ;uc_done:
 34273                                  	;retn

 34283                                  	; ds = cs

 34286 00003394 B452                    	mov	ah,52h

 34288                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34289                                  	; ds = cs
 34290                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 34291 00003398 8C06[961F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 34292 0000339C B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 34293 0000339F CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 34295                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 34296 000033A1 891E[7F1F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 34297 000033A5 8C06[811F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 34298                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34299 000033A9 803E[951F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 34300                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 34301                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 34323                                  ;
 34324                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34325                                  ;
 34326                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34327                                  ;
 34328                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34329                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34330                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34331                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34332                                  ;				NC
 34333                                  ;			  else 
 34334                                  ;				CY
 34335                                  ;
 34336                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34337                                  ;
 34338                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34339                                  
 34340                                  umb_allocate:
 34341                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34342                                  	; ds = cs
 34343 000033BD 50                      	push	ax
 34344 000033BE B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34345 000033C0 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 34346                                  					;   possible
 34347                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34348 000033C3 FF1E[7F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34349                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34350                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34351                                  					; the largest UMB
 34352 000033C7 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34353 000033C9 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34354                                  	
 34355 000033CB B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34356                                  
 34357                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34358 000033CD FF1E[7F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34359                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34360                                  
 34361 000033D1 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 34362                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34363                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34364 000033D4 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34365                                  ua_err:
 34366 000033D6 F9                      	stc	
 34367                                  
 34368                                  	;clc
 34369                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34370                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34371                                  	; cf=0
 34372                                  	;clc 
 34373                                  ua_done:
 34374 000033D7 58                      	pop	ax
 34375 000033D8 C3                      	retn
 34376                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34377                                  ;ua_err:
 34378                                  	;stc
 34379                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 34381                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34382                                  ;
 34383                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34384                                  ;
 34385                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 34386                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34387                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 34388                                  ;
 34389                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34390                                  
 34391                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34392                                  get_next:
 34393 000033D9 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34394 000033DE 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 34395                                  _get_next_:
 34396 000033E0 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 34397 000033E2 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34398 000033E6 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34399 000033E7 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34400                                  	;clc
 34401                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34402                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34403                                  	; cf=0
 34404                                  	;clc
 34405 000033E9 C3                      	retn
 34406                                  gn_err:
 34407 000033EA F9                      	stc
 34408                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 34409                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 34410 000033EB C3                      	retn

 34412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34413                                  ;
 34414                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34415                                  ;
 34416                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34417                                  
 34418                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34419                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34420                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34421                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34422                                  	; ds = cs
 34423 000033EC E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 34424 000033EF 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34425                                  
 34426                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 34427                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34428                                  
 34429                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34430                                  	; ds = cs
 34431                                  
 34432 000033F1 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 34433 000033F3 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34434 000033F5 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34435                                  
 34436 000033F7 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34437 000033F9 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34438                                  
 34439 000033FB F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34440                                  
 34441                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34442                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34443 000033FD 49                      	dec	cx
 34444 000033FE 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34445                                  	
 34446 00003400 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34447 00003406 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34448                                  					
 34449 0000340D 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34450 00003411 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34451                                  
 34452                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 34453                                  
 34454 00003418 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 34455 0000341A 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34456 00003420 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34457                                  					; mark as free 
 34458 00003427 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34459 00003428 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34460                                  
 34461                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34462                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34463 0000342D 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34464 00003431 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34465 00003434 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34466                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34467                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34468                                  
 34469                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 34470                                  
 34471 00003437 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34472 0000343A 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34473 0000343D 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34474                                  ;scan_next
 34475                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34476                                  scannext:
 34477 0000343F 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34478 00003443 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34479                                  	
 34480 00003445 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34481 00003447 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34482 0000344C 40                      	inc	ax
 34483 0000344D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34484                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34485                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34486 0000344F EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34487                                  got_last:
 34488                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34489                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34490 00003451 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34491                                  
 34492 00003456 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34493                                  	;clc
 34494                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34495                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34496                                  	; cf=0
 34497                                  	;clc
 34498 0000345C C3                      	retn
 34499                                  
 34500                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34501                                  ;;lfu_err:
 34502                                  ;	;stc
 34503                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34504                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 34505                                  ;	; cf=1
 34506                                  ;	;stc
 34507                                  ;	retn

 34509                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34510                                  ;
 34511                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34512                                  ;
 34513                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34514                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34515                                  ;
 34516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34517                                  
 34518                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34519                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34520                                  	; ds = cs
 34521 0000345D 833E[791F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34522                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34523 00003462 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34524 00003464 06                      	push	es
 34525                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34526                                  	;push	bx
 34527                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34528                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34529                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34530                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34531 00003465 8B1E[7D1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34532 00003469 2B1E[791F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34533 0000346D 8E06[791F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34534                                  	
 34535 00003471 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34536 00003474 CD21                    	int	21h
 34537                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34538                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34539                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34540 00003476 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34541 00003478 48                      	dec	ax
 34542 00003479 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34543 0000347B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34544                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34545                                  	;pop	bx
 34546 00003482 07                      	pop	es
 34547                                  su_exit:
 34548 00003483 C3                      	retn

 34553                                  ;
 34554                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 34555                                  ;
 34556                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34557                                  
 34558                                  UnlinkUMB:
 34559                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34560                                  	; ds = cs
 34561 00003484 1E                      	push	ds
 34562 00003485 06                      	push	es
 34563                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34564 00003486 803E[951F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 34565                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34566 0000348B 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34567                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34568 0000348D 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34569                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34570 00003491 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34571 00003496 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34572                                  ulu_next:
 34573 0000349B E83BFF                  	call	get_next
 34574 0000349E 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34575 000034A0 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34576 000034A2 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34577 000034A4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34578 000034A6 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34579                                  ulu_found:
 34580                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34581 000034A8 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34582                                  ulu_x:
 34583 000034AD 07                      	pop	es
 34584 000034AE 1F                      	pop	ds
 34585 000034AF C3                      	retn

 34587                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34588                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34589                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34590                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34591                                  
 34592                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34593                                  ;
 34594                                  ; Summary:
 34595                                  ;
 34596                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34597                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34598                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34599                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34600                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34601                                  ;
 34602                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34603                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34604                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34605                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34606                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34607                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34608                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34609                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34610                                  ;
 34611                                  ; Example:
 34612                                  ;
 34613                                  ;   [menu]
 34614                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34615                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34616                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34617                                  ;
 34618                                  ;   [network]
 34619                                  ;   include misc
 34620                                  ;   device=foo
 34621                                  ;
 34622                                  ;   [misc]
 34623                                  ;   device=bar
 34624                                  ;   include alternate
 34625                                  ;
 34626                                  ;   [alternate]
 34627                                  ;   device=tar
 34628                                  ;
 34629                                  ;
 34630                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34631                                  ;
 34632                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34633                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34634                                  ;
 34635                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34636                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34637                                  ;   following order:
 34638                                  ;
 34639                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34640                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34641                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34642                                  ;
 34643                                  
 34644                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34645                                  
 34646                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34647                                  
 34648                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34649                                  
 34650                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34651                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34652                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34653                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34654                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34655                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34656                                  
 34657                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34658                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34659                                  
 34660                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34661                                  
 34662                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34663                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34664                                  
 34665 000034B0 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34666                                  
 34667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34668                                  ;
 34669                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34670                                  ;
 34671                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34672                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34673                                  ;
 34674                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34675

 34803                                  ; procedure : parseline

 34805                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.

 34808                                  
 34809                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 34815                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34816                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34817                                  
 34818                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34819                                  
 34820                                  	;push	cs ; *
 34821                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34822                                  
 34823                                  nextswtch:
 34824                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34825                                  	je	short done_line
 34826                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34827                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34828                                  
 34829                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34830                                  
 34831                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34832                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34833                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34834                                  	je	short getparm
 34835                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34836                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34837                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34838                                  swterr:
 34839                                  	retn
 34840                                  
 34841                                  getparm:
 34842                                  	call	check_switch
 34843                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34844                                  	jc	short swterr
 34845                                  getnext:
 34846                                  	call	getchr
 34847                                  	;jc	short done_line
 34848                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 34849                                  	; 03/01/2023

 34851                                  ;swterr:
 34852                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34853

 34859                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified

 34862                                  	retn
 34863

 34869                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine

 34873                                  	;clc

 34881                                  	retn

 34891                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34892                                  ;
 34893                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34894                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34895                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34896                                  ; error.

 34906                                  err_chk:
 34907                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34908 00003515 C3                      	retn

 34989                                  ; procedure : process_num
 34990                                  ;
 34991                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 34992                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 34993                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 34994                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 34995                                  ;
 34996                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34997                                  
 34998                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34999                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35000                                  process_num:

 35002 00003565 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35003                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35004 00003567 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35005                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35006 0000356A 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35007 0000356C A2[6C49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35008                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35009                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35010                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35011                                  	; cf=0
 35012 0000356F C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35013                                  try_f:
 35014                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35015 00003570 F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35016                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35017 00003573 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35018                                  
 35019                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35020                                  
 35021                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35022 00003575 A2[4548]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35023                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35024                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35025                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35026                                  	; cf=0
 35027 00003578 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35028                                  try_t:
 35029 00003579 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35030 0000357B 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35031                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35032 0000357D F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35033                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35034 00003580 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35035

 35037 00003582 A3[4848]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 35038                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35039                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35040                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35041                                  	; cf=0
 35042 00003585 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35043                                  try_s:
 35044                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35045 00003586 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 35046                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 35047 00003589 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35048 0000358B A3[6A49]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35049                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35050                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35051                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35052                                  	; cf=0

 35054

 35056

 35165                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35166                                  ;
 35167                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35168                                  ;
 35169                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35170                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35171                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35172                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35173                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35174                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35175                                  ;
 35176                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35177                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35178                                  ;
 35179                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35180                                  ;
 35181                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35182                                  
 35183                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35184                                  
 35185                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35186                                  
 35187                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35188                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)

 35273                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35274                                  
 35275 00003627 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35276                                  
 35277                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35278                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35279                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35280                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35281                                  
 35282                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35283                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35284                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35285                                  
 35286 00003629 833E[5848]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35287 0000362E 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35288 00003630 833E[4848]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35289 00003635 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35290                                  
 35291                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35292                                  
 35293 00003637 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35294                                  
 35295                                  ;	check for 320K
 35296                                  
 35297                                  not_144m:
 35298 00003639 833E[4848]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35299 0000363E 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35300 00003640 833E[5848]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35301 00003645 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35302

 35304 00003649 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 35305                                  
 35306                                  only_one_head:
 35307                                  
 35308                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35309                                  
 35310 0000364B 803E[4548]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35311 00003650 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35312                                  
 35313                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35314                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35315                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35316

 35321                                  
 35322 0000365B B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35323                                  
 35324                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive

 35326

 35328                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35329                                  	; ax = 2

 35332                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35333                                  
 35334                                  got_correct_mediad:

 35891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35892                                  ;
 35893                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35894                                  ;
 35895                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35896                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35897                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35898                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35899                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35900                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35901                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35902                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35903                                  ;
 35904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35905                                  
 35906                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35907                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35908                                  
 35909                                  skip_comment:
 35910 0000387D E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35911                                  
 35912                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35913                                  	; ds = cs	
 35914                                  
 35915 0000387F 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35916                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35917 00003884 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35918                                  
 35919 00003886 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35920                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35921 0000388B 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35922                                  
 35923 0000388D 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35924                                  	
 35925 00003890 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35926                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35927 00003894 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35928                                  
 35929 00003896 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35930                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35931 0000389B 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35932                                  
 35933 0000389D 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35934                                  	
 35935 000038A1 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35936                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35937 000038A5 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35938                                  skip_cmmt:
 35939 000038A7 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35940 000038A9 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35941 000038AC 46                      	inc	si
 35942 000038AD 49                      	dec	cx
 35943 000038AE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35944 000038B0 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35945                                  no_commt:
 35946 000038B2 C3                      	retn

 35956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35957                                  ;
 35958                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35959                                  ;
 35960                                  ;   INPUT
 35961                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35962                                  ;
 35963                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35964                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35965                                  ;
 35966                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35967                                  ;       All
 35968                                  ;
 35969                                  ;   HISTORY
 35970                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35971                                  ;
 35972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35973                                  
 35974                                  kbd_read:
 35975 000038B3 F606[1047]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35976 000038B8 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35977                                  
 35978 000038BA 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35979 000038BB 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35980 000038BD 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35981                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35982                                  kbd_loop:
 35983 000038BF B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35984 000038C1 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35985 000038C3 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35986 000038C5 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35987 000038C7 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35988 000038C9 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35989 000038CB 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35990 000038CD A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35991                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35992                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35993 000038D0 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35994                                  
 35995 000038D5 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35996 000038D7 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35997                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35998 000038D9 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35999                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36000 000038DA 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36001 000038DC B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36002 000038DE CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36003 000038E0 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36004 000038E2 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36005 000038E4 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36006 000038E5 43                              inc     bx
 36007                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36008 000038E6 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36009                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36010 000038EB B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36011 000038ED CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36012 000038EF 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36013 000038F1 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36014 000038F3 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36015                                  
 36016                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36017 000038F5 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36018 000038F8 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36019                                  	
 36020 000038FA 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36021 000038FD 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36022                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36023 000038FF BA[A74B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36024 00003902 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36025                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36026 00003905 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36027 0000390A EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36028                                  kbd_notf5:
 36029                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36030 0000390C 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36031 0000390F 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36032                                  
 36033 00003911 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36034 00003914 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36035                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36036 00003916 BA[E54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36037 00003919 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36038 0000391C B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36039 0000391E 881E[1447]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36040                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36041 00003922 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36042 00003924 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36043 00003926 C606[1A47]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36044 0000392B 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36045 0000392D 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36046                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36047 0000392F 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36048 00003932 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36049                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36050 00003934 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36051 00003937 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36052 00003938 C3                              retn			;
 36053                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36054 00003939 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36055 0000393A C3                              retn			;
 36056                                  
 36057                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36058                                  ;
 36059                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36060                                  ;
 36061                                  ;   INPUT
 36062                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36063                                  ;
 36064                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36065                                  ;       None
 36066                                  ;
 36067                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36068                                  ;       None
 36069                                  ;
 36070                                  ;   HISTORY
 36071                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36072                                  ;
 36073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36074                                  
 36075                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36076                                  
 36077                                  set_numlock:
 36078                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36079                                  	;push	ax
 36080 0000393B 1E                              push    ds
 36081 0000393C 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36082 0000393E 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36083 00003940 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36084 00003943 2E3B06[824B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36085 00003948 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36086 0000394A 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36087 0000394F EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36088                                  not_off:
 36089 00003951 2E3B06[804B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36090 00003956 F9                              stc
 36091 00003957 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36092 00003959 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36093                                  set_done:
 36094 0000395E 1F                              pop     ds
 36095                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36096                                  	;pop	ax
 36097 0000395F C3                              retn
 36098                                  
 36099                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36100                                  
 36101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36102                                  ;
 36103                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ;   INPUT
 36106                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36107                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36108                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36109                                  ;
 36110                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36111                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36112                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36113                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36114                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36115                                  ;
 36116                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36117                                  ;       All
 36118                                  ;
 36119                                  ;   NOTES
 36120                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36121                                  ;
 36122                                  ;   HISTORY
 36123                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36124                                  ;
 36125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36126                                  
 36127                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36128                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36129                                  
 36130                                  menu_check:
 36131                                  
 36132                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36133                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36134                                  
 36135 00003960 51                              push    cx              ;
 36136 00003961 56                              push    si              ;
 36137 00003962 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36138                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36139 00003964 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36140 00003967 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36141 00003969 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36142 0000396B 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36143 0000396D 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36144 0000396E EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36145                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36146 00003970 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36147 00003972 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36148 00003974 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36149 00003976 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36150 00003978 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36151 0000397B 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36152 00003980 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36153                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36154 00003982 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36155 00003984 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36156                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36157 00003986 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36158                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36159 00003989 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36160 0000398B 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36161 0000398D 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36162 0000398F 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36163 00003991 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36164 00003994 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36165 00003996 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 36166 0000399A 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36167 0000399C 800E[1047]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36168 000039A1 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36169                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36170 000039A3 3A06[D11E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 36171 000039A7 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36172 000039A9 800E[1047]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36173 000039AE EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36174                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36175 000039B0 E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36176 000039B3 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36177                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36178 000039B5 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36179 000039B6 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36180                                  
 36181                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36182                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36183                                  
 36184 000039B7 F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36185 000039BC 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36186                                  ;
 36187                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36188                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36189                                  ;
 36190 000039BE E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36191 000039C1 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36192 000039C3 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36193                                  
 36194                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36195                                  
 36196                                  menu_search:
 36197 000039C6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36198 000039C8 BF[5547]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36199 000039CB E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36200 000039CE 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36201 000039D0 C606[4D47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36202 000039D5 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36203                                  
 36204                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36205                                  
 36206                                  menu_color:
 36207 000039D8 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36208 000039D9 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36209                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36210                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36211                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36212 000039DA E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36213 000039DD 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36214 000039E0 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36215                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36216                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36217                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36218                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36219 000039E2 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36220 000039E4 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36221 000039E7 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36222 000039E9 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36223 000039EC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36224 000039EF 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36225                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36226                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36227 000039F1 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36228 000039F3 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36229 000039F5 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36230                                  check_color:
 36231 000039F7 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36232 000039F9 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36233 000039FB 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36234                                  set_color:
 36235 000039FE 8816[0B47]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36236 00003A02 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36237 00003A03 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36238 00003A04 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36239                                  
 36240                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36241                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36242                                  
 36243                                  menu_found:
 36244 00003A07 C606[1547]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36245                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36246 00003A0C C606[1947]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36247 00003A11 8026[1447]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36248                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36249 00003A16 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36250 00003A18 8916[1747]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36251                                  
 36252 00003A1C E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36253                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36254                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36255                                  
 36256                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36257                                  
 36258                                  menu_process:
 36259 00003A1F E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36260 00003A22 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36261 00003A24 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36262 00003A26 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36263 00003A28 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36264 00003A2A 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36265 00003A2C 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 36266 00003A2E 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 36267 00003A30 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 36268 00003A32 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 36269 00003A34 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 36270 00003A36 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 36271 00003A38 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 36272 00003A3A 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36273 00003A3C 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 36274 00003A3E 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 36275 00003A40 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36276 00003A42 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 36277 00003A45 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36278 00003A47 F9                              stc                     ;
 36279 00003A48 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 36280 00003A4B EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36281                                  menu_numlock:
 36282 00003A4D E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 36283 00003A50 EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36284                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 36285 00003A52 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 36286                                  
 36287                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36288                                  
 36289                                  menu_default:
 36290 00003A54 8936[1747]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 36291 00003A58 803E[1A47]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36292 00003A5D 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36293 00003A5F E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 36294 00003A62 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36295 00003A64 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36296 00003A67 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 36297 00003A69 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 36298 00003A6B E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 36299 00003A6E 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36300                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36301 00003A71 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36302 00003A73 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36303                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 36304 00003A75 881E[1947]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36305                                  timeout_skip:
 36306 00003A79 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36307                                  
 36308                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36309                                  
 36310                                  menu_item:
 36311                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 36312 00003A7B 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 36313 00003A7E 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 36314 00003A80 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 36315 00003A82 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 36316 00003A85 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 36317 00003A87 F9                              stc                     ;
 36318 00003A88 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 36319 00003A8B EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 36320                                  
 36321                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36322                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36323                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36324                                  
 36325                                  menu_itemfound:
 36326 00003A8D 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 36327 00003A8E 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36328 00003A90 8887[1B47]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 36329 00003A94 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 36330                                  
 36331                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 36332                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 36333                                  ;   description...
 36334                                  
 36335 00003A96 89B7[2547]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 36336 00003A9A 89B7[3947]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 36337 00003A9E 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 36338 00003AA0 E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 36339 00003AA3 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36340 00003AA5 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 36341 00003AA8 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36342 00003AAA 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 36343 00003AAC 89BF[3947]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 36344                                  
 36345                                  menu_nextitem:
 36346 00003AB0 E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36347 00003AB3 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36348                                  
 36349                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36350                                  
 36351                                  menu_getdefault:
 36352 00003AB6 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36353 00003AB8 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36354 00003ABA 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36355 00003ABC E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36356                                  menu_valid:
 36357 00003ABF 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36358 00003AC1 8816[1647]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36359 00003AC5 8B3E[1747]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36360 00003AC9 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36361 00003ACB 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36362 00003ACD 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36363                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36364 00003ACE 53                              push    bx              ;
 36365 00003ACF 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36366 00003AD1 8BB7[2547]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36367 00003AD5 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36368 00003AD8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36369 00003AD9 06                              push    es              ;
 36370 00003ADA 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36371 00003ADB E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 36372 00003ADE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36373 00003ADF 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36374 00003AE0 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 36375 00003AE2 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36376 00003AE3 3A1E[1647]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 36377 00003AE7 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 36378                                  menu_nodefault:
 36379 00003AE9 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 36380                                  menu_setdefault:
 36381 00003AEB 881E[1547]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36382                                  
 36383                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36384                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36385                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36386                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36387                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36388                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36389                                  
 36390 00003AEF 803E[1947]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36391 00003AF4 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 36392 00003AF6 F606[1447]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 36393 00003AFB 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 36394 00003AFD E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 36395                                  
 36396                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 36397                                  
 36398                                  menu_display:
 36399 00003B00 B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 36400 00003B02 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36401 00003B04 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 36402 00003B06 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36403 00003B08 06                              push    es              ;
 36404 00003B09 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 36405 00003B0C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36406 00003B0E 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36407 00003B12 A3[1247]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 36408 00003B15 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 36409 00003B19 A2[1147]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 36410 00003B1C A1[0C47]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
