 36411 00003B1F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36412 00003B21 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 36413 00003B24 8A3E[0B47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 36414 00003B28 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36415                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36416 00003B2A 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36417 00003B2F FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36418                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36419 00003B31 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36420 00003B36 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36421 00003B38 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36422 00003B3A 8A36[0F47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36423                                  menu_clear:
 36424 00003B3E CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36425 00003B40 07                              pop     es              ;
 36426 00003B41 8836[0F47]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 36427 00003B45 BA[224C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 36428 00003B48 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 36429                                  
 36430 00003B4B F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36431 00003B50 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 36432 00003B52 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36433 00003B56 8A36[0F47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 36434 00003B5A B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 36435 00003B5C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 36436 00003B5E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36437 00003B60 BA[6E4C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 36438 00003B63 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 36439 00003B66 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 36440 00003B68 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36441 00003B6A 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 36442 00003B6D 8816[0E47]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 36443                                  
 36444                                  menu_nostatus:
 36445 00003B71 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 36446                                  menu_disploop:
 36447 00003B74 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 36448 00003B77 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 36449 00003B78 3A1E[1647]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 36450 00003B7C 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36451                                  
 36452                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 36453                                  
 36454 00003B7E B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 36455 00003B80 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36456 00003B82 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 36457 00003B85 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36458 00003B89 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 36459 00003B8B CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36460                                  
 36461 00003B8D BA[5B4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 36462 00003B90 E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36463 00003B93 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36464 00003B96 BA[2E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36465 00003B99 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36466 00003B9C FF36[1047]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36467 00003BA0 800E[1047]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36468 00003BA5 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36469 00003BA8 8F06[1047]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36470                                  
 36471                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36472                                  
 36473                                  menu_autoselect:
 36474 00003BAC 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36475 00003BAF 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36476 00003BB1 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36477                                  menu_abort:
 36478 00003BB4 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36479 00003BB6 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36480                                  
 36481                                  normal_boot:
 36482 00003BB9 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36483 00003BBC 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36484 00003BBE 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36485 00003BC2 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36486 00003BC4 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36487                                  
 36488                                  not_topmenu:
 36489 00003BC7 80BF[1B47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36490 00003BCC 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36491 00003BCE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36492 00003BD0 8BBF[2547]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36493 00003BD4 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36494 00003BD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36495 00003BD9 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36496 00003BDB E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36497                                  
 36498                                  not_submenu:
 36499 00003BDE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36500 00003BE0 8B9F[2547]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36501                                  
 36502                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36503                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36504                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36505                                  
 36506                                  no_selection:
 36507 00003BE4 891E[1747]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36508 00003BE8 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36509 00003BEC 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36510 00003BEE 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36511 00003BEF 8E1E[BE14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36512 00003BF3 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36513                                  
 36514                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36515                                  ;
 36516                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36517                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36518                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36519                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36520                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36521                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36522                                  ;
 36523                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36524                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36525                                  
 36526                                  copyblock_loop:
 36527 00003BF5 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36528 00003BF6 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36529 00003BF9 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36530 00003BFA 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36531                                  
 36532                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36533                                  
 36534                                  copyblock_begin:
 36535                                  
 36536                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36537                                  %if 0
 36538                                          push    ax              ;
 36539                                          push    cx              ;
 36540                                          push    si              ;
 36541                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36542                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36543                                          push    ds              ;
 36544                                          push    cs              ;
 36545                                          pop     ds              ;
 36546                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36547                                          pop     ds              ;
 36548                                          pop     di              ;
 36549                                          pop     si              ;
 36550                                          pop     cx              ;
 36551                                          pop     ax              ;
 36552                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36553                                  %endif
 36554                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36555 00003BFC 57                      	push	di
 36556 00003BFD BF[5A47]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36557 00003C00 E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36558 00003C03 5F                      	pop	di
 36559 00003C04 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36560                                  
 36561 00003C06 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36562 00003C08 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36563 00003C0A 57                              push    di              ;
 36564 00003C0B 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36565 00003C0D 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36566 00003C0E 06                              push    es              ;
 36567 00003C0F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36568 00003C10 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36569 00003C13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36570 00003C14 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36571                                  copyblock_check:
 36572 00003C15 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36573 00003C17 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36574 00003C19 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36575 00003C1C EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36576                                  
 36577                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36578 00003C1E E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36579 00003C21 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36580 00003C24 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36581 00003C26 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36582 00003C28 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36583 00003C2A 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36584 00003C2C EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36585                                  ;
 36586                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36587                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36588                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36589                                  ;
 36590                                  move_config:
 36591 00003C2E 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36592 00003C30 51                              push    cx              ;
 36593                                  ;
 36594                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36595                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36596                                  ;
 36597                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36598 00003C31 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36599 00003C34 BE[4D47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36600 00003C37 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36601                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36602                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36603                                  copy_boot: 
 36604                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36605 00003C38 2E                              cs
 36606 00003C39 AC                      	lodsb
 36607 00003C3A 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36608 00003C3C 47                              inc     di              ;
 36609 00003C3D E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36610                                  
 36611 00003C3F 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36612                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36613                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36614 00003C40 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36615 00003C42 2E8B36[1747]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36616 00003C47 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36617 00003C49 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36618 00003C4B 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36619 00003C4C 07                              pop     es              ;
 36620 00003C4D BE[5A47]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36621 00003C50 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36622 00003C53 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36623 00003C56 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36624 00003C58 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36625 00003C5A 46                              inc     si              ;
 36626 00003C5B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36627 00003C5C E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36628 00003C5E C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36629 00003C61 07                              pop     es              ;
 36630                                  
 36631                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36632                                  
 36633 00003C62 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36634 00003C64 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36635 00003C69 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36636 00003C6B 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36637                                  
 36638 00003C6C 51                              push    cx              ;
 36639 00003C6D F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36640 00003C6F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36641 00003C70 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36642 00003C72 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36643                                  
 36644                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36645                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36646                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36647                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36648                                  ;   is empty.
 36649                                  
 36650 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;
 36651 00003C74 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36652 00003C76 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36653 00003C77 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 36654 00003C7D E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36655 00003C80 07                              pop     es
 36656                                  
 36657                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36658                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36659                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36660                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36661                                  
 36662                                  menu_done:
 36663 00003C81 803E[0C47]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36664 00003C86 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36665 00003C88 06                              push    es              ;
 36666 00003C89 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36667 00003C8C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36668 00003C8E A1[1247]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36669 00003C91 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36670 00003C95 A0[1147]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36671 00003C98 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36672 00003C9C 07                              pop     es              ;
 36673                                  menu_exit:
 36674 00003C9D 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36675 00003CA1 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36676                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 36677                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36678                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36679                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36680 00003CA5 C3                      	retn
 36681                                  
 36682                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36683                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36684                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36685                                  
 36686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36687                                  ;
 36688                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36689                                  ;
 36690                                  ;   INPUT
 36691                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36692                                  ;
 36693                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36694                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36695                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36696                                  ;
 36697                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36698                                  ;       None
 36699                                  ;
 36700                                  ;   NOTES
 36701                                  ;       None
 36702                                  ;
 36703                                  ;   HISTORY
 36704                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36705                                  ;
 36706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36707                                  
 36708                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36709                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36710                                  
 36711                                  copy_envvar:
 36712 00003CA6 51                              push    cx              ;
 36713 00003CA7 56                              push    si              ;
 36714 00003CA8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36715 00003CA9 06                              push    es              ;
 36716 00003CAA 06                              push    es              ;
 36717 00003CAB 8E06[BE14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36718 00003CAF 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36719                                  
 36720                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36721                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36722                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36723                                  ;
 36724                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36725                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36726                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36727                                  
 36728 00003CB0 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36729                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36730 00003CB2 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36731 00003CB3 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36732                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36733 00003CB5 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36734 00003CB7 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36735                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36736 00003CB9 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36737 00003CBB 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36738                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36739 00003CBD 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36740 00003CBF 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36741 00003CC0 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36742 00003CC2 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36743 00003CC4 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36744 00003CC6 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36745 00003CC8 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36746 00003CCA 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36747 00003CCB 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36748                                  copy_varsrch:
 36749 00003CCD 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36750 00003CD0 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36751 00003CD2 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36752 00003CD4 51                              push    cx              ;
 36753 00003CD5 56                              push    si              ;
 36754 00003CD6 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36755 00003CD8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36756 00003CD9 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36757 00003CDA 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36758 00003CDC 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36759 00003CE0 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36760                                  
 36761                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36762                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36763                                  
 36764 00003CE2 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36765 00003CE5 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36766 00003CE7 56                              push    si              ;
 36767 00003CE8 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36768 00003CEA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36769 00003CEC 2E8B0E[BC14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36770 00003CF1 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36771                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36772                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36773                                  
 36774 00003CF3 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36775 00003CF4 26                      	es	; 26h
 36776 00003CF5 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36777                                  
 36778 00003CF6 5E                      	pop     si
 36779                                  copy_envprep:
 36780 00003CF7 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36781 00003CFA 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36782 00003CFC 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36783 00003CFF 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36784                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36785                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36786                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36787 00003D01 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36788 00003D02 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36789 00003D04 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36790 00003D06 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36791 00003D08 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36792 00003D0A AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36793 00003D0B EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36794                                  
 36795                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36796 00003D0D 51                              push    cx              ;
 36797 00003D0E B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36798 00003D11 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36799 00003D13 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36800 00003D14 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36801                                  
 36802                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36803                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36804                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36805                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36806                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36807                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36808                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36809                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36810                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36811                                  
 36812                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36813 00003D16 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36814 00003D18 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36815                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36816 00003D19 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36817 00003D1C 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36818                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 36819 00003D21 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 36820                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36821 00003D22 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 36822 00003D23 07                              pop     es              ;
 36823 00003D24 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36824 00003D25 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36825 00003D26 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36826                                  
 36827                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36828 00003D27 C3                              retn
 36829                                  
 36830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36831                                  ;
 36832                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36833                                  ;
 36834                                  ;   INPUT
 36835                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36836                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36837                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36838                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36839                                  ;
 36840                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36841                                  ;       Same as above
 36842                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36843                                  ;
 36844                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36845                                  ;       All
 36846                                  ;
 36847                                  ;   NOTES
 36848                                  ;       None
 36849                                  ;
 36850                                  ;   HISTORY
 36851                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36852                                  ;
 36853                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36854                                  
 36855                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36856                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36857                                  
 36858                                  copy_block:
 36859 00003D28 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36860 00003D2B 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36861 00003D2D 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36862 00003D2F 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36863 00003D31 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36864                                  
 36865 00003D33 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36866 00003D35 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36867 00003D37 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36868                                  
 36869                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36870                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36871                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36872                                  
 36873 00003D39 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36874 00003D3E 57                              push    di              ;
 36875                                  
 36876 00003D3F BF[5547]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36877 00003D42 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36878 00003D45 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36879                                  
 36880 00003D47 BF[5A47]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36881 00003D4A E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36882 00003D4D 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36883                                  
 36884 00003D4F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36885 00003D51 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36886 00003D54 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36887                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36888                                  	;pop    di              ;
 36889 00003D56 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36890 00003D58 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 36891 00003D59 51                              push    cx              ;
 36892 00003D5A 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36893 00003D5C 56                              push    si              ;
 36894 00003D5D 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36895 00003D5E 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36896 00003D60 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36897 00003D63 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36898 00003D66 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36899 00003D67 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36900 00003D68 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36901 00003D6A EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36902                                  
 36903                                  copy_error:
 36904                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36905 00003D6C F8                      	clc
 36906                                  copy_skip:
 36907 00003D6D 5F                              pop     di
 36908                                  ;copy_error:
 36909                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 36910                                  	;clc                    ;
 36911 00003D6E E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36912 00003D71 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36913                                  
 36914                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36915                                  
 36916                                  copy_line:
 36917 00003D73 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36918 00003D75 47                              inc     di              ;
 36919 00003D76 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36920 00003D78 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36921 00003D7A 2E803E[C114]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36922 00003D80 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36923 00003D82 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36924 00003D85 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36925 00003D87 47                              inc     di              ;
 36926 00003D88 47                              inc     di              ;
 36927 00003D89 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36928                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36929 00003D8B E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 36930 00003D8E 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36931 00003D90 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36932 00003D92 47                              inc     di              ;
 36933                                  copy_next:
 36934 00003D93 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36935 00003D95 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36936                                  
 36937                                  copy_nextline:
 36938 00003D97 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36939 00003D9A EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36940                                  
 36941                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36942                                  ;copy_done:
 36943                                          ;retn
 36944                                  
 36945                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36946                                  ;
 36947                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36948                                  ;
 36949                                  ;   INPUT
 36950                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36951                                  ;
 36952                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36953                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36954                                  ;
 36955                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36956                                  ;       DX
 36957                                  ;
 36958                                  ;   NOTES
 36959                                  ;       None
 36960                                  ;
 36961                                  ;   HISTORY
 36962                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36963                                  ;
 36964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36965                                  
 36966                                  get_linenum:
 36967 00003D9C 50                              push    ax              ;
 36968 00003D9D 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36969 00003D9F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36970 00003DA0 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36971 00003DA2 56                              push    si              ;
 36972 00003DA3 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36973 00003DA8 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36974                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36975 00003DAA E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 36976 00003DAD 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36977 00003DAF 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36978 00003DB0 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36979 00003DB2 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36980                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36981 00003DB4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36982 00003DB5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36983 00003DB6 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36984 00003DB7 C3                              retn
 36985                                  
 36986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36987                                  ;
 36988                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36989                                  ;
 36990                                  ;   INPUT
 36991                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36992                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36993                                  ;
 36994                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36995                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36996                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36997                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36998                                  ;
 36999                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37000                                  ;       None
 37001                                  ;
 37002                                  ;   NOTES
 37003                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37004                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37005                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37006                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37007                                  ;
 37008                                  ;   HISTORY
 37009                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37010                                  ;
 37011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37012                                  
 37013                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37014 00003DB8 50                              push    ax              ;
 37015 00003DB9 51                              push    cx              ;
 37016 00003DBA 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37017 00003DBF 56                              push    si              ;
 37018 00003DC0 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37019 00003DC2 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37020 00003DC3 06                              push    es              ;
 37021 00003DC4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37022 00003DC5 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37023 00003DC8 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37024 00003DCA 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37025 00003DCC 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37026 00003DCD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37027 00003DCE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37028 00003DCF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37029                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37030 00003DD0 C3                              retn			;
 37031                                  
 37032                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37033                                  ;
 37034                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37035                                  ;
 37036                                  ;   INPUT
 37037                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37038                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37039                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37040                                  ;
 37041                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37042                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37043                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37044                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37045                                  ;
 37046                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37047                                  ;       AX
 37048                                  ;
 37049                                  ;   NOTES
 37050                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37051                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37052                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37053                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37054                                  ;
 37055                                  ;   HISTORY
 37056                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37057                                  ;
 37058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37059                                  
 37060                                  find_block:
 37061 00003DD1 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37062 00003DD4 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37063 00003DD6 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37064 00003DD8 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37065 00003DDA 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37066 00003DDC 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37067 00003DDE 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37068 00003DE0 2E800E[C114]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37069 00003DE6 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37070                                  check_line:
 37071 00003DE8 2E800E[C114]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37072 00003DEE E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37073 00003DF1 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37074                                  next_line:
 37075 00003DF3 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37076 00003DF6 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37077                                  ;find_exit:
 37078                                  ;	retn
 37079                                  
 37080                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37081                                  ;
 37082                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37083                                  ;
 37084                                  ;   INPUT
 37085                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37086                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37087                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37088                                  ;
 37089                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37090                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37091                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37092                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37093                                  ;
 37094                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37095                                  ;       AX
 37096                                  ;
 37097                                  ;   NOTES
 37098                                  ;       None
 37099                                  ;
 37100                                  ;   HISTORY
 37101                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37102                                  ;
 37103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37104                                  
 37105                                  comp_names:
 37106 00003DF8 57                              push    di              ;
 37107                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37108 00003DF9 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37109 00003DFC 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37110 00003DFE E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37111 00003E01 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37112 00003E03 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37113 00003E05 47                              inc     di              ;
 37114 00003E06 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37115                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37116 00003E09 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37117 00003E0B 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37118 00003E0D F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37119                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37120 00003E0E 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37121 00003E0F C3                              retn			;
 37122                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37123 00003E10 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37124 00003E12 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37125 00003E15 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37126 00003E17 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37127                                  
 37128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37129                                  
 37130                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37131                                  comp_names_x:
 37132                                  	;
 37133                                  comp_names_safe:
 37134 00003E19 50                              push    ax
 37135 00003E1A 51                              push    cx
 37136 00003E1B 56                              push	si
 37137 00003E1C 1E                              push    ds
 37138 00003E1D 0E                              push    cs
 37139 00003E1E 1F                              pop     ds
 37140 00003E1F E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37141 00003E22 1F                              pop     ds
 37142 00003E23 5E                      	pop	si
 37143 00003E24 59                              pop     cx
 37144 00003E25 58                              pop     ax
 37145 00003E26 C3                              retn
 37146                                  
 37147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37148                                  ;
 37149                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 37150                                  ;
 37151                                  ;   INPUT
 37152                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37153                                  ;
 37154                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37155                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37156                                  ;
 37157                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37158                                  ;       None
 37159                                  ;
 37160                                  ;   NOTES
 37161                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37162                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37163                                  ;
 37164                                  ;   HISTORY
 37165                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37166                                  ;
 37167                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37168                                  
 37169                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37170                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37171                                  
 37172                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37173 00003E27 50                              push    ax              ;
 37174 00003E28 53                              push    bx              ;
 37175 00003E29 51                              push    cx              ;
 37176 00003E2A 52                              push    dx              ;
 37177 00003E2B 56                              push    si              ;
 37178 00003E2C B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37179 00003E2E 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37180 00003E32 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37181 00003E34 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37182 00003E35 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37183 00003E37 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37184 00003E39 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37185 00003E3C B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37186 00003E3E CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37187 00003E40 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37188 00003E42 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37189 00003E44 8A26[0B47]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37190 00003E48 3A1E[1547]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37191 00003E4C 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37192 00003E4E 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37193 00003E51 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37194 00003E53 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37195 00003E55 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37196 00003E57 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37197 00003E59 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37198 00003E5B 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37199                                  print_other:                    ;
 37200 00003E5E B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37201 00003E60 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37202 00003E62 8BBF[3947]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37203 00003E66 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37204 00003E68 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37205 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37206 00003E6E B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37207 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37208 00003E73 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37209 00003E75 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37210 00003E77 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37211                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37212 00003E79 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37213 00003E7C CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37214 00003E7E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37215 00003E80 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37216 00003E82 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37217                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37218 00003E84 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37219 00003E87 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37220 00003E89 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37221 00003E8B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37222 00003E8D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37223 00003E8F 06                              push    es              ;
 37224                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37225 00003E90 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37226 00003E93 47                              inc     di              ;
 37227 00003E94 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37228 00003E96 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37229 00003E98 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37230                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37231 00003E9A 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37232 00003E9C 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37233 00003E9E 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37234 00003EA0 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37235 00003EA2 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37236 00003EA4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37237 00003EA6 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37238 00003EA8 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37239 00003EAB 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37240 00003EAD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37241 00003EAF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37242 00003EB1 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37243                                  print_done:                     ;
 37244 00003EB3 07                              pop     es              ;
 37245 00003EB4 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37246 00003EB5 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37247 00003EB7 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37248 00003EB9 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37249 00003EBA 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37250 00003EBB 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37251 00003EBC 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37252 00003EBD 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37253 00003EBE C3                              retn			;
 37254                                  
 37255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37256                                  ;
 37257                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37258                                  ;
 37259                                  ;   INPUT
 37260                                  ;       None
 37261                                  ;
 37262                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37263                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37264                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37265                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37266                                  ;
 37267                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37268                                  ;       None
 37269                                  ;
 37270                                  ;   NOTES
 37271                                  ;       None
 37272                                  ;
 37273                                  ;   HISTORY
 37274                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37275                                  ;
 37276                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37277                                  
 37278                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37279 00003EBF 8A1E[1547]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37280 00003EC3 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37281 00003EC5 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37282 00003EC8 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37283 00003ECB 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37284 00003ED0 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37285 00003ED2 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37286 00003ED4 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37287 00003ED6 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37288                                  check_time:
 37289 00003ED8 A0[1947]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37290 00003EDB 2A06[1A47]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37291 00003EDF 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37292 00003EE1 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 37293 00003EE6 C606[1A47]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37294 00003EEB E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37295                                  show_time:
 37296 00003EEE 53                              push    bx              ;
 37297 00003EEF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37298 00003EF1 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37299 00003EF5 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37300 00003EF7 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37301 00003EF9 52                              push    dx              ;
 37302 00003EFA 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37303 00003EFD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37304 00003EFF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37305 00003F01 BA[CE4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37306 00003F04 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37307 00003F07 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37308 00003F09 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37309 00003F0A B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37310 00003F0C F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37311 00003F0E 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37312 00003F10 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37313 00003F12 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37314 00003F14 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37315 00003F16 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37316 00003F18 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37317 00003F1A B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37318 00003F1C CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37319 00003F1E 5A                              pop     dx
 37320 00003F1F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37321 00003F21 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37322 00003F23 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37323                                  input_key:
 37324 00003F24 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37325 00003F26 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37326 00003F28 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37327 00003F2A 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37328 00003F2C 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37329 00003F31 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37330 00003F33 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37331 00003F35 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37332 00003F37 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37333 00003F39 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37334 00003F3B 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37335 00003F3D 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37336 00003F3F B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37337                                  got_time:
 37338 00003F41 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37339 00003F43 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37340 00003F45 0036[1A47]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37341 00003F49 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37342                                  got_key:
 37343 00003F4B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37344 00003F4C B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37345 00003F4F 8706[1947]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37346 00003F53 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37347 00003F55 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37348 00003F57 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37349 00003F58 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37350 00003F5B 8B1E[0B47]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37351 00003F5F B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37352 00003F62 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37353 00003F64 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37354                                  
 37355                                  timeout_disabled:
 37356 00003F65 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37357 00003F66 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37358 00003F68 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37359 00003F6A CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37360 00003F6C 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37361                                  
 37362 00003F6E 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37363 00003F70 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37364 00003F72 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37365 00003F75 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37366 00003F77 FE0E[1547]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37367 00003F7B E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37368 00003F7E FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37369 00003F80 EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37370                                  not_up:
 37371 00003F82 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37372 00003F84 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37373 00003F86 3A1E[1647]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37374 00003F8A 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37375 00003F8C FE06[1547]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37376 00003F90 E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37377 00003F93 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37378                                  print1: 
 37379 00003F94 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37380                                  print2: 
 37381 00003F96 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37382 00003F99 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37383                                  to_input_key:
 37384 00003F9C EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37385                                  not_down:
 37386 00003F9E F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37387 00003FA3 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37388 00003FA5 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37389 00003FA7 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37390 00003FA9 8036[1447]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37391 00003FAE E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37392 00003FB1 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37393                                  not_f8:
 37394 00003FB4 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37395 00003FB6 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37396                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37397                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37398                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37399 00003FB8 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37400 00003FBD BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37401 00003FC0 B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37402 00003FC2 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37403                                  
 37404                                  normal_key:
 37405 00003FC4 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37406 00003FC6 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37407 00003FC8 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37408 00003FCA 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 37409 00003FCC BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 37410 00003FCF C3                              retn			;
 37411                                  not_backspace:
 37412 00003FD0 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 37413 00003FD2 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 37414 00003FD4 3A06[1647]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 37415 00003FD8 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37416 00003FDA A2[1547]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37417 00003FDD E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37418 00003FE0 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37419 00003FE2 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37420                                  
 37421                                  select_done:
 37422 00003FE4 B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 37423 00003FE6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37424 00003FE8 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37425                                  
 37426                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37427                                  
 37428                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 37431                                  ;
 37432                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 37433                                  ;
 37434                                  ;   INPUT

 37436                                  ;
 37437                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37438                                  ;       None
 37439                                  ;
 37440                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37441                                  ;       None
 37442                                  ;
 37443                                  ;   NOTES
 37444                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37445                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37446                                  ;
 37447                                  ;   HISTORY
 37448                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37449                                  ;

 37454 00003FEA 50                      	push	ax

 37456                                  	;jae	short disp_ok

 37459 00003FEB B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37460 00003FED 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37461 00003FEF 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37462                                  disp_ok:
 37463 00003FF1 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37464                                  disp_input_ok:

 37466 00003FF5 CD21                    	int	21h

 37468 00003FFA E8E504                  	call	print
 37469 00003FFD 58                      	pop	ax
 37470 00003FFE C3                      	retn

 37481 0000400D 5B                              pop     bx
 37482 0000400E C3                              retn

 37488                                  ;   INPUT

 37490                                  ;
 37491                                  ;   OUTPUT

 37493                                  ;

 37497                                  ;   NOTES

 37505                                  show_status:
 37506 0000400F 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37507 00004010 8B1E[0B47]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 37513 0000401F F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
