 37516 00004028 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37517 0000402A B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37518 0000402D B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 37519                                  	; 10/09/2023

 37521 00004030 EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 37522                                  show_onoff:

 37524                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37525                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37526                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37527                                  		; CX = number of times to write character

 37541 0000404A 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37542 0000404B C3                              retn			;

 37546                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37547                                  ;
 37548                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37549                                  ;
 37550                                  ;   INPUT
 37551                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37552                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37553                                  ;
 37554                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37555                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37556                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37557                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37558                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37559                                  ;
 37560                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37561                                  ;       AX
 37562                                  ;
 37563                                  ;   NOTES
 37564                                  ;       None
 37565                                  ;
 37566                                  ;   HISTORY
 37567                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37568                                  ;
 37569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37570                                  
 37571                                  skip_token:
 37572 0000404C E84D00                          call    get_char
 37573 0000404F 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37574 00004051 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37575 00004054 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37576                                  skip_check_eol:
 37577 00004056 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37578 00004058 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37579 0000405A 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37580 0000405C 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37581 0000405E F8                              clc
 37582                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37583 0000405F C3                      	retn
 37584                                  skip_token_eol:
 37585 00004060 F9                              stc
 37586                                  skip_token_done:
 37587 00004061 C3                              retn
 37588                                  
 37589                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37590                                  ;
 37591                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37592                                  ;
 37593                                  ;   INPUT
 37594                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37595                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37596                                  ;
 37597                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37598                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37599                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37600                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37601                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37602                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37603                                  ;
 37604                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37605                                  ;       AX
 37606                                  ;
 37607                                  ;   NOTES
 37608                                  ;       None
 37609                                  ;
 37610                                  ;   HISTORY
 37611                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37612                                  ;
 37613                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37614                                  
 37615                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37616 00004062 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37617 00004065 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37618 00004068 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37619 0000406A E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37620 0000406D 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37621 0000406F EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37622                                  
 37623                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37624                                  ;
 37625                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37626                                  ;
 37627                                  ;   INPUT
 37628                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37629                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37630                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37631                                  ;
 37632                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37633                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37634                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37635                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37636                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37637                                  ;
 37638                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37639                                  ;       AX
 37640                                  ;
 37641                                  ;   NOTES
 37642                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37643                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37644                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37645                                  ;
 37646                                  ;   HISTORY
 37647                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37648                                  ;
 37649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37650                                  
 37651                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37652                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37653                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37654                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37655                                       
 37656                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37657                                  
 37658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37659                                  ;
 37660                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37661                                  ;
 37662                                  ;   INPUT
 37663                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37664                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37665                                  ;
 37666                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37667                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37668                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37669                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37670                                  ;
 37671                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37672                                  ;       AX
 37673                                  ;
 37674                                  ;   NOTES
 37675                                  ;       None
 37676                                  ;
 37677                                  ;   HISTORY
 37678                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37679                                  ;
 37680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37681                                  
 37682                                  skip_line:
 37683 00004071 E82800                          call    get_char
 37684 00004074 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37685                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37686 00004076 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37687 00004078 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37688                                  skip_line_done:
 37689                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37690 0000407A C3                              retn
 37691                                  
 37692                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37693                                  ;
 37694                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37695                                  ;
 37696                                  ;   INPUT
 37697                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37698                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37699                                  ;
 37700                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37701                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37702                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37703                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37704                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37705                                  ;
 37706                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37707                                  ;       AX
 37708                                  ;
 37709                                  ;   NOTES
 37710                                  ;       None
 37711                                  ;
 37712                                  ;   HISTORY
 37713                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37714                                  ;
 37715                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37716                                  
 37717                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37718                                  
 37719                                  get_number:
 37720 0000407B 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37721                                  num_loop:
 37722 0000407D E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37723 00004080 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37724 00004082 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37725 00004084 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37726 00004086 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37727 00004088 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37728 0000408A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37729 0000408B B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37730 0000408E 52                              push    dx              ;
 37731 0000408F F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37732 00004091 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37733 00004092 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37734 00004094 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37735 00004095 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37736 00004097 98                              cbw                     ;
 37737 00004098 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37738 0000409A EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37739                                  
 37740                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37741                                  ;num_done:
 37742                                          ;retn
 37743                                  
 37744                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37745                                  ;
 37746                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37747                                  ;
 37748                                  ;   INPUT
 37749                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37750                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37751                                  ;
 37752                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37753                                  ;       AL == next character
 37754                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37755                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37756                                  ;
 37757                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37758                                  ;       AX
 37759                                  ;
 37760                                  ;   NOTES
 37761                                  ;       None
 37762                                  ;
 37763                                  ;   HISTORY
 37764                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37765                                  ;
 37766                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37767                                  
 37768                                  get_char:
 37769 0000409C 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37770 0000409F 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37771                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37772 000040A1 26                      	es	
 37773 000040A2 AC                      	lodsb
 37774 000040A3 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37775 000040A5 C3                              retn			;
 37776                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37777 000040A6 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37778                                  nearby_ret:
 37779 000040A9 C3                              retn
 37780                                  
 37781                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37782                                  ;
 37783                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37784                                  ;
 37785                                  ;   INPUT
 37786                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37787                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37788                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37789                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37790                                  ;
 37791                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37792                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37793                                  ;
 37794                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37795                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37796                                  ;
 37797                                  ;   NOTES
 37798                                  ;       None
 37799                                  ;
 37800                                  ;   HISTORY
 37801                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37802                                  ;
 37803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37804                                  
 37805                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37806                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37807                                  
 37808                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37809                                  query_user:
 37810 000040AA F606[1447]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37811                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37812 000040AF 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37813 000040B1 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37814                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37815                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37816                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37817                                  qu_1:
 37818 000040B4 F606[1447]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37819 000040B9 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37820 000040BB 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37821 000040BC A0[C014]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37822 000040BF F606[1447]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37823 000040C4 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37824 000040C6 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37825                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37826 000040C8 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37827                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37828                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37829                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37830                                  
 37831                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37832 000040CA 58                      	pop	ax
 37833 000040CB C3                      	retn
 37834                                  
 37835                                  query_all:
 37836                                  
 37837                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37838                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37839                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37840                                  
 37841 000040CC 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37842 000040CD BA[204D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37843 000040D0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37844 000040D2 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37845                                  
 37846 000040D4 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37847 000040D6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37848 000040D8 BF[6147]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37849                                  find_match:                             ;
 37850 000040DB 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37851 000040DD 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37852 000040DF 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37853 000040E1 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37854 000040E2 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37855 000040E4 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37856 000040E6 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37857                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37858 000040E9 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37859                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37860 000040EB 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37861 000040EE B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37862 000040F0 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37863                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37864 000040F2 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37865 000040F4 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37866 000040F5 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37867 000040F7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37868 000040F9 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37869 000040FB B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37870 000040FD 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37871 00004100 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37872 00004102 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37873                                  cmd_notset:
 37874 00004104 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37875                                  line_print:                             ;
 37876                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37877 00004106 26                              es
 37878 00004107 AC                      	lodsb
 37879 00004108 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37880 0000410A 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37881 0000410C B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37882                                  non_null:                               ;
 37883 0000410E 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37884 00004110 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37885 00004112 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37886                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37887 00004114 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37888                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37889 00004117 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37890                                  non_space:                              ;
 37891 00004119 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37892 0000411B B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37893 0000411D CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37894 0000411F EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37895                                  
 37896                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37897 00004121 BA[BE4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37898                                  
 37899                                  generic_prompt:
 37900 00004124 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37901                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37902 00004127 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37903 00004129 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37904 0000412B 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37905 0000412D 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37906 0000412F 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37907 00004132 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37908 00004134 A0[CA4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37909 00004137 800E[1447]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37910 0000413C EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37911                                  not_func:
 37912 0000413E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37913 00004140 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37914 00004144 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37915 00004146 3A06[C64C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37916 0000414A 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37917 0000414C 803E[C014]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37918 00004151 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37919 00004153 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37920 00004155 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37921 00004157 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37922 0000415C A0[C64C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37923                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37924 0000415F E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37925 00004162 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37926                                  
 37927 00004163 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37928 00004167 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37929                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37930 00004169 F8                      	clc
 37931                                  do_cmd:
 37932 0000416A 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37933                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37934                                  	; cf=0
 37935                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37936 0000416B C3                      	retn
 37937                                  
 37938                                  skip_cmd:
 37939 0000416C 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37940                                  skip_all:
 37941 0000416D B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37942 0000416F F9                      	stc
 37943 00004170 C3                      	retn

 38002                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38003                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38004                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38005                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38006                                  
 38007                                  disable_autoexec:
 38008                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38009                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 38230                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether

 38366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38367                                  ;
 38368                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38369                                  ;
 38370                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38371                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38372                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38373                                  ;
 38374                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38375                                  
 38376                                  getnum:
 38377 000042F3 53                      	push	bx
 38378 000042F4 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38379                                  b2:
 38380 000042F6 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38381 000042F9 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38382                                  
 38383 000042FB 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38384 000042FC 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38385                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38386                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38387 000042FD B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38388 000042FF F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38389 00004301 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38390 00004302 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38391 00004304 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38392 00004307 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38393                                  
 38394 00004309 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38395                                  
 38396 0000430A E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 38397 0000430D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38398 0000430F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38399 00004311 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38400 00004313 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38401 00004315 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38402 00004317 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38403 00004319 7417                    	je	short b15
 38404 0000431B 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38405 00004320 7410                    	je	short b15
 38406 00004322 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38407                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38408                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38409                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38410                                  	;nop
 38411 00004324 740C                    	je	short b15
 38412 00004326 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38413 00004328 7408                    	je	short b15
 38414 0000432A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38415 0000432C 7404                    	je	short b15
 38416 0000432E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38417 00004330 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38418                                  b15:
 38419 00004332 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38420 00004337 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38421                                  b1:
 38422 0000433C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38423 0000433E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38424 00004340 5B                      	pop	bx
 38425 00004341 C3                      	retn
 38426                                  badnum:
 38427                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38428                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38429 00004342 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38430                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38431 00004344 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38432 00004348 5B                      	pop	bx
 38433 00004349 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38434 0000434A C3                      	retn
 38435                                  
 38436                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38437                                  
 38438                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38439                                  
 38440                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38441                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38442                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38443                                  ;	si = 0
 38444                                  ;	ax = country id
 38445                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38446                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38447                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38448                                  ;
 38449                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38450                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38451                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38452                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38454                                  
 38455                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38456                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38457                                  
 38458                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38459                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 38460                                  
 38461 0000434B 57                      	push	di
 38462 0000434C 50                      	push	ax
 38463 0000434D 52                      	push	dx
 38464                                  
 38465 0000434E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38466 00004350 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38467 00004352 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38468 00004355 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38469 00004358 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38470                                  
 38471 0000435A 06                      	push	es
 38472 0000435B 56                      	push	si

 38708                                  ;on return:
 38709                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38710                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38711                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38712                                  
 38713                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38714                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38715

 38717                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)

 38772                                  
 38773                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38774                                  
 38775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38776                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38777                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38778                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38779                                  ;
 38780                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38781                                  ;	 be moved.
 38782                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38783                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38784                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38785                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38786                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38787                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38789                                  
 38790 0000449B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38791 0000449C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38792 0000449F F9                      	stc
 38793 000044A0 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38794 000044A2 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38795 000044A3 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38796                                  
 38797 000044A5 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38798 000044A7 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38799 000044A9 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38800 000044AB F9                      	stc
 38801 000044AC CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38802                                  ricb_exit:
 38803 000044AE C3                      	retn

 38807                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38808                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38809                                  %if 0
 38810                                  
 38811                                  set_country_path:
 38812                                  
 38813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38814                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38815                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38816                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38817                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38818                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38819                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38820                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38821                                  
 38822                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38823                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38824                                  
 38825                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38826                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38827                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38828                                  
 38829                                  	push	si
 38830                                  
 38831                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38832                                  	push	es
 38833                                  	pop	ds
 38834                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38835                                  
 38836                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38837                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38838                                  
 38839                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38840                                  	inc	si
 38841                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38842                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38843                                  
 38844                                  scp_default_drv:
 38845                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38846                                  	int	21h
 38847                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38848                                  
 38849                                  scp_setdrv:
 38850                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38851                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38852                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38853                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38854                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38855                                  
 38856                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38857                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38858                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38859                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38860                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38861                                  
 38862                                  scp_root_dir:
 38863                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38864                                  scp_path:
 38865                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38866                                  
 38867                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38868                                  scpath_exit:
 38869                                  
 38870                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38871                                  	push	es
 38872                                  	pop	ds
 38873                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38874                                  
 38875                                  	pop	si
 38876                                  	retn
 38877                                  
 38878                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38879                                  
 38880                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38881                                  
 38882                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38883                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38884                                  ;carry set if not.
 38885                                  
 38886                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38887                                  
 38888                                  	push	ax
 38889                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38890                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38891                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38892                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38893                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38894                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38895                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38896                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38897                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38898                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38899                                  
 38900                                  cdletter_no:
 38901                                  	stc
 38902                                  cdletter_exit:
 38903                                  	pop	ax
 38904                                  	retn
 38905                                  
 38906                                  %endif

 38981                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 38982                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 38983                                  
 38984                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38985                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 38986                                  open_dev:
 38987 000044E7 E80500                  	call	open_file
 38988 000044EA 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 38989                                  
 38990                                  open_dev1:
 38991 000044EC BA[5045]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 38992                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38993                                  	;call	open_file
 38994                                  ;of_retn:
 38995                                  	;retn
 38996                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38997                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 38998                                  open_file:
 38999 000044EF B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 39000 000044F1 F9                      	stc
 39001 000044F2 CD21                    	int	21h
 39002                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 39003 000044F4 C3                      	retn
 39004                                  
 39005                                  open_dev3:
 39006 000044F5 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 39007                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 39008                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 39009                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 39010                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39011                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 39012                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 39013                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39014 000044F7 B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 39015                                  
 39016 000044FA CD21                    	int	21h
 39017                                  
 39018 000044FC F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 39019 000044FF 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 39020                                  
 39021 00004501 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 39022 00004503 CD21                    	int	21h
 39023 00004505 EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 39024
